engChrName: Apply temporary placement for event progression testing. Delete this once system choices and map movement is added.
engSearchText:
Apply temporary placement for event
progression testing. Delete this once system choices
and map movement is added.
jpnChrName: イベント進行確認用に仮配置しています。 ※システム選択肢・マップ移動画面等が正式入力しましたら削除をお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
イベント進行確認用に仮配置しています。
※システム選択肢・マップ移動画面等が正式入力しましたら削除をお願いいたします。

engChrName: These settings are for checking mob placement during day/evening/night. Remove these once they are no longer needed.
engSearchText:
These settings are for checking mob placement
during day/evening/night. Remove these once they
are no longer needed.
jpnChrName: 昼・夕・夜のモブ配置確認用です。 ※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
昼・夕・夜のモブ配置確認用です。
※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Select a character to accompany you in addition to Van/Risette.
engSearchText:
★DEBUG: Select a character to accompany you
in addition to Van/Risette.
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：ヴァン・リゼットに加えて 連れて行くメンバーを選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：ヴァン・リゼットに加えて
連れて行くメンバーを選んでください。

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Select a character to accompany you in addition to Van/Risette.
engSearchText:
★DEBUG: Select a character to accompany you
in addition to Van/Risette.
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：ヴァン・リゼットに加えて 連れて行くメンバーを選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：ヴァン・リゼットに加えて
連れて行くメンバーを選んでください。

engChrName: We had some damage to our company vehicles in the attack, but outside of that, we got off really light.
engSearchText:
We had some damage to our company vehicles in the
attack, but outside of that, we got off really light.
jpnChrName: 昨日の襲撃で……幸いうちの会社は社用車を 壊されただけで済みましたが……
jpnSearchText:
昨日の襲撃で……幸いうちの会社は社用車を
壊されただけで済みましたが……

engChrName: I heard a lot of other companies weren't so lucky. The institute got hit hard, too...
engSearchText:
I heard a lot of other companies weren't so lucky.
The institute got hit hard, too...
jpnChrName: やはり、関連会社の中には甚大な被害を 受けたところもあるようで、大学も……
jpnSearchText:
やはり、関連会社の中には甚大な被害を
受けたところもあるようで、大学も……

engChrName: We're still pretty much at capacity, so it's our duty to step up and help the others get on their feet.
engSearchText:
We're still pretty much at capacity, so it's our duty to
step up and help the others get on their feet.
jpnChrName: ……うちのような被害が少なかった会社は 率先して復旧のための力にならねばなりません。
jpnSearchText:
……うちのような被害が少なかった会社は
率先して復旧のための力にならねばなりません。

engChrName: And I wanna make sure Cindy can feel safe out on the streets again...!
engSearchText:
And I wanna make sure Cindy can feel safe out on
the streets again...!
jpnChrName: シンディちゃんを含めて、被害に遭った人を少しでも 安心させるためにも、私も頑張ります……！
jpnSearchText:
シンディちゃんを含めて、被害に遭った人を少しでも
安心させるためにも、私も頑張ります……！

engChrName: Did you end up finding that roaming café?
engSearchText: Did you end up finding that roaming café?
jpnChrName: 移動カフェの方は見つかりましたか？
jpnSearchText: 移動カフェの方は見つかりましたか？

engChrName: It's a pain tracking that place down, but their coffee really is worth it.
engSearchText:
It's a pain tracking that place down, but their coffee
really is worth it.
jpnChrName: あそこ、探すのは大変ですけど、 コーヒーは本当に落ち着けるんですよね。
jpnSearchText:
あそこ、探すのは大変ですけど、
コーヒーは本当に落ち着けるんですよね。

engChrName: I'd love to bring Cindy there for a little coffee and chat sometime...
engSearchText:
I'd love to bring Cindy there for a little coffee and
chat sometime...
jpnChrName: できれば近いうちに……シンディちゃんも 連れて行って、話聞いてあげないと……
jpnSearchText:
できれば近いうちに……シンディちゃんも
連れて行って、話聞いてあげないと……

engChrName: I got in touch with Cindy for the first time in a while...
engSearchText:
I got in touch with Cindy for the first time in
a while...
jpnChrName: 久しぶりにシンディちゃんと 連絡できましたけど……
jpnSearchText:
久しぶりにシンディちゃんと
連絡できましたけど……

engChrName: Goddess almighty, it makes me sick to hear what that professor put her through...
engSearchText:
Goddess almighty, it makes me sick to hear what that
professor put her through...
jpnChrName: まさかあの教授にそんな酷い目に 遭わせられていたなんて……
jpnSearchText:
まさかあの教授にそんな酷い目に
遭わせられていたなんて……

engChrName: They said it was because she was the only woman in that lab, but...that's no excuse at all. Her health really suffered because of it.
engSearchText:
They said it was because she was the only woman in
that lab, but...that's no excuse at all. Her health really
suffered because of it.
jpnChrName: 体調の事も……他に女性がいない 研究室だからって、そんな……
jpnSearchText:
体調の事も……他に女性がいない
研究室だからって、そんな……

engChrName: Anyway... Maybe I'll buy something from the drug store as a little pick-me-up.
engSearchText:
Anyway... Maybe I'll buy something from the drug
store as a little pick-me-up.
jpnChrName: とりあえず……ドラッグストアで何か、 差し入れを買って行ってあげますか。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず……ドラッグストアで何か、
差し入れを買って行ってあげますか。

engChrName: Another slog at work today. Just gonna head home, decompress, and get ready for tomorrow.
engSearchText:
Another slog at work today. Just gonna head home,
decompress, and get ready for tomorrow.
jpnChrName: さて、今日も仕事は手応えがあった事だし、 ここらで帰って明日に備えるとしますか。
jpnSearchText:
さて、今日も仕事は手応えがあった事だし、
ここらで帰って明日に備えるとしますか。

engChrName: I used to have this drinking buddy, she works at the institute. I haven't been able to get in touch with her lately, though...
engSearchText:
I used to have this drinking buddy, she works at
the institute. I haven't been able to get in touch with
her lately, though...
jpnChrName: ……前は大学の研究員の子と飲みに行く事も 多かったけど、最近は音沙汰無くて……
jpnSearchText:
……前は大学の研究員の子と飲みに行く事も
多かったけど、最近は音沙汰無くて……

engChrName: Because of that, I don't go out drinking as much anymore...but I miss that. I miss my drinking buddy. She won't even reply to my emails...
engSearchText:
Because of that, I don't go out drinking as much
anymore...but I miss that. I miss my drinking buddy.
She won't even reply to my emails...
jpnChrName: お陰で生活リズムは良くなったけど…… 流石にメールの返信すら無いのは心配かな……
jpnSearchText:
お陰で生活リズムは良くなったけど……
流石にメールの返信すら無いのは心配かな……

engChrName: Workplace harassment is a very real thing. My friend had just this terrible boss at her job...
engSearchText:
Workplace harassment is a very real thing. My friend
had just this terrible boss at her job...
jpnChrName: パワハラがあるっていうのは本当よ。 私の友人がまさに被害に遭ってるんだから。
jpnSearchText:
パワハラがあるっていうのは本当よ。
私の友人がまさに被害に遭ってるんだから。

engChrName: And you can't speak up about it, because who are you compared to a big, world-renowned professor?
engSearchText:
And you can't speak up about it, because who are you
compared to a big, world-renowned professor?
jpnChrName: でも……皆怖がって教授の事を 悪くは言えないんじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
でも……皆怖がって教授の事を
悪くは言えないんじゃない？

engChrName: That's the thing with the Institute of Science. People see all the amazing things those scientists do, and they look up to them. They're their idols.
engSearchText:
That's the thing with the Institute of Science.
People see all the amazing things those scientists do,
and they look up to them. They're their idols.
jpnChrName: 理科大学って高名な教授ばっかりだし。 教授に憧れて入学する人ばっかりだからね。
jpnSearchText:
理科大学って高名な教授ばっかりだし。
教授に憧れて入学する人ばっかりだからね。

engChrName: Whew... Been really busy lately, but I gotta stick the landing. Now's my chance to make a name for myself!
engSearchText:
Whew... Been really busy lately, but I gotta stick
the landing. Now's my chance to make a name
for myself!
jpnChrName: ふう、最近は忙しいけど踏ん張りどころかな。 今こそが実績上げるチャンスってところだし。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、最近は忙しいけど踏ん張りどころかな。
今こそが実績上げるチャンスってところだし。

engChrName: I refuse to lose to the guys! I'm gonna smash that glass ceiling and make the board of directors, just you watch!
engSearchText:
I refuse to lose to the guys! I'm gonna smash that
glass ceiling and make the board of directors, just
you watch!
jpnChrName: いつまでも、男どもに負けていられますか。 絶対に本社取締役に上り詰めてやるんですから！
jpnSearchText:
いつまでも、男どもに負けていられますか。
絶対に本社取締役に上り詰めてやるんですから！

engChrName: (Ah. She's an office worker in New Town...)
engSearchText: (Ah. She's an office worker in New Town...)
jpnChrName: （新市街に勤めてるＯＬの方のようですが……）
jpnSearchText: （新市街に勤めてるＯＬの方のようですが……）

engChrName: (Average Joes like her can have better info than meets the eye.)
engSearchText:
(Average Joes like her can have better info than meets
the eye.)
jpnChrName: （意外とこういう所から  	いい情報が出て来る事もあるんだよな。）
jpnSearchText:
（意外とこういう所から
いい情報が出て来る事もあるんだよな。）

engChrName: (Let's talk to her and see what we get.)
engSearchText: (Let's talk to her and see what we get.)
jpnChrName: （試しに聞いてみるとするか。）
jpnSearchText: （試しに聞いてみるとするか。）

engChrName: Man... I can't blame them for locking down the city after the attack, but it still really sucks.
engSearchText:
Man... I can't blame them for locking down the city
after the attack, but it still really sucks.
jpnChrName: 襲撃事件だけでも痛手なのに、まさか 政府の指示で都市封鎖とはな……
jpnSearchText:
襲撃事件だけでも痛手なのに、まさか
政府の指示で都市封鎖とはな……

engChrName: We really cleaned up our act over the last two years and made the city a safer place—that's how we were able to attract so much investment.
engSearchText:
We really cleaned up our act over the last two years
and made the city a safer place—that's how we were
able to attract so much investment.
jpnChrName: この二年間の経済成長は、戦争やテロの 危機が無いから投資が活発だった側面もある。
jpnSearchText:
この二年間の経済成長は、戦争やテロの
危機が無いから投資が活発だった側面もある。

engChrName: But if we're not a safe city anymore... Well, maybe the bank's gonna rethink their business strategy here.
engSearchText:
But if we're not a safe city anymore... Well, maybe
the bank's gonna rethink their business strategy here.
jpnChrName: それが破られたとなると……いよいよ銀行も、 資産運用の方向性を練り直すべきかもな……
jpnSearchText:
それが破られたとなると……いよいよ銀行も、
資産運用の方向性を練り直すべきかもな……

engChrName: It might be time to assetize some of our investments and switch to a more conservative portfolio...
engSearchText:
It might be time to assetize some of our investments
and switch to a more conservative portfolio...
jpnChrName: 積極的な投資よりも、資産の確実な保護と 経済の引き締めと言った方面に……
jpnSearchText:
積極的な投資よりも、資産の確実な保護と
経済の引き締めと言った方面に……

engChrName: Hmm... I got this report from the main branch that one of their terminals was acting up.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I got this report from the main branch that
one of their terminals was acting up.
jpnChrName: ふむ……うちの銀行支店から 導力端末の調子がおかしいと報告があってね……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……うちの銀行支店から
導力端末の調子がおかしいと報告があってね……

engChrName: I'm not sure what that's all about, but I hope it's just a technical gremlin and not a serious problem.
engSearchText:
I'm not sure what that's all about, but I hope it's just a
technical gremlin and not a serious problem.
jpnChrName: なんだか要領を得ないが 業務に支障はないって事でいいんだよな……？
jpnSearchText:
なんだか要領を得ないが
業務に支障はないって事でいいんだよな……？

engChrName: But any downtime at all is bad business and bad optics. We'd better get it back up, and fast, or we'll lose more than just money.
engSearchText:
But any downtime at all is bad business and
bad optics. We'd better get it back up, and fast, or
we'll lose more than just money.
jpnChrName: 我々としてもこれからが正念場だ。 導力端末が使えないんじゃ話にならないからな。
jpnSearchText:
我々としてもこれからが正念場だ。
導力端末が使えないんじゃ話にならないからな。

engChrName: Domestic production is riding high right now— Verne especially. They're trying to secure their foothold in the sector as fast as possible.
engSearchText:
Domestic production is riding high right now—
Verne especially. They're trying to secure their
foothold in the sector as fast as possible.
jpnChrName: 今のところ、ヴェルヌ系列を筆頭に 共和国の企業は好景気に沸いているが……
jpnSearchText:
今のところ、ヴェルヌ系列を筆頭に
共和国の企業は好景気に沸いているが……

engChrName: The Empire's reparations will end soon, and Reinford is on the up and up, too. There's gonna be lots of competition soon.
engSearchText:
The Empire's reparations will end soon, and Reinford
is on the up and up, too. There's gonna be lots of
competition soon.
jpnChrName: 帝国の賠償ももうじき終わるし、向こうの ＲＦグループも業績を回復しつつある。
jpnSearchText:
帝国の賠償ももうじき終わるし、向こうの
ＲＦグループも業績を回復しつつある。

engChrName: So it's no wonder that domestic companies are trying to secure domestic cash flows. I think the bank should follow suit.
engSearchText:
So it's no wonder that domestic companies are trying
to secure domestic cash flows. I think the bank should
follow suit.
jpnChrName: そろそろ各企業も、内部留保の確保を 優先すべき頃合いだと思うが……
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ各企業も、内部留保の確保を
優先すべき頃合いだと思うが……

engChrName: The CEO, Tausend, he's pretty conservative...but even he doesn't know what direction he wants the company to take.
engSearchText:
The CEO, Tausend, he's pretty conservative...but
even he doesn't know what direction he wants the
company to take.
jpnChrName: 保守的なはずのタウゼントＣＥＯでさえ そこに舵を切らないとはな……
jpnSearchText:
保守的なはずのタウゼントＣＥＯでさえ
そこに舵を切らないとはな……

engChrName: Being honest, I think that's his glaring weakness: for a CEO, he doesn't have much in the way of leadership.
engSearchText:
Being honest, I think that's his glaring weakness: for
a CEO, he doesn't have much in the way
of leadership.
jpnChrName: タウゼントＣＥＯは正直、さしたる信念も 無いように見受けられる御仁だからな。
jpnSearchText:
タウゼントＣＥＯは正直、さしたる信念も
無いように見受けられる御仁だからな。

engChrName: Feels like he's scared of losing the government's favor—and all of his corporate partnerships with it.
engSearchText:
Feels like he's scared of losing the government's
favor—and all of his corporate partnerships with it.
jpnChrName: 恐らくは政府方面の受注への影響と、 関連企業から支持を失う事を恐れているんだ。
jpnSearchText:
恐らくは政府方面の受注への影響と、
関連企業から支持を失う事を恐れているんだ。

engChrName: Bearing all that in mind, I can see why he's just staying the course here. Don't rock the boat, and all.
engSearchText:
Bearing all that in mind, I can see why he's just
staying the course here. Don't rock the boat, and all.
jpnChrName: そう考えれば、彼があの性格で内部留保よりも 現状の投資を優先するのも納得がいく。
jpnSearchText:
そう考えれば、彼があの性格で内部留保よりも
現状の投資を優先するのも納得がいく。

engChrName: So, that brings us to an interesting question: how does the Bank of Edith invest in Basel going forward...?
engSearchText:
So, that brings us to an interesting question: how
does the Bank of Edith invest in Basel going
forward...?
jpnChrName: さて、バンクオブイーディスとしては今後の バーゼルの融資をどうしたものか……
jpnSearchText:
さて、バンクオブイーディスとしては今後の
バーゼルの融資をどうしたものか……

engChrName: The market's shifted heavily toward state-sponsored development. Venture capital isn't as big a player anymore.
engSearchText:
The market's shifted heavily toward
state-sponsored development. Venture capital isn't as
big a player anymore.
jpnChrName: 国家事業の比重が高い現行の開発体制を考えると、 ベンチャー系への融資は多少絞るのも手か。
jpnSearchText:
国家事業の比重が高い現行の開発体制を考えると、
ベンチャー系への融資は多少絞るのも手か。

engChrName: But we still shouldn't put all our eggs in that one basket. Balance is key.
engSearchText:
But we still shouldn't put all our eggs in that
one basket. Balance is key.
jpnChrName: その場合は首都などの方で、バランスは 取ってもらう必要はあるだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
その場合は首都などの方で、バランスは
取ってもらう必要はあるだろうが。

engChrName: With reparations drying up, the tides are soon to change. Now might be the time to future-proof our investment portfolio.
engSearchText:
With reparations drying up, the tides are soon
to change. Now might be the time to future-proof
our investment portfolio.
jpnChrName: とはいえ……賠償金の終了後を考えると 少しは新しいビジネスモデルも育てるべきか。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ……賠償金の終了後を考えると
少しは新しいビジネスモデルも育てるべきか。

engChrName: The guys at Dad's workshop have been teaching me about what parts do and how to mod stuff. It's really cool!
engSearchText:
The guys at Dad's workshop have been teaching me
about what parts do and how to mod stuff. It's
really cool!
jpnChrName: 一応、お父さんの工房の人たちに マシンの構造とか改造は教えて貰ってるけどね。
jpnSearchText:
一応、お父さんの工房の人たちに
マシンの構造とか改造は教えて貰ってるけどね。

engChrName: But modding an RC car to be faster is kinda lame, so I keep it stock. I wanna win fair and square!
engSearchText:
But modding an RC car to be faster is kinda lame, so
I keep it stock. I wanna win fair and square!
jpnChrName: やっぱりＲＣ大会は運転の技術とかを競うものだし、 カスタム無しで出るようにしてるんだー。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱりＲＣ大会は運転の技術とかを競うものだし、
カスタム無しで出るようにしてるんだー。

engChrName: Oookay, all my errands are done! I should get back home before Dad starts to worry about me.
engSearchText:
Oookay, all my errands are done! I should get back
home before Dad starts to worry about me.
jpnChrName: さーて、お使いも終わったし帰ろうかな。 遅いとパパも工房の人たちも心配するし。
jpnSearchText:
さーて、お使いも終わったし帰ろうかな。
遅いとパパも工房の人たちも心配するし。

engChrName: But man, why did Dick get so angry back there?
engSearchText: But man, why did Dick get so angry back there?
jpnChrName: それにしても……ディック君、 何であんなにムキになっているんだろう……？
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……ディック君、
何であんなにムキになっているんだろう……？

engChrName: Playing with RC cars is supposed to be fun, so what's his problem?
engSearchText:
Playing with RC cars is supposed to be fun, so what's
his problem?
jpnChrName: ＲＣなんて、楽しみながら 遊ぶのが一番なのに……
jpnSearchText:
ＲＣなんて、楽しみながら
遊ぶのが一番なのに……

engChrName: Huh? What'cha doing there?
engSearchText: Huh? What'cha doing there?
jpnChrName: あれ、ディックこんなところで 何をしているの？
jpnSearchText:
あれ、ディックこんなところで
何をしているの？

engChrName: What's with all the nuts and bolts there...? Oh, are you modding your car?
engSearchText:
What's with all the nuts and bolts there...? Oh, are
you modding your car?
jpnChrName: それは……モーターとバネ？ もしかしてラジコンカーを改造するの？
jpnSearchText:
それは……モーターとバネ？
もしかしてラジコンカーを改造するの？

engChrName: Modding sounds so...illegal! I'm just tuning it!
engSearchText: Modding sounds so...illegal! I'm just tuning it!
jpnChrName: 改造って言うと如何わしい響きだ、 カスタムと言えカスタムと！
jpnSearchText:
改造って言うと如何わしい響きだ、
カスタムと言えカスタムと！

engChrName: I can't beat you just by being a better driver. I need a better car, too!
engSearchText:
I can't beat you just by being a better driver. I need a
better car, too!
jpnChrName: お前に勝つためなら運転テクだけじゃねぇ、 相棒のマシンも一緒に高めていかないとな！
jpnSearchText:
お前に勝つためなら運転テクだけじゃねぇ、
相棒のマシンも一緒に高めていかないとな！

engChrName: ...Well, you're not very good at 'tuning' either, though.
engSearchText:
...Well, you're not very good at 'tuning'
either, though.
jpnChrName: でもディック、そういう手作業は 不器用で苦手じゃなかったっけ？
jpnSearchText:
でもディック、そういう手作業は
不器用で苦手じゃなかったっけ？

engChrName: Remember when you tried to fix the radio that one time?
engSearchText:
Remember when you tried to fix the radio that
one time?
jpnChrName: 前にもラジオを直そうとして……
jpnSearchText: 前にもラジオを直そうとして……

engChrName: Sh-Shut up! You said you wouldn't talk about that again!
engSearchText:
Sh-Shut up! You said you wouldn't talk about
that again!
jpnChrName: う……そ、その話はしない約束だろ！
jpnSearchText: う……そ、その話はしない約束だろ！

engChrName: And besides, your dad's workshop has been helping you with your car, too, haven't they?
engSearchText:
And besides, your dad's workshop has been helping
you with your car, too, haven't they?
jpnChrName: とにかく、お前も工房で色々と カスタム手伝ってもらってるだろ？
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、お前も工房で色々と
カスタム手伝ってもらってるだろ？

engChrName: It's only fair I get to work on mine!
engSearchText: It's only fair I get to work on mine!
jpnChrName: ならこれも公平のためってヤツだ！
jpnSearchText: ならこれも公平のためってヤツだ！

engChrName: Umm... No? I don't mod my cars one bit, I thought I told you that.
engSearchText:
Umm... No? I don't mod my cars one bit, I thought I
told you that.
jpnChrName: あれ、言ってなかったっけ？ 私、大会で使うマシンは全く改造してないよ？
jpnSearchText:
あれ、言ってなかったっけ？
私、大会で使うマシンは全く改造してないよ？

engChrName: Wait, you don't? Then how do they just... You really just drive them that good?
engSearchText:
Wait, you don't? Then how do they just... You really
just drive them that good?
jpnChrName: え、マジ……？　カスタム無しであの動き……？
jpnSearchText: え、マジ……？　カスタム無しであの動き……？

engChrName: Yup! What's the point in buying a win when you can earn it instead?
engSearchText:
Yup! What's the point in buying a win when you can
earn it instead?
jpnChrName: うん、やっぱりああいう場所では 自分の技量だけで戦った方が面白いしねー。
jpnSearchText:
うん、やっぱりああいう場所では
自分の技量だけで戦った方が面白いしねー。

engChrName: You're telling me I never stood a chance? All things equal, she still beats me...
engSearchText:
You're telling me I never stood a chance? All things
equal, she still beats me...
jpnChrName: マジかよ……条件が同じでも 勝てなかったってのかよ……
jpnSearchText:
マジかよ……条件が同じでも
勝てなかったってのかよ……

engChrName: Even our station got shot up. We got lots of casualties over here... I dread to imagine a second attack.
engSearchText:
Even our station got shot up. We got lots of casualties
over here... I dread to imagine a second attack.
jpnChrName: 昨日の襲撃では署内でも重傷者が…… もしあんな連中が再び襲撃してきたら……
jpnSearchText:
昨日の襲撃では署内でも重傷者が……
もしあんな連中が再び襲撃してきたら……

engChrName: I guess we can't complain about that PMC stepping in to restore order, with our guys all banged up.
engSearchText:
I guess we can't complain about that PMC stepping
in to restore order, with our guys all banged up.
jpnChrName: その意味では、例の民間警備会社が警備を 担ってくれるのは、正直助かる……
jpnSearchText:
その意味では、例の民間警備会社が警備を
担ってくれるのは、正直助かる……

engChrName: ...They really rub me the wrong way, though. They got all that strength with no state backing... Freaks me out.
engSearchText:
...They really rub me the wrong way, though.
They got all that strength with no state backing...
Freaks me out.
jpnChrName: ……国家でもない一企業があれほどの戦力を 持っているという事実にはゾッとするがな。
jpnSearchText:
……国家でもない一企業があれほどの戦力を
持っているという事実にはゾッとするがな。

engChrName: The stuff Almata has is just wild... Never expected they'd bust out combat mechs.
engSearchText:
The stuff Almata has is just wild... Never expected
they'd bust out combat mechs.
jpnChrName: それにしてもアルマータ……よもや 機械仕掛けの兵器を投入してくるとは……
jpnSearchText:
それにしてもアルマータ……よもや
機械仕掛けの兵器を投入してくるとは……

engChrName: They could be a real problem if kept unchecked. We don't even know where in Basel they're operating out of.
engSearchText:
They could be a real problem if kept unchecked.
We don't even know where in Basel they're operating
out of.
jpnChrName: 想像していた以上に底の知れない連中だ…… バーゼルにおけるアジトもまだ掴めていない。
jpnSearchText:
想像していた以上に底の知れない連中だ……
バーゼルにおけるアジトもまだ掴めていない。

engChrName: ...I hate it, but I gotta just swallow my pride on this one. We gotta get the CID and that PMC in here—we need all the help we can get.
engSearchText:
...I hate it, but I gotta just swallow my pride on
this one. We gotta get the CID and that PMC in
here—we need all the help we can get.
jpnChrName: 警察としては情けないが……ＣＩＤや 民間警備会社を頼りにする他無さそうだな……
jpnSearchText:
警察としては情けないが……ＣＩＤや
民間警備会社を頼りにする他無さそうだな……

engChrName: We're actively searching for Callaghan, but it looks like the CID's already on the move themselves.
engSearchText:
We're actively searching for Callaghan, but it looks
like the CID's already on the move themselves.
jpnChrName: キャラハン氏は警察でも捜索しているが、 ＣＩＤも既に動いているようでな……
jpnSearchText:
キャラハン氏は警察でも捜索しているが、
ＣＩＤも既に動いているようでな……

engChrName: The fact they're showin' up means this ain't your everyday incident... There's gotta be more to this.
engSearchText:
The fact they're showin' up means this ain't your
everyday incident... There's gotta be more to this.
jpnChrName: 彼らが出張ってきているということは、 ただの事件ではないのだろうか……？
jpnSearchText:
彼らが出張ってきているということは、
ただの事件ではないのだろうか……？

engChrName: I hate entrusting things to them, but we're in no position to turn 'em down.
engSearchText:
I hate entrusting things to them, but we're in no
position to turn 'em down.
jpnChrName: 彼らに采配を委ねるのはやや情けないが…… ふう、まあ致し方あるまい。
jpnSearchText:
彼らに采配を委ねるのはやや情けないが……
ふう、まあ致し方あるまい。

engChrName: We've been getting reports over the last few days about comms acting up.
engSearchText:
We've been getting reports over the last few days
about comms acting up.
jpnChrName: ここ数日、導力供給や通信の不調が、 何件か報告されているらしい。
jpnSearchText:
ここ数日、導力供給や通信の不調が、
何件か報告されているらしい。

engChrName: But so far, they're just little blips. We haven't seen any big outages yet, so there's not much we can do but keep watch.
engSearchText:
But so far, they're just little blips. We haven't seen
any big outages yet, so there's not much we can do
but keep watch.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、生活や産業に影響もさほど無いし、 警察としても様子見をする他無いが……
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、生活や産業に影響もさほど無いし、
警察としても様子見をする他無いが……

engChrName: It's got me thinking about how behind the curve the force is, though. Cyber crime's only gonna grow from here—we gotta be ready for it.
engSearchText:
It's got me thinking about how behind the curve the
force is, though. Cyber crime's only gonna grow from
here—we gotta be ready for it.
jpnChrName: 最近はサイバー犯罪などもあるようだし、多少は 警察も技術方面に慣れるべきかもしれないなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
最近はサイバー犯罪などもあるようだし、多少は
警察も技術方面に慣れるべきかもしれないなぁ。

engChrName: You guys visiting? Don't you worry, this city's plenty safe.
engSearchText:
You guys visiting? Don't you worry, this city's
plenty safe.
jpnChrName: おや、君達は旅行者かね。 この街は治安も良いから安心したまえ。
jpnSearchText:
おや、君達は旅行者かね。
この街は治安も良いから安心したまえ。

engChrName: We were pretty swamped in the war... Imperial spies were crawling all over the place, trying to steal tech.
engSearchText:
We were pretty swamped in the war... Imperial spies
were crawling all over the place, trying to steal tech.
jpnChrName: まあ、大戦の直前には技術情報を狙った 帝国のスパイも入ってきて、対応に追われたが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、大戦の直前には技術情報を狙った
帝国のスパイも入ってきて、対応に追われたが……

engChrName: But we kicked 'em out. All that's behind us now, so we can get back to keeping the peace.
engSearchText:
But we kicked 'em out. All that's behind us now, so
we can get back to keeping the peace.
jpnChrName: 今ではその心配も無いからな。 我々も改めてこの平穏を守りたいところだ。
jpnSearchText:
今ではその心配も無いからな。
我々も改めてこの平穏を守りたいところだ。

engChrName: The aerotrams were hit in the attack, too... It was a real headache, trying to survey the damage and loop back with safety officials.
engSearchText:
The aerotrams were hit in the attack, too... It was a
real headache, trying to survey the damage and loop
back with safety officials.
jpnChrName: エアロトラムも被害を受け…… 修理と点検で手一杯だったのですが……
jpnSearchText:
エアロトラムも被害を受け……
修理と点検で手一杯だったのですが……

engChrName: We've just now gotten them back online.
engSearchText: We've just now gotten them back online.
jpnChrName: 先ほどようやく復旧する事ができました。
jpnSearchText: 先ほどようやく復旧する事ができました。

engChrName: The aerotrams are the backbone of the city's transport network. We need to keep them online, no matter what.
engSearchText:
The aerotrams are the backbone of the city's
transport network. We need to keep them online, no
matter what.
jpnChrName: この街のインフラとして欠かせない存在── 私たちも気を引き締めて当たる所存です。
jpnSearchText:
この街のインフラとして欠かせない存在──
私たちも気を引き締めて当たる所存です。

engChrName: I heard news of an incident at the Institute... The police were asking around for information and eyewitness reports.
engSearchText:
I heard news of an incident at the Institute...
The police were asking around for information and
eyewitness reports.
jpnChrName: 大学の方で事件があったようで…… 警察の人から情報提供を呼びかけられました。
jpnSearchText:
大学の方で事件があったようで……
警察の人から情報提供を呼びかけられました。

engChrName: We have logs of everybody's aerotram trips from their certification cards—you scan it to get on and off.
engSearchText:
We have logs of everybody's aerotram trips from their
certification cards—you scan it to get on and off.
jpnChrName: エアロトラム運営では、認証カードによって 個人の利用記録が確認できますからね。
jpnSearchText:
エアロトラム運営では、認証カードによって
個人の利用記録が確認できますからね。

engChrName: But we couldn't find anything that might relate to the incident. I'm sorry we couldn't be any help...
engSearchText:
But we couldn't find anything that might relate to
the incident. I'm sorry we couldn't be any help...
jpnChrName: けれど捜査に関わる件の記録はなく…… お力になれず申し訳ないです。
jpnSearchText:
けれど捜査に関わる件の記録はなく……
お力になれず申し訳ないです。

engChrName: We don't run as many aerotrams at night, but we're still online for your convenience.
engSearchText:
We don't run as many aerotrams at night, but we're
still online for your convenience.
jpnChrName: 夜間ですので便は減っておりますが、 現在もエアロトラムは運行中です。
jpnSearchText:
夜間ですので便は減っておりますが、
現在もエアロトラムは運行中です。

engChrName: At this time of night, it's mostly workers at the Institute coming home from work.
engSearchText:
At this time of night, it's mostly workers at the
Institute coming home from work.
jpnChrName: この時間帯ですと、大学の方から帰宅される 方が多くご利用になっていますね。
jpnSearchText:
この時間帯ですと、大学の方から帰宅される
方が多くご利用になっていますね。

engChrName: Oh, looks like you've ranked up your card.
engSearchText: Oh, looks like you've ranked up your card.
jpnChrName: おや……カードのランクが 更新されておりますね。
jpnSearchText:
おや……カードのランクが
更新されておりますね。

engChrName: Now that you're C-rank, you can use this aerotram here. Just slide your card and go right on through.
engSearchText:
Now that you're C-rank, you can use this
aerotram here. Just slide your card and go right
on through.
jpnChrName: Ｃランクでしたら、ご利用が可能ですよ。 ゲートにかざして通過してくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
Ｃランクでしたら、ご利用が可能ですよ。
ゲートにかざして通過してくださいね。

engChrName: It's not every day I see someone's certification card get ranked up... Neat.
engSearchText:
It's not every day I see someone's certification card
get ranked up... Neat.
jpnChrName: それにしても……カードのランクが 更新されるなんて、珍しいですね。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……カードのランクが
更新されるなんて、珍しいですね。

engChrName: Welcome to the aerotram platform. I see you have a C-rank certification card.
engSearchText:
Welcome to the aerotram platform. I see you have a
C-rank certification card.
jpnChrName: エアロトラム乗り場へようこそ、 お客様のカードはＣランクですね。
jpnSearchText:
エアロトラム乗り場へようこそ、
お客様のカードはＣランクですね。

engChrName: Go ahead and slide the card there, and you'll be free to board.
engSearchText:
Go ahead and slide the card there, and you'll be free
to board.
jpnChrName: でしたらご利用が可能ですよ。 ゲートにかざして通過してくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
でしたらご利用が可能ですよ。
ゲートにかざして通過してくださいね。

engChrName: Your trip will take roughly seven minutes. We hope you enjoy.
engSearchText:
Your trip will take roughly seven minutes. We hope
you enjoy.
jpnChrName: 所要時間、約７分……エアロトラムによる 空の旅をどうぞお楽しみくださいませ。
jpnSearchText:
所要時間、約７分……エアロトラムによる
空の旅をどうぞお楽しみくださいませ。

engChrName: Welcome to the aerotram platform, offering service throughout Basel and its facilities.
engSearchText:
Welcome to the aerotram platform, offering service
throughout Basel and its facilities.
jpnChrName: エアロトラム乗り場へようこそ、 搭乗をご希望ですか？
jpnSearchText:
エアロトラム乗り場へようこそ、
搭乗をご希望ですか？

engChrName: You have a...D-rank certification card, I see. I'm sorry, but this aerotram is unavailable to D-rank riders.
engSearchText:
You have a...D-rank certification card, I see.
I'm sorry, but this aerotram is unavailable to
D-rank riders.
jpnChrName: お客様のカードは……Ｄランクですね。 となると、エアロトラムはご利用いただけません。
jpnSearchText:
お客様のカードは……Ｄランクですね。
となると、エアロトラムはご利用いただけません。

engChrName: My apologies, but for safety purposes, we cannot permit you to board.
engSearchText:
My apologies, but for safety purposes, we cannot
permit you to board.
jpnChrName: 申し訳ないですが、これも安全対策の一環でして。
jpnSearchText: 申し訳ないですが、これも安全対策の一環でして。

engChrName: With your rank, you're free to use our inner-city aerotrams for hassle-free travel.
engSearchText:
With your rank, you're free to use our inner-city
aerotrams for hassle-free travel.
jpnChrName: お客様のカードのランクでしたら、 エアロトラムで各街区を移動していただけます。
jpnSearchText:
お客様のカードのランクでしたら、
エアロトラムで各街区を移動していただけます。

engChrName: Please mind the gap, and watch your hands and feet as you board the aerotram.
engSearchText:
Please mind the gap, and watch your hands and feet
as you board the aerotram.
jpnChrName: どうぞ、エアロトラムにご乗車ください。 足元にはお気を付けくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
どうぞ、エアロトラムにご乗車ください。
足元にはお気を付けくださいね。

engChrName: So, you need the blueprints for the core actuator?
engSearchText: So, you need the blueprints for the core actuator?
jpnChrName: えっと、導力ジェネレーターに使われている コアアクチュエーターの設計図……？
jpnSearchText:
えっと、導力ジェネレーターに使われている
コアアクチュエーターの設計図……？

engChrName: Yes, they should be at Foundation HQ. We co-developed that with Verne, you see.
engSearchText:
Yes, they should be at Foundation HQ.
We co-developed that with Verne, you see.
jpnChrName: ええ、財団支部にありますよ。 ヴェルヌ社と共同開発した物ですし。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、財団支部にありますよ。
ヴェルヌ社と共同開発した物ですし。

engChrName: Whoa, for real?! We get that and the repairs'll be a cinch!
engSearchText:
Whoa, for real?! We get that and the repairs'll be
a cinch!
jpnChrName: マジかよ兄ちゃん、 そいつがありゃあ復旧も捗るぜ！
jpnSearchText:
マジかよ兄ちゃん、
そいつがありゃあ復旧も捗るぜ！

engChrName: You wouldn't happen to also have a grid map for Factory 3, would you?
engSearchText:
You wouldn't happen to also have a grid map for
Factory 3, would you?
jpnChrName: ついでに第三工業プラントの 配線図もあったりしねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ついでに第三工業プラントの
配線図もあったりしねえか？

engChrName: I reached out to Verne about that, but they're giving me the run around.
engSearchText:
I reached out to Verne about that, but they're giving
me the run around.
jpnChrName: ヴェルヌに問い合わせても どうも反応が鈍くてな……
jpnSearchText:
ヴェルヌに問い合わせても
どうも反応が鈍くてな……

engChrName: E-Er, yes, actually! I remember some ten years ago, I... A-At any rate, I'll get that to you as soon as I can!
engSearchText:
E-Er, yes, actually! I remember some ten years
ago, I... A-At any rate, I'll get that to you as soon as
I can!
jpnChrName: え、ええ、確か十年ほど前に 関わっていた事が──すぐに探します！
jpnSearchText:
え、ええ、確か十年ほど前に
関わっていた事が──すぐに探します！

engChrName: I-I'm not sure I follow, but I'll see what I can do!
engSearchText: I-I'm not sure I follow, but I'll see what I can do!
jpnChrName: な、なんだかよく分かりませんが…… 自分にも力になれる事がありそうです！
jpnSearchText:
な、なんだかよく分かりませんが……
自分にも力になれる事がありそうです！

engChrName: The city needs us all. We have to do what we can to help!
engSearchText:
The city needs us all. We have to do what we can
to help!
jpnChrName: 街もこんな状況ですし…… できる事をしないとですね……！
jpnSearchText:
街もこんな状況ですし……
できる事をしないとですね……！

engChrName: I'm from Leman, you see—it's a nation rich with lakes and gorges.
engSearchText:
I'm from Leman, you see—it's a nation rich with
lakes and gorges.
jpnChrName: 私の故郷、レマン自治州は 峡谷や水辺が豊富でしてね。
jpnSearchText:
私の故郷、レマン自治州は
峡谷や水辺が豊富でしてね。

engChrName: Thus fishing is a popular hobby there. I started early, myself.
engSearchText:
Thus fishing is a popular hobby there. I started
early, myself.
jpnChrName: 幼い頃から釣りもやったものですよ、ええ……
jpnSearchText: 幼い頃から釣りもやったものですよ、ええ……

engChrName: I know I'm in denial. I know it's not healthy for me...
engSearchText: I know I'm in denial. I know it's not healthy for me...
jpnChrName: ……こんな事したって現実逃避なのは 分かってますが……でも……
jpnSearchText:
……こんな事したって現実逃避なのは
分かってますが……でも……

engChrName: ...but the truth hurts more. *sigh*
engSearchText: ...but the truth hurts more. *sigh*
jpnChrName: 現実がどうしようもないんですもん…… はぁぁぁ……
jpnSearchText:
現実がどうしようもないんですもん……
はぁぁぁ……

engChrName: I'm conducting research into the unexplained reactions we observe when drawing energy from sepith.
engSearchText:
I'm conducting research into the unexplained
reactions we observe when drawing energy
from sepith.
jpnChrName: 私は七耀石から導力を取り出す際の エネルギープロセスを研究していたんです。
jpnSearchText:
私は七耀石から導力を取り出す際の
エネルギープロセスを研究していたんです。

engChrName: It's just one of orbal power's many mysteries. That forms one of the foundation's goals: shedding light on how our modern world really works.
engSearchText:
It's just one of orbal power's many mysteries.
That forms one of the foundation's goals: shedding
light on how our modern world really works.
jpnChrName: 導力にはまだまだ未知の側面が多いのです。 それを解き明かす事こそ財団の使命だと──
jpnSearchText:
導力にはまだまだ未知の側面が多いのです。
それを解き明かす事こそ財団の使命だと──

engChrName: It certainly isn't easy, though... We have to commission these massive facilities just to analyze microscopic reactions.
engSearchText:
It certainly isn't easy, though... We have to
commission these massive facilities just to analyze
microscopic reactions.
jpnChrName: ……ですが……難易度の高い基礎研究ゆえに 大掛かりな設備がなければ分析すらできず……
jpnSearchText:
……ですが……難易度の高い基礎研究ゆえに
大掛かりな設備がなければ分析すらできず……

engChrName: *sigh* Is there really nothing I can do...? How did it come to this?
engSearchText:
*sigh* Is there really nothing I can do...? How did it
come to this?
jpnChrName: はぁぁ……やはりどうする事も…… ……どうしてこうなってしまったんだ……
jpnSearchText:
はぁぁ……やはりどうする事も……
……どうしてこうなってしまったんだ……

engChrName: We did everything we could, and it still fell through... What are we supposed to do?
engSearchText:
We did everything we could, and it still fell through...
What are we supposed to do?
jpnChrName: 私たちは精一杯やってきたつもりなのに…… どうしてこんな仕打ちを……
jpnSearchText:
私たちは精一杯やってきたつもりなのに……
どうしてこんな仕打ちを……

engChrName: ...Just listen to me. I don't even know what to do with myself anymore...
engSearchText:
...Just listen to me. I don't even know what to do
with myself anymore...
jpnChrName: ハハ……これが共和国の人間が やる事なんでしょうか…………
jpnSearchText:
ハハ……これが共和国の人間が
やる事なんでしょうか…………

engChrName: (Who is this?)
engSearchText: (Who is this?)

engChrName: (He may have information relevant to the case.)
engSearchText: (He may have information relevant to the case.)
jpnChrName: （なにか事情がおありなようですが……）
jpnSearchText: （なにか事情がおありなようですが……）

engChrName: (Yeah... I can't deny I'm curious myself.)
engSearchText: (Yeah... I can't deny I'm curious myself.)
jpnChrName: （ええ……少し気になりますが……）
jpnSearchText: （ええ……少し気になりますが……）

engChrName: I've worked here at the Epstein Foundation for years and years now.
engSearchText:
I've worked here at the Epstein Foundation for years
and years now.
jpnChrName: ……私は長く、エプスタイン財団の バーゼル支部に勤めていたんです。
jpnSearchText:
……私は長く、エプスタイン財団の
バーゼル支部に勤めていたんです。

engChrName: I remember before our 'exclusivity agreement'...
engSearchText: I remember before our 'exclusivity agreement'...
jpnChrName: ですが例の“財団外し”があり……
jpnSearchText: ですが例の“財団外し”があり……

engChrName: We ended up in patent litigation with the Verne Company... Then we were ordered to scale back our operations and move buildings.
engSearchText:
We ended up in patent litigation with the
Verne Company... Then we were ordered to scale
back our operations and move buildings.
jpnChrName: ヴェルヌ社と特許訴訟に発展した途端に 事業縮小とビルの移転を命じられたのです。
jpnSearchText:
ヴェルヌ社と特許訴訟に発展した途端に
事業縮小とビルの移転を命じられたのです。

engChrName: But that cooperation was what put Basel on the map to begin with—it was all thanks to the research that Professor Hamilton brought back with her.
engSearchText:
But that cooperation was what put Basel on the map
to begin with—it was all thanks to the research that
Professor Hamilton brought back with her.
jpnChrName: バーゼルが発展したのは、Ｌ・ハミルトン博士が 持ち帰った導力技術のお陰だというのに……
jpnSearchText:
バーゼルが発展したのは、Ｌ・ハミルトン博士が
持ち帰った導力技術のお陰だというのに……

engChrName: They can't just tear our teams apart after all the projects we developed together! It's not fair!
engSearchText:
They can't just tear our teams apart after all the
projects we developed together! It's not fair!
jpnChrName: いくつもの製品を共同開発してきたというのに ……あんまりじゃないですか……っ！
jpnSearchText:
いくつもの製品を共同開発してきたというのに
……あんまりじゃないですか……っ！

engChrName: Whew...
engSearchText: Whew...

engChrName: I had no idea... So, why? There had to have been a reason, right?
engSearchText:
I had no idea... So, why? There had to have been a
reason, right?
jpnChrName: そうだったのですね…… 何か事情がありそうですけど……
jpnSearchText:
そうだったのですね……
何か事情がありそうですけど……

engChrName: Sounds like Verne got dragged kickin' and screamin'.
engSearchText: Sounds like Verne got dragged kickin' and screamin'.
jpnChrName: ま、ヴェルヌ社単独の判断じゃねえのは 確かだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ヴェルヌ社単独の判断じゃねえのは
確かだろうな。

engChrName: But y'know, there's no point mopin' about the past. You gotta play with the hand you're dealt, yeah?
engSearchText:
But y'know, there's no point mopin' about the past.
You gotta play with the hand you're dealt, yeah?
jpnChrName: とはいえ支部は残っちゃいるんだ。 ここで何をするかはアンタ次第だろうが──
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ支部は残っちゃいるんだ。
ここで何をするかはアンタ次第だろうが──

engChrName: You're right, yes...
engSearchText: You're right, yes...
jpnChrName: ハハ……まあそうなんでしょうけどね……
jpnSearchText: ハハ……まあそうなんでしょうけどね……

engChrName: It's just difficult to stay motivated, especially when my own pet project's been stuck in limbo.
engSearchText:
It's just difficult to stay motivated, especially when my
own pet project's been stuck in limbo.
jpnChrName: 私のプロジェクトも凍結されてしまったし、 もうどうにもやる気が……
jpnSearchText:
私のプロジェクトも凍結されてしまったし、
もうどうにもやる気が……

engChrName: Sometimes I wonder if I'd be better off just finding a cabin somewhere and fishing for the rest of my days...
engSearchText:
Sometimes I wonder if I'd be better off just finding a
cabin somewhere and fishing for the rest of my days...
jpnChrName: いっそ日がな一日、 釣りでもして過ごしますかね……
jpnSearchText:
いっそ日がな一日、
釣りでもして過ごしますかね……

engChrName: Well, I'm not gonna stop you.
engSearchText: Well, I'm not gonna stop you.
jpnChrName: クク、まあ誰も止めねえけどよ。
jpnSearchText: クク、まあ誰も止めねえけどよ。

engChrName: (I do hope his fortunes change.)
engSearchText: (I do hope his fortunes change.)
jpnChrName: （立ち直ってくださるといいのですが……）
jpnSearchText: （立ち直ってくださるといいのですが……）

engChrName: To think we were all working together just a couple years ago...and now it's all done.
engSearchText:
To think we were all working together just a couple
years ago...and now it's all done.
jpnChrName: ハハ……ヴェルヌ社とは近年まで 協力し合ってやってきたというのに……
jpnSearchText:
ハハ……ヴェルヌ社とは近年まで
協力し合ってやってきたというのに……

engChrName: I appreciate the sympathy from the ZCF folks, but... man, I just can't find the motivation anymore.
engSearchText:
I appreciate the sympathy from the ZCF folks, but...
man, I just can't find the motivation anymore.
jpnChrName: ＺＣＦの人にも同情されますけど、 もうどうにもやる気が……
jpnSearchText:
ＺＣＦの人にも同情されますけど、
もうどうにもやる気が……

engChrName: Sometimes I wonder if I'd be better off just finding a cabin somewhere and fishing for the rest of my days...
engSearchText:
Sometimes I wonder if I'd be better off just finding a
cabin somewhere and fishing for the rest of my days...
jpnChrName: いっそ日がな一日、 釣りでもして過ごしますかね……
jpnSearchText:
いっそ日がな一日、
釣りでもして過ごしますかね……

engChrName: In light of all the incidents lately, local authorities have suspended rail service.
engSearchText:
In light of all the incidents lately, local authorities
have suspended rail service.
jpnChrName: 一連の事件と当局の判断を受けて…… 申し訳ないですが、運行は停止しています。
jpnSearchText:
一連の事件と当局の判断を受けて……
申し訳ないですが、運行は停止しています。

engChrName: We don't know when we'll be back up and running. I apologize for the inconvenience.
engSearchText:
We don't know when we'll be back up and running.
I apologize for the inconvenience.
jpnChrName: 再開の目処は立っておりません…… 大変申し訳ないのですが。
jpnSearchText:
再開の目処は立っておりません……
大変申し訳ないのですが。

engChrName: I heard there was a terrorist attack in Anchorville, too... I can't really blame them. Feels like a lockdown is the only answer.
engSearchText:
I heard there was a terrorist attack in
Anchorville, too... I can't really blame them.
Feels like a lockdown is the only answer.
jpnChrName: アンカーヴィルの方でもテロがあったそうですし 都市封鎖もやむを得ないのでしょうね……
jpnSearchText:
アンカーヴィルの方でもテロがあったそうですし
都市封鎖もやむを得ないのでしょうね……

engChrName: Basel is a hub city for many of the country's top manufacturers. The biggest names all have operations here.
engSearchText:
Basel is a hub city for many of the country's
top manufacturers. The biggest names all have
operations here.
jpnChrName: バーゼルは国内有数の工業地帯として 各社の製造工場も集中しているんです。
jpnSearchText:
バーゼルは国内有数の工業地帯として
各社の製造工場も集中しているんです。

engChrName: That's a big strain on the power grid, hence the massive orbal generator to keep it all afloat.
engSearchText:
That's a big strain on the power grid, hence the
massive orbal generator to keep it all afloat.
jpnChrName: なので導力が常に不足しており…… 巨大な導力ジェネレーターが設置されています。
jpnSearchText:
なので導力が常に不足しており……
巨大な導力ジェネレーターが設置されています。

engChrName: It powers everything, from manufacturing plants to research stations—even the trains run on the generator.
engSearchText:
It powers everything, from manufacturing plants to
research stations—even the trains run on
the generator.
jpnChrName: 鉄道を走らせる導力も、導力ジェネレーターに よって賄われているんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
鉄道を走らせる導力も、導力ジェネレーターに
よって賄われているんですよ。

engChrName: Today's domestic lines are all operating on schedule.
engSearchText: Today's domestic lines are all operating on schedule.
jpnChrName: 本日の国内線は大きな遅延もなく、 ダイヤ通りの運行となっております。
jpnSearchText:
本日の国内線は大きな遅延もなく、
ダイヤ通りの運行となっております。

engChrName: I heard the Transcontinental Railroad ran into another snag out east...
engSearchText:
I heard the Transcontinental Railroad ran into
another snag out east...
jpnChrName: もっとも……大陸横断鉄道では また東方でトラブルがあったそうで……
jpnSearchText:
もっとも……大陸横断鉄道では
また東方でトラブルがあったそうで……

engChrName: Once you get out past Longlai, all bets are off. Not much they can do about that...
engSearchText:
Once you get out past Longlai, all bets are off.
Not much they can do about that...
jpnChrName: 龍來駅より先は、本当にトラブルが多く…… あの土地では仕方ないのでしょうが……
jpnSearchText:
龍來駅より先は、本当にトラブルが多く……
あの土地では仕方ないのでしょうが……

engChrName: The Transcontinental Railroad's just always running into trouble there.
engSearchText:
The Transcontinental Railroad's just always running
into trouble there.
jpnChrName: 大陸横断鉄道公社の方でも 常々苦心しているようですね……
jpnSearchText:
大陸横断鉄道公社の方でも
常々苦心しているようですね……

engChrName: Welcome to Basel Station, one of Calvard's biggest rail hubs.
engSearchText:
Welcome to Basel Station, one of Calvard's biggest
rail hubs.
jpnChrName: バーゼル駅へようこそ。 ここはカルバードでも有数の駅なんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
バーゼル駅へようこそ。
ここはカルバードでも有数の駅なんですよ。

engChrName: We also produce a cutting-edge operational management system here—several companies are testing the waters with it.
engSearchText:
We also produce a cutting-edge operational
management system here—several companies are
testing the waters with it.
jpnChrName: 最先端の運行管理システムが置かれていますし いくつかの社会実験も行っています。
jpnSearchText:
最先端の運行管理システムが置かれていますし
いくつかの社会実験も行っています。

engChrName: Plus Ventos, the industry leader in locomotive production, calls Basel its home. Working with them is a walk in the park.
engSearchText:
Plus Ventos, the industry leader in locomotive
production, calls Basel its home. Working with them
is a walk in the park.
jpnChrName: 列車製造の最大手《ヴェントス》の本拠も バーゼルですしね、連携しやすいメリットも……
jpnSearchText:
列車製造の最大手《ヴェントス》の本拠も
バーゼルですしね、連携しやすいメリットも……

engChrName: Not to toot our own horn though, heh. Enjoy your trip, folks.
engSearchText:
Not to toot our own horn though, heh. Enjoy your
trip, folks.
jpnChrName: ふふ、どうか快適な鉄道の旅を お楽しみください。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、どうか快適な鉄道の旅を
お楽しみください。

engChrName: Now, the Transcontinental Railroad Company, they're headquartered in Edith.
engSearchText:
Now, the Transcontinental Railroad Company,
they're headquartered in Edith.
jpnChrName: ちなみに《大陸横断鉄道公社》の本社は 首都イーディスにあるんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに《大陸横断鉄道公社》の本社は
首都イーディスにあるんですよ。

engChrName: On top of that, we have our own domestic line, the Calvard Railroad, and the Edith City Subway.
engSearchText:
On top of that, we have our own domestic line, the
Calvard Railroad, and the Edith City Subway.
jpnChrName: 国内線である《カルバード鉄道》、首都の地下を走る 《イーディス市営地下鉄》も有名ですね。
jpnSearchText:
国内線である《カルバード鉄道》、首都の地下を走る
《イーディス市営地下鉄》も有名ですね。

engChrName: With all that infrastructure working together, we give even Erebonia's rail network a run for their mira.
engSearchText:
With all that infrastructure working together, we give
even Erebonia's rail network a run for their mira.
jpnChrName: これらが互いに接続しているこの国は、 エレボニア帝国以上に鉄道大国かもしれませんねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
これらが互いに接続しているこの国は、
エレボニア帝国以上に鉄道大国かもしれませんねぇ。

engChrName: It was one of Red Star's long-haul trucks that I saw.
engSearchText: It was one of Red Star's long-haul trucks that I saw.
jpnChrName: 僕の前を走ってた車は レッドスターの大型運搬車だったよ。
jpnSearchText:
僕の前を走ってた車は
レッドスターの大型運搬車だったよ。

engChrName: It's crazy how big it was. It tanked cans and potholes and stuff like nothing, and I could even hear stuff shuffling around in the back.
engSearchText:
It's crazy how big it was. It tanked cans and potholes
and stuff like nothing, and I could even hear stuff
shuffling around in the back.
jpnChrName: 空き缶を堂々と踏みつけるし、荷台から 妙な音も聞こえて、ちょっと変わっててさ。
jpnSearchText:
空き缶を堂々と踏みつけるし、荷台から
妙な音も聞こえて、ちょっと変わっててさ。

engChrName: That's all I can really think of right now. I hope it helps!
engSearchText:
That's all I can really think of right now. I hope
it helps!
jpnChrName: これくらいの事しか心当たりがないんだけど、 なにかの参考になれば嬉しいよ。
jpnSearchText:
これくらいの事しか心当たりがないんだけど、
なにかの参考になれば嬉しいよ。

engChrName: Yesterday was terrible... I didn't see it for myself, but I heard all about it.
engSearchText:
Yesterday was terrible... I didn't see it for myself, but
I heard all about it.
jpnChrName: 昨日の襲撃……大分酷かったみたいだね。 僕は離れていて直接は見ていないけど……
jpnSearchText:
昨日の襲撃……大分酷かったみたいだね。
僕は離れていて直接は見ていないけど……

engChrName: I'm no engineer, so repairs and stuff are kinda beyond me...
engSearchText:
I'm no engineer, so repairs and stuff are kinda
beyond me...
jpnChrName: 僕は技術方面には疎いから、復旧作業の 手伝いは出来なさそうだけど……
jpnSearchText:
僕は技術方面には疎いから、復旧作業の
手伝いは出来なさそうだけど……

engChrName: ...but there has to be something I can do to help. Everybody out working today deserves a helping hand.
engSearchText:
...but there has to be something I can do to help.
Everybody out working today deserves a
helping hand.
jpnChrName: 少しでも頑張っている人たちに、 休息をしてもらう手助けがしたいしね。
jpnSearchText:
少しでも頑張っている人たちに、
休息をしてもらう手助けがしたいしね。

engChrName: Well, I'll think of something! Every little bit helps, right?
engSearchText:
Well, I'll think of something! Every little bit
helps, right?
jpnChrName: 頑張っている人に声をかけて、 心ばかりの差し入れもするとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
頑張っている人に声をかけて、
心ばかりの差し入れもするとしようか。

engChrName: That professor frequents this place. He's always a step ahead, I swear.
engSearchText:
That professor frequents this place. He's always a step
ahead, I swear.
jpnChrName: さっきの先生さ、いつも先回りして うちで食べていってくれる人って。
jpnSearchText:
さっきの先生さ、いつも先回りして
うちで食べていってくれる人って。

engChrName: I'm sort of a free bird—I like to wander around a lot. So this one time, I asked him how he always knew where I'd be.
engSearchText:
I'm sort of a free bird—I like to wander around a lot.
So this one time, I asked him how he always knew
where I'd be.
jpnChrName: 僕はその時の気分で動いてるだけだし、 何でわかるのかなって聞いてみたんだけどさ。
jpnSearchText:
僕はその時の気分で動いてるだけだし、
何でわかるのかなって聞いてみたんだけどさ。

engChrName: 'Oh, it was only logical.' His words, not mine. Can you believe the guy?
engSearchText:
'Oh, it was only logical.' His words, not mine.
Can you believe the guy?
jpnChrName: 論理的帰結、としか 答えてくれないんだよね……
jpnSearchText:
論理的帰結、としか
答えてくれないんだよね……

engChrName: They really are on a whole other level... Yeesh.
engSearchText: They really are on a whole other level... Yeesh.
jpnChrName: やっぱり頭の良い人って、僕ら凡人とは 違った世界とかが見えているものなのかなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり頭の良い人って、僕ら凡人とは
違った世界とかが見えているものなのかなぁ。

engChrName: I love taking in the breeze here at night... Calms me down.
engSearchText:
I love taking in the breeze here at night... Calms
me down.
jpnChrName: いやぁ、夜はこの辺りの風が 特に気持ち良いよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、夜はこの辺りの風が
特に気持ち良いよねぇ。

engChrName: I don't make a point of coming out here regularly, though—I just make the trip whenever my heart wants to.
engSearchText:
I don't make a point of coming out here regularly,
though—I just make the trip whenever my heart
wants to.
jpnChrName: まあ、ここに来るのも来ないのも 気分次第と言えば、そうだけどね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ここに来るのも来ないのも
気分次第と言えば、そうだけどね。

engChrName: There's this professor at the institute who comes by here—and I swear, he's always a step ahead of me.
engSearchText:
There's this professor at the institute who comes by
here—and I swear, he's always a step ahead of me.
jpnChrName: そういえば……何故か毎回、先回りしてうちで 食べてくれる大学の先生がいるんだよね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば……何故か毎回、先回りしてうちで
食べてくれる大学の先生がいるんだよね。

engChrName: I sorta wander around a lot, without really thinking about where I'm going...so how does he always know where I end up?
engSearchText:
I sorta wander around a lot, without really thinking
about where I'm going...so how does he always know
where I end up?
jpnChrName: 僕は気分次第でやってるけど…… あの先生は何故、僕の行き先が判るのかな。
jpnSearchText:
僕は気分次第でやってるけど……
あの先生は何故、僕の行き先が判るのかな。

engChrName: These last few months have been kinda stressful... Or, well, not for me. Just, the researchers have been really down in the dumps.
engSearchText:
These last few months have been kinda stressful...
Or, well, not for me. Just, the researchers have been
really down in the dumps.
jpnChrName: ここ数か月、ある研究室の 研究員さん達に元気が無くて心配してたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ここ数か月、ある研究室の
研究員さん達に元気が無くて心配してたんだ。

engChrName: If those grumblings about workplace harassment are true, then it might have to do with that professor...
engSearchText:
If those grumblings about workplace harassment are
true, then it might have to do with that professor...
jpnChrName: パワハラっていうなら…… もしかして、あの教授が……？
jpnSearchText:
パワハラっていうなら……
もしかして、あの教授が……？

engChrName: ...Er, sorry, I'm just thinking aloud here. Ignore that!
engSearchText: ...Er, sorry, I'm just thinking aloud here. Ignore that!
jpnChrName: ……いや、気にしないで。 きっと僕の考え過ぎだからさ。
jpnSearchText:
……いや、気にしないで。
きっと僕の考え過ぎだからさ。

engChrName: (Feels like he's heard some inside scoop. Maybe he's too scared to air it out, though—or maybe he just doesn't think anybody'll believe him.)
engSearchText:
(Feels like he's heard some inside scoop. Maybe he's
too scared to air it out, though—or maybe he just
doesn't think anybody'll believe him.)
jpnChrName: （言いたくても言えないっつうか……   信じたくねえっつう所みたいだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（言いたくても言えないっつうか……
信じたくねえっつう所みたいだな。）

engChrName: Welcome, welcome! What can I get'cha?
engSearchText: Welcome, welcome! What can I get'cha?
jpnChrName: やあ、いらっしゃい。 うちのカフェで何か食べていく？
jpnSearchText:
やあ、いらっしゃい。
うちのカフェで何か食べていく？

engChrName: I go wherever my heart takes me, and I bring my little shop along for the ride. Who knows what customers I'll see next?
engSearchText:
I go wherever my heart takes me, and I bring my little
shop along for the ride. Who knows what customers
I'll see next?
jpnChrName: 気分次第であちこちでやっているからね、 また会えるかもわからないしね。
jpnSearchText:
気分次第であちこちでやっているからね、
また会えるかもわからないしね。

engChrName: Not the most practical business model, but it's what makes me happy—and my little niche has made me popular with the locals!
engSearchText:
Not the most practical business model, but it's what
makes me happy—and my little niche has made me
popular with the locals!
jpnChrName: でも、その分自由にやってて会えた お客さんには縁を感じるものなんだよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
でも、その分自由にやってて会えた
お客さんには縁を感じるものなんだよねぇ。

engChrName: (A roaming café, huh? Bet it's popular with the eggheads at the institute.)
engSearchText:
(A roaming café, huh? Bet it's popular with the
eggheads at the institute.)
jpnChrName: （あちこち回ってるカフェか……  	大学関係者も利用してそうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（あちこち回ってるカフェか……
大学関係者も利用してそうだな。）

engChrName: (A common watering hole such as this would be a good place to gather information.)
engSearchText:
(A common watering hole such as this would be a
good place to gather information.)
jpnChrName: （聞き込み先として丁度よさそうですね。）
jpnSearchText: （聞き込み先として丁度よさそうですね。）

engChrName: Honestly, I'm just happy I got the chance to talk with Athena. It was worth the wait to catch up with her.
engSearchText:
Honestly, I'm just happy I got the chance to talk
with Athena. It was worth the wait to catch up
with her.
jpnChrName: 何やかんやでアテナ研究員と話せて良かったよ、 大分待っていたけど……仕方ないな。
jpnSearchText:
何やかんやでアテナ研究員と話せて良かったよ、
大分待っていたけど……仕方ないな。

engChrName: She's got social anxiety something fierce, but she's a total genius at what she does. Her research is gonna change the world one day.
engSearchText:
She's got social anxiety something fierce, but she's a
total genius at what she does. Her research is gonna
change the world one day.
jpnChrName: あの人はアガリ症だけど……やっている研究が、 役に立つ事は間違いないと思うんだ。
jpnSearchText:
あの人はアガリ症だけど……やっている研究が、
役に立つ事は間違いないと思うんだ。

engChrName: She's even testing a new holo core on the side. On the side! Man, how cool is that?
engSearchText:
She's even testing a new holo core on the side. On
the side! Man, how cool is that?
jpnChrName: 通信波以外にも、新型ホロウコアの試験にも 別口で参加してるらしいし、凄い人だよ。
jpnSearchText:
通信波以外にも、新型ホロウコアの試験にも
別口で参加してるらしいし、凄い人だよ。

engChrName: Well. Looks like you hit the nail on the head: this whole thing IS linked to the mafia.
engSearchText:
Well. Looks like you hit the nail on the head: this
whole thing IS linked to the mafia.
jpnChrName: フン……例の件、マフィア絡みで アタリだったそうだな？
jpnSearchText:
フン……例の件、マフィア絡みで
アタリだったそうだな？

engChrName: How do you know—?! Tch. Freakin' guild. Y'all stick your noses in every damn corner, I swear.
engSearchText:
How do you know—?! Tch. Freakin' guild. Y'all stick
your noses in every damn corner, I swear.
jpnChrName: って情報が早すぎんだろ！ これだからギルドの連中は……
jpnSearchText:
って情報が早すぎんだろ！
これだからギルドの連中は……

engChrName: Aww, don't be salty about it, bud. That's just what their comms network gets them.
engSearchText:
Aww, don't be salty about it, bud. That's just what
their comms network gets them.
jpnChrName: ひがむなや、オッサン。 事業規模の違いってやつだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ひがむなや、オッサン。
事業規模の違いってやつだろ。

engChrName: Yeah! I think it could be really useful for us, too, if we just work together!
engSearchText:
Yeah! I think it could be really useful for us, too, if we
just work together!
jpnChrName: はい、むしろギルドの情報網を うまく利用すべきかと！
jpnSearchText:
はい、むしろギルドの情報網を
うまく利用すべきかと！

engChrName: Uhh... Heh. You good there, guys? (I don't remember them dogpiling on him like that. Are they picking up on his sarcasm...?)
engSearchText:
Uhh... Heh. You good there, guys?
(I don't remember them dogpiling on him like that.
Are they picking up on his sarcasm...?)
jpnChrName: え？　君たち、そのだな…… （な、なんだか腹黒くなってないか……？）
jpnSearchText:
え？　君たち、そのだな……
（な、なんだか腹黒くなってないか……？）

engChrName: Ahem! Anyway, we know what we gotta do now. We're gonna get our equipment sorted out, and then we move!
engSearchText:
Ahem! Anyway, we know what we gotta do now.
We're gonna get our equipment sorted out, and then
we move!
jpnChrName: ──コホン、ともかくこうなった以上、 こちらは装備を整えて動くつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
──コホン、ともかくこうなった以上、
こちらは装備を整えて動くつもりだ。

engChrName: You guys stay sharp out there!
engSearchText: You guys stay sharp out there!
jpnChrName: お前たちも迂闊な事はするなよ！！
jpnSearchText: お前たちも迂闊な事はするなよ！！

engChrName: (Beneath that prickly exterior, he really does care for us. Heehee.)
engSearchText:
(Beneath that prickly exterior, he really does care
for us. Heehee.)
jpnChrName: （ふふっ、なんだかんだ言って   心配してくれているみたいですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふっ、なんだかんだ言って
心配してくれているみたいですね。）

engChrName: (Indeed... Perhaps a certain spriggan is rubbing off on him.)
engSearchText:
(Indeed... Perhaps a certain spriggan is rubbing
off on him.)
jpnChrName: （ええ……これも裏解決屋らしい   関わり方なのかもしれません。）
jpnSearchText:
（ええ……これも裏解決屋らしい
関わり方なのかもしれません。）

engChrName: We've got lives on the line here. Everything else can go on the backburner.
engSearchText:
We've got lives on the line here. Everything else can
go on the backburner.
jpnChrName: 人命が関わっている以上、 ギルドも最優先で動くつもりではあった。
jpnSearchText:
人命が関わっている以上、
ギルドも最優先で動くつもりではあった。

engChrName: Especially since this is the mob we're talking about here...
engSearchText:
Especially since this is the mob we're talking
about here...
jpnChrName: 加えてマフィア絡みとなると──
jpnSearchText: 加えてマフィア絡みとなると──

engChrName: Unfortunately, it's against guild regulations for B-ranks and lower to operate alone, so I gotta pair up...
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, it's against guild regulations for
B-ranks and lower to operate alone, so I gotta
pair up...
jpnChrName: 一応Ｂ級以下による単独対処は 禁止されているからな、ペアで動かないと……
jpnSearchText:
一応Ｂ級以下による単独対処は
禁止されているからな、ペアで動かないと……

engChrName: Don't get reckless out there! Loop back with the guild first, got it?!
engSearchText:
Don't get reckless out there! Loop back with the guild
first, got it?!
jpnChrName: お前たちも迂闊な事はするなよ。 まずギルドに一報を入れろ、いいな！
jpnSearchText:
お前たちも迂闊な事はするなよ。
まずギルドに一報を入れろ、いいな！

engChrName: Phew... Looks like everything's fine over here.
engSearchText: Phew... Looks like everything's fine over here.
jpnChrName: ふう、ひとまず異常は無さそうだな。
jpnSearchText: ふう、ひとまず異常は無さそうだな。

engChrName: But no matter how many rounds I do, I can't shake these nerves in my head.
engSearchText:
But no matter how many rounds I do, I can't shake
these nerves in my head.
jpnChrName: しかし確かに見回っていても どこか妙な感覚というか……
jpnSearchText:
しかし確かに見回っていても
どこか妙な感覚というか……

engChrName: Add today's unexplained incidents and the whole place just feels...wrong. I don't like it.
engSearchText:
Add today's unexplained incidents and the whole
place just feels...wrong. I don't like it.
jpnChrName: 今日も原因のはっきりしない トラブルもあったし、落ち着かないような……
jpnSearchText:
今日も原因のはっきりしない
トラブルもあったし、落ち着かないような……

engChrName: (Sounds like the guild's noticed, too...)
engSearchText: (Sounds like the guild's noticed, too...)
jpnChrName: （……ギルド方面でも何かを   感じ取っているみたいですね……）
jpnSearchText:
（……ギルド方面でも何かを
感じ取っているみたいですね……）

engChrName: (So the guild's caught on, too, have they? Figures.)
engSearchText: (So the guild's caught on, too, have they? Figures.)
jpnChrName: （……ハッ、ギルドの連中も   妙な状況に感づいてやがるみてーだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（……ハッ、ギルドの連中も
妙な状況に感づいてやがるみてーだな。）

engChrName: (The Bracer Guild is astute as ever.)
engSearchText: (The Bracer Guild is astute as ever.)
jpnChrName: （ええ……この辺りは流石かと。）
jpnSearchText: （ええ……この辺りは流石かと。）

engChrName: (Shall we head to the southern canyon path after making another round?)
engSearchText:
(Shall we head to the southern canyon path after
making another round?)
jpnChrName: （一回りしたら、南の峡谷道に   出ると致しましょうか。）
jpnSearchText:
（一回りしたら、南の峡谷道に
出ると致しましょうか。）

engChrName: (Sounds good to me. Might as well bring out the truck for that.)
engSearchText:
(Sounds good to me. Might as well bring out the
truck for that.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、車を使ってもいいかもな。）
jpnSearchText: （ああ、車を使ってもいいかもな。）

engChrName: There's a bunch of stuff we can't explain. The monsters are just the latest headache...
engSearchText:
There's a bunch of stuff we can't explain.
The monsters are just the latest headache...
jpnChrName: 魔獣の件もそうだが、原因の はっきりしないトラブルも多いな……
jpnSearchText:
魔獣の件もそうだが、原因の
はっきりしないトラブルも多いな……

engChrName: Could it all be connected...? Or am I just overthinking it?
engSearchText:
Could it all be connected...? Or am I just
overthinking it?
jpnChrName: どこか落ち着かないというか…… ううむ、気のせいか……？
jpnSearchText:
どこか落ち着かないというか……
ううむ、気のせいか……？

engChrName: Not a single eyewitness report, either—nobody in town saw a thing. Are we just grasping at straws here...?
engSearchText:
Not a single eyewitness report, either—nobody in
town saw a thing. Are we just grasping at straws
here...?
jpnChrName: 目撃情報は皆無……市内の 主だった箇所も調べたけれど空振りかしら。
jpnSearchText:
目撃情報は皆無……市内の
主だった箇所も調べたけれど空振りかしら。

engChrName: I guess we can try the workshop area and the airport? I dunno...
engSearchText:
I guess we can try the workshop area and the airport?
I dunno...
jpnChrName: もっとも工場地帯や空港方面は まだ手が回っていないし……
jpnSearchText:
もっとも工場地帯や空港方面は
まだ手が回っていないし……

engChrName: I guess Blanca's right: there's always a stone unturned. Let's split up and do another comb through.
engSearchText:
I guess Blanca's right: there's always a stone unturned.
Let's split up and do another comb through.
jpnChrName: ここは土地勘のあるブランカさんの 意見も聞きつつ手分けしないと。
jpnSearchText:
ここは土地勘のあるブランカさんの
意見も聞きつつ手分けしないと。

engChrName: I wonder if Alvis has gotten any leads yet... We should meet back up soon.
engSearchText:
I wonder if Alvis has gotten any leads yet...
We should meet back up soon.
jpnChrName: アルヴィスは何か掴んだのかしら？ そろそろ合流しないとね。
jpnSearchText:
アルヴィスは何か掴んだのかしら？
そろそろ合流しないとね。

engChrName: I set up a bunch of stuff at home to tell me about the capital while I was away. I thought I'd miss it a lot more...
engSearchText:
I set up a bunch of stuff at home to tell me about the
capital while I was away. I thought I'd miss it a
lot more...
jpnChrName: それにしても、実家を頼って長い事 首都のデータを集めていたけど……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、実家を頼って長い事
首都のデータを集めていたけど……

engChrName: But now? I think I'm falling for Basel.
engSearchText: But now? I think I'm falling for Basel.
jpnChrName: やはり今となってはバーゼルにも 結構里心がついた感じもします。
jpnSearchText:
やはり今となってはバーゼルにも
結構里心がついた感じもします。

engChrName: This place is starting to feel like home—especially now that I'm shepherding my little buddy around again, heh heh.
engSearchText:
This place is starting to feel like home—especially
now that I'm shepherding my little buddy around
again, heh heh.
jpnChrName: この少し困った後輩が隣にいるのも、 何となく安心感もありますしね。
jpnSearchText:
この少し困った後輩が隣にいるのも、
何となく安心感もありますしね。

engChrName: Those school uniforms are just too cute. I can hardly stand it.
engSearchText:
Those school uniforms are just too cute. I can hardly
stand it.
jpnChrName: うーん、やっぱり制服姿の 若い子たちって可愛いものだねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、やっぱり制服姿の
若い子たちって可愛いものだねぇ……

engChrName: When did I get so old? I remember when I looked all prim and proper as a student... Oh, what I'd give to be young and dashing again.
engSearchText:
When did I get so old? I remember when I looked all
prim and proper as a student... Oh, what I'd give to
be young and dashing again.
jpnChrName: 私にもあんな可愛かった時があったなんて…… 今となっては不思議な……
jpnSearchText:
私にもあんな可愛かった時があったなんて……
今となっては不思議な……

engChrName: So, umm...steering away from that topic...
engSearchText: So, umm...steering away from that topic...
jpnChrName: リズ、危なっかしい道に行きかけてる件は とりあえず置いておくとして……
jpnSearchText:
リズ、危なっかしい道に行きかけてる件は
とりあえず置いておくとして……

engChrName: How's that report coming along? Hopefully you've gotten more done since last weekend... You were literally crying about it.
engSearchText:
How's that report coming along? Hopefully you've
gotten more done since last weekend... You were
literally crying about it.
jpnChrName: あなた、結局例のレポートはやりましたか？ 先週末に、終わらないって泣きついてきた。
jpnSearchText:
あなた、結局例のレポートはやりましたか？
先週末に、終わらないって泣きついてきた。

engChrName: Oh, shoot! I've only written up the heading! AAAH!
engSearchText: Oh, shoot! I've only written up the heading! AAAH!
jpnChrName: あーっ！　そ、そういえば…… まだ見出ししか書いてなかったかも……！
jpnSearchText:
あーっ！　そ、そういえば……
まだ見出ししか書いてなかったかも……！

engChrName: H-Help a sister out, Kei! Pretty please?!
engSearchText: H-Help a sister out, Kei! Pretty please?!
jpnChrName: け、ケイ先輩……助けて…… 助けて～っ！
jpnSearchText:
け、ケイ先輩……助けて……
助けて～っ！

engChrName: Oh, for crying out... I have my own research to do, you know.
engSearchText:
Oh, for crying out... I have my own research to do,
you know.
jpnChrName: まったくもう……私だって自分の研究が ある立場なんですけど……？
jpnSearchText:
まったくもう……私だって自分の研究が
ある立場なんですけど……？

engChrName: But, well, that's all deadlocked right now because of communication issues. I guess I can lend you hand for a bit.
engSearchText:
But, well, that's all deadlocked right now because of
communication issues. I guess I can lend you hand for
a bit.
jpnChrName: まあ……今は通信不調のせいで少し滞っているし、 その間だけなら見てあげても良いけど……
jpnSearchText:
まあ……今は通信不調のせいで少し滞っているし、
その間だけなら見てあげても良いけど……

engChrName: They really scrutinize the reports you write here!
engSearchText: They really scrutinize the reports you write here!
jpnChrName: それにしても、本当にレポートの レベルも高いよね、うちの大学……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、本当にレポートの
レベルも高いよね、うちの大学……

engChrName: I'm still doing gen-ed stuff, but they really push me to dive deep into my chosen research topics. It's just so much to take in all at once.
engSearchText:
I'm still doing gen-ed stuff, but they really push me to
dive deep into my chosen research topics. It's just so
much to take in all at once.
jpnChrName: まだ基礎課程なのに、あんなに深掘りを 求められるなんて思わなかったわ。
jpnSearchText:
まだ基礎課程なのに、あんなに深掘りを
求められるなんて思わなかったわ。

engChrName: ...Man, now that I think about it, how the heck did I manage to get into this place?
engSearchText:
...Man, now that I think about it, how the heck did I
manage to get into this place?
jpnChrName: てか……今思うと、本当に私って 何でこの大学に入れたんだろう……？
jpnSearchText:
てか……今思うと、本当に私って
何でこの大学に入れたんだろう……？

engChrName: Professor Cronkite's research is super fascinating— even I'm learning new things!
engSearchText:
Professor Cronkite's research is super fascinating—
even I'm learning new things!
jpnChrName: それにしても、クロンカイト教授の研究は 私から見ても興味深かったわ。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、クロンカイト教授の研究は
私から見ても興味深かったわ。

engChrName: They say his work will be the future, and they're not lying. I heard he even had a leading hand in Xipha development.
engSearchText:
They say his work will be the future, and they're
not lying. I heard he even had a leading hand in
Xipha development.
jpnChrName: 流石は“次世代”を担う天才── ザイファの開発も彼が主導したそうだし。
jpnSearchText:
流石は“次世代”を担う天才──
ザイファの開発も彼が主導したそうだし。

engChrName: I've only seen little hints of his discoveries, though. What more is he hiding in that head of his...?
engSearchText:
I've only seen little hints of his discoveries, though.
What more is he hiding in that head of his...?
jpnChrName: もっとも見せてくれた研究は“ごく一部”…… 彼の本命は別にあるようだけど──
jpnSearchText:
もっとも見せてくれた研究は“ごく一部”……
彼の本命は別にあるようだけど──

engChrName: Heehee. Maybe I shouldn't dive TOO deep into that for this report. I'll just stick to what we all know.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Maybe I shouldn't dive TOO deep into that
for this report. I'll just stick to what we all know.
jpnChrName: ……この辺りをレポートにするのは、 流石に止めておこうかしらね？
jpnSearchText:
……この辺りをレポートにするのは、
流石に止めておこうかしらね？

engChrName: (No way that's high school-level research she's doin'.)
engSearchText: (No way that's high school-level research she's doin'.)
jpnChrName: （ぜってー高校レベルの   レポートじゃねえだろ……）
jpnSearchText:
（ぜってー高校レベルの
レポートじゃねえだろ……）

engChrName: (Indeed... I pity the teacher tasked with reading her reports. Such information density was not meant for human minds.)
engSearchText:
(Indeed... I pity the teacher tasked with reading her
reports. Such information density was not meant
for human minds.)
jpnChrName: （ええ……受け取った先生方も   困ってしまいそうですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ええ……受け取った先生方も
困ってしまいそうですね。）

engChrName: All right, Quatre. I leave Agnès in your capable hands.
engSearchText:
All right, Quatre. I leave Agnès in your
capable hands.
jpnChrName: それじゃあカトル君、アニエスをよろしくね。
jpnSearchText: それじゃあカトル君、アニエスをよろしくね。

engChrName: You two be careful, now. Who knows what kind of awful messes you might get yourselves into?
engSearchText:
You two be careful, now. Who knows what kind of
awful messes you might get yourselves into?
jpnChrName: うふふ、その子に付き合えばもしかしたら、 面白い出会いもあるかもしれないわね。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、その子に付き合えばもしかしたら、
面白い出会いもあるかもしれないわね。

engChrName: O...kay? Well, at any rate, let me show you to the Artisanal District.
engSearchText:
O...kay? Well, at any rate, let me show you to the
Artisanal District.
jpnChrName: 面白い出会い……？　まあとりあえずは 職人街まで案内させてもらいますよ。
jpnSearchText:
面白い出会い……？　まあとりあえずは
職人街まで案内させてもらいますよ。

engChrName: Oh, were you contacting someone just now, Renne?
engSearchText: Oh, were you contacting someone just now, Renne?
jpnChrName: レン先輩は……どなたかと 連絡をされるところですか？
jpnSearchText:
レン先輩は……どなたかと
連絡をされるところですか？

engChrName: Mm-hmm! That friend of mine I mentioned earlier.
engSearchText: Mm-hmm! That friend of mine I mentioned earlier.
jpnChrName: ええ、さっき言ったツテの方で少しね。
jpnSearchText: ええ、さっき言ったツテの方で少しね。

engChrName: I might be able to pull some strings and take you all on a little tour.
engSearchText:
I might be able to pull some strings and take you all
on a little tour.
jpnChrName: 話が付けば、皆を面白いところに 案内できるかもしれないわ。
jpnSearchText:
話が付けば、皆を面白いところに
案内できるかもしれないわ。

engChrName: But expectation is the gateway to disappointment, of course. Just carry on as normal and I'll keep you posted!
engSearchText:
But expectation is the gateway to disappointment,
of course. Just carry on as normal and I'll keep
you posted!
jpnChrName: まあ、アニエスは今は用事を優先しなさい。 機を見てあなたにも色々教えてあげるから。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、アニエスは今は用事を優先しなさい。
機を見てあなたにも色々教えてあげるから。

engChrName: Well, I suppose we will, then. Thank you!
engSearchText: Well, I suppose we will, then. Thank you!
jpnChrName: レン先輩……はい、ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: レン先輩……はい、ありがとうございます。

engChrName: I'll be back by curfew, so we can meet back up then.
engSearchText: I'll be back by curfew, so we can meet back up then.
jpnChrName: 時間までには戻りますので、 その時に改めてお願いしますね。
jpnSearchText:
時間までには戻りますので、
その時に改めてお願いしますね。

engChrName: Don't you worry about us, Agnès. You do what you want!
engSearchText:
Don't you worry about us, Agnès. You do what
you want!
jpnChrName: 班の事は気にしなくて良いわ、 アニエスはやりたい事を優先しなさい。
jpnSearchText:
班の事は気にしなくて良いわ、
アニエスはやりたい事を優先しなさい。

engChrName: And if anything comes up, I'm just a call away. I'm always willing to lend a helping hand or two!
engSearchText:
And if anything comes up, I'm just a call away.
I'm always willing to lend a helping hand or two!
jpnChrName: それと何かあれば連絡すること。 いざとなったら力にもなれると思うしね。
jpnSearchText:
それと何かあれば連絡すること。
いざとなったら力にもなれると思うしね。

engChrName: Don't you worry about us, Agnès.
engSearchText: Don't you worry about us, Agnès.
jpnChrName: こちらの事なら心配しないでくれ、 アニエス。
jpnSearchText:
こちらの事なら心配しないでくれ、
アニエス。

engChrName: Communications are up and running again, and we're getting all the students in touch with their families.
engSearchText:
Communications are up and running again, and we're
getting all the students in touch with their families.
jpnChrName: 通信も回復したようだし、生徒全員が 家族と連絡を取れるように手配した所だ。
jpnSearchText:
通信も回復したようだし、生徒全員が
家族と連絡を取れるように手配した所だ。

engChrName: It's just... Kinda doesn't feel all that safe with that cruiser hanging around in the air like that.
engSearchText:
It's just... Kinda doesn't feel all that safe with that
cruiser hanging around in the air like that.
jpnChrName: あんな巡洋艦が浮いてたんじゃ どうにも落ち着かないが……
jpnSearchText:
あんな巡洋艦が浮いてたんじゃ
どうにも落ち着かないが……

engChrName: But I digress! You guys shouldn't have anything to worry about now.
engSearchText:
But I digress! You guys shouldn't have anything to
worry about now.
jpnChrName: コホン、ともかく心配は無用だ。 アニエスも無茶するんじゃないぞ！？
jpnSearchText:
コホン、ともかく心配は無用だ。
アニエスも無茶するんじゃないぞ！？

engChrName: Thank you. Stay safe yourself, okay?
engSearchText: Thank you. Stay safe yourself, okay?
jpnChrName: ええ、ありがとう。 アルベール君も気を付けて。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ありがとう。
アルベール君も気を付けて。

engChrName: If things hit the fan, guys like you gotta step up and get everybody to safety. You got me?
engSearchText:
If things hit the fan, guys like you gotta step up and
get everybody to safety. You got me?
jpnChrName: いざって時は市民の避難誘導、 しっかり頼むぜ青少年？
jpnSearchText:
いざって時は市民の避難誘導、
しっかり頼むぜ青少年？

engChrName: W-Well, yeah! You don't have to tell me twice!
engSearchText: W-Well, yeah! You don't have to tell me twice!
jpnChrName: ア、アンタに言われるまでもないっ！
jpnSearchText: ア、アンタに言われるまでもないっ！

engChrName: Huh?! What're you guys doing here?!
engSearchText: Huh?! What're you guys doing here?!
jpnChrName: ハッ、アンタたちは……なぜここに！？
jpnSearchText: ハッ、アンタたちは……なぜここに！？

engChrName: I-It's not what it looks like! I don't have a crush or anything! YOU have a crush! Shut up!
engSearchText:
I-It's not what it looks like! I don't have a crush
or anything! YOU have a crush! Shut up!
jpnChrName: こ、これは別に、僕に好きな子が いるとかそういう話じゃなくてだな……！
jpnSearchText:
こ、これは別に、僕に好きな子が
いるとかそういう話じゃなくてだな……！

engChrName: J-Just leave me alone, all right?! This is none of your business!
engSearchText:
J-Just leave me alone, all right?! This is none of
your business!
jpnChrName: と、ともかくアンタたちには 関係など無いはずだ！！
jpnSearchText:
と、ともかくアンタたちには
関係など無いはずだ！！

engChrName: (Open book, this kid.)
engSearchText: (Open book, this kid.)
jpnChrName: （隠すのがド下手だな、こいつは……）
jpnSearchText: （隠すのがド下手だな、こいつは……）

engChrName: ...Just be careful, okay? Hurry on back if things get ugly.
engSearchText:
...Just be careful, okay? Hurry on back if things
get ugly.
jpnChrName: ……くれぐれも気を付けてな、 何かあったらすぐに戻ってくるんだぞ。
jpnSearchText:
……くれぐれも気を付けてな、
何かあったらすぐに戻ってくるんだぞ。

engChrName: And keep that guy at arm's length. He's dragging you around way more than he has a right to.
engSearchText:
And keep that guy at arm's length. He's dragging you
around way more than he has a right to.
jpnChrName: 出先でまで君を連れ回すあの男、 正直信用できるとは思えないが。
jpnSearchText:
出先でまで君を連れ回すあの男、
正直信用できるとは思えないが。

engChrName: Erm, who?
engSearchText: Erm, who?
jpnChrName: ……あの男？
jpnSearchText: ……あの男？

engChrName: Oh, don't worry about it.
engSearchText: Oh, don't worry about it.
jpnChrName: あはは、こっちの話ですから……
jpnSearchText: あはは、こっちの話ですから……

engChrName: Stay safe out there, is all I'm saying.
engSearchText: Stay safe out there, is all I'm saying.
jpnChrName: ともかく、くれぐれも気を付けてな。
jpnSearchText: ともかく、くれぐれも気を付けてな。

engChrName: Quatre, was it? Take good care of Agnès, okay?
engSearchText: Quatre, was it? Take good care of Agnès, okay?
jpnChrName: カトル君だったか。 アニエスの事、どうか頼んだぞ。
jpnSearchText:
カトル君だったか。
アニエスの事、どうか頼んだぞ。

engChrName: C'mon, what better topic to talk about right now than romance? Don't be such a prude!
engSearchText:
C'mon, what better topic to talk about right now
than romance? Don't be such a prude!
jpnChrName: ──いや、こういう時は決まってんだろ！？ “恋バナ”しよーぜ、恋バナ！！
jpnSearchText:
──いや、こういう時は決まってんだろ！？
“恋バナ”しよーぜ、恋バナ！！

engChrName: Wha—?! You're outta your mind!
engSearchText: Wha—?! You're outta your mind!
jpnChrName: なあっ！？　何を言ってるんだ君は！！
jpnSearchText: なあっ！？　何を言ってるんだ君は！！

engChrName: Ohh, that's right, I remember that one senior talking about it.
engSearchText:
Ohh, that's right, I remember that one senior talking
about it.
jpnChrName: 恋バナ？　ああ── 向こうの先輩に聞いた事があるかな。
jpnSearchText:
恋バナ？　ああ──
向こうの先輩に聞いた事があるかな。

engChrName: Apparently, romance is a popular topic on trips like these—
engSearchText:
Apparently, romance is a popular topic on trips like
these—
jpnChrName: 確か好きな人の話を 赤裸々に暴露し合うとか──
jpnSearchText:
確か好きな人の話を
赤裸々に暴露し合うとか──

engChrName: W-Well, YOU can talk about it! But my lips are sealed!
engSearchText:
W-Well, YOU can talk about it! But my lips
are sealed!
jpnChrName: ぼっ、僕は言わないぞ！？ 絶対にな！！
jpnSearchText:
ぼっ、僕は言わないぞ！？
絶対にな！！

engChrName: Aww, poor Albert... Heh. I can tell what you're thinking, you know.
engSearchText:
Aww, poor Albert... Heh. I can tell what you're
thinking, you know.
jpnChrName: アルベールぅ～、 お前分かりやすすぎだぞぉ？
jpnSearchText:
アルベールぅ～、
お前分かりやすすぎだぞぉ？

engChrName: Well, yeah! I'm thinking, 'Man, this dude's really freakin' thirsty! He just talks about flirting all the time!'
engSearchText:
Well, yeah! I'm thinking, 'Man, this dude's really
freakin' thirsty! He just talks about flirting all
the time!'
jpnChrName: お前こそ“落とすテクニック”だの、 いつも下らない事ばかりだな……！
jpnSearchText:
お前こそ“落とすテクニック”だの、
いつも下らない事ばかりだな……！

engChrName: ...I might be able to help with that. I do have some degree of experience.
engSearchText:
...I might be able to help with that. I do have some
degree of experience.
jpnChrName: ……女性に好意を持たれる方法か…… 少しなら僕も教えられますけど。
jpnSearchText:
……女性に好意を持たれる方法か……
少しなら僕も教えられますけど。

engChrName: Whoa! Really? / A-Are you serious?!
engSearchText: Whoa! Really? / A-Are you serious?!
jpnChrName: マジかよっ！！／ほほ、本当かっ！？
jpnSearchText: <S5>マジかよっ！！／ほほ、本当かっ！？

engChrName: (Hmm... I don't really get what they're so worked up over, but they look like they're having a good time!)
engSearchText:
(Hmm... I don't really get what they're so worked up
over, but they look like they're having a good time!)
jpnChrName: （う～ん、よくわかりませんけど   やっぱり賑やかで楽しそうですっ！）
jpnSearchText:
（う～ん、よくわかりませんけど
やっぱり賑やかで楽しそうですっ！）

engChrName: (Heh. Lucky the girls can't hear 'em. Those kinds of conversations you usually save for later...)
engSearchText:
(Heh. Lucky the girls can't hear 'em. Those kinds of
conversations you usually save for later...)
jpnChrName: （ああ、女子連中に聞こえてねえのが   救いだが、こういうのは大抵後で──）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、女子連中に聞こえてねえのが
救いだが、こういうのは大抵後で──）

engChrName: (Speaking from experience, are we?)
engSearchText: (Speaking from experience, are we?)
jpnChrName: （それはヴァン様の経験則でしょうか？）
jpnSearchText: （それはヴァン様の経験則でしょうか？）

engChrName: (Uhh... No comment.)
engSearchText: (Uhh... No comment.)
jpnChrName: （オッホン、何の事かなリゼット君。）
jpnSearchText: （オッホン、何の事かなリゼット君。）

engChrName: (Sounds like they could use a tip or two on touching some titty. Maybe I should bring them over to one of my local haunts?)
engSearchText:
(Sounds like they could use a tip or two on touching
some titty. Maybe I should bring them over to one of
my local haunts?)
jpnChrName: （おーおー、賑わってるねぇ。   やっぱ大人の店に誘ってやるかよ？）
jpnSearchText:
（おーおー、賑わってるねぇ。
やっぱ大人の店に誘ってやるかよ？）

engChrName: (They are KIDS, you blockhead. And as long as you're on the clock, the only thing you're touchin' is notes, understand?)
engSearchText:
(They are KIDS, you blockhead. And as long as
you're on the clock, the only thing you're touchin' is
notes, understand?)
jpnChrName: （未成年はＮＧだっつの。   つーか出張先までやめろ、恥ずいだろうが。）
jpnSearchText:
（未成年はＮＧだっつの。
つーか出張先までやめろ、恥ずいだろうが。）

engChrName: (Though in Tharbad, actually... No, perhaps I shouldn't broach that topic.)
engSearchText:
(Though in Tharbad, actually... No, perhaps I
shouldn't broach that topic.)
jpnChrName: （サルバッドでは……いえ、   これは申し上げないでおきましょうか。）
jpnSearchText:
（サルバッドでは……いえ、
これは申し上げないでおきましょうか。）

engChrName: All right, I think that's all the broken glass swapped out. The storefronts should be fine now.
engSearchText:
All right, I think that's all the broken glass
swapped out. The storefronts should be fine now.
jpnChrName: ふう、この辺りの店舗の 割れていたガラスは交換させて貰いました。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、この辺りの店舗の
割れていたガラスは交換させて貰いました。

engChrName: I'm just trying to do what I can. Where I was raised, you were expected to pitch in to help the community in crises like these.
engSearchText:
I'm just trying to do what I can. Where I was raised,
you were expected to pitch in to help the community
in crises like these.
jpnChrName: ささやかかもしれませんが、人々を支える “礎”となるのが留学元の教えですので。
jpnSearchText:
ささやかかもしれませんが、人々を支える
“礎”となるのが留学元の教えですので。

engChrName: Okay... What else needs to be done?
engSearchText: Okay... What else needs to be done?
jpnChrName: さてと、あと手伝えることは──
jpnSearchText: さてと、あと手伝えることは──

engChrName: Sounds like Lyle's tuckered himself out. I'll go cover for him.
engSearchText:
Sounds like Lyle's tuckered himself out. I'll go cover
for him.
jpnChrName: ……ライエルが音を上げているようなので、 次は彼の手助けですかね。
jpnSearchText:
……ライエルが音を上げているようなので、
次は彼の手助けですかね。

engChrName: I'm not too familiar with Verne weapons, myself...
engSearchText: I'm not too familiar with Verne weapons, myself...
jpnChrName: ヴェルヌ社製の武具は あまり馴染みがないんですが──
jpnSearchText:
ヴェルヌ社製の武具は
あまり馴染みがないんですが──

engChrName: Hmm... Interesting. I've swung some Erebonian makes, and compared to those, these are much lighter and easier to carry.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Interesting. I've swung some Erebonian
makes, and compared to those, these are much lighter
and easier to carry.
jpnChrName: なるほど、帝国製に比べると 扱いやすくて携帯も容易みたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、帝国製に比べると
扱いやすくて携帯も容易みたいですね。

engChrName: They just take out some of the bulk in exchange. I don't imagine they have stuff like the two-handers my grandfather used... Bit of a shame.
engSearchText:
They just take out some of the bulk in exchange.
I don't imagine they have stuff like the two-handers
my grandfather used... Bit of a shame.
jpnChrName: ですが、やはり祖父が使っているような両手剣は 在庫が無いようで、そこは少々残念ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ですが、やはり祖父が使っているような両手剣は
在庫が無いようで、そこは少々残念ですね。

engChrName: (Huh. Kid knows his stuff. Not every day you meet a two-hander specialist.)
engSearchText:
(Huh. Kid knows his stuff. Not every day you meet a
two-hander specialist.)
jpnChrName: （へぇ？　剣の心得があるみてーだな。   それも両手剣だとよ。）
jpnSearchText:
（へぇ？　剣の心得があるみてーだな。
それも両手剣だとよ。）

engChrName: (From what I heard, Julian hails from a line of renowned Erebonian swordsmen.)
engSearchText:
(From what I heard, Julian hails from a line of
renowned Erebonian swordsmen.)
jpnChrName: （そういえば、ユリアン君は帝国でも   武で有名な家の出身だとか……）
jpnSearchText:
（そういえば、ユリアン君は帝国でも
武で有名な家の出身だとか……）

engChrName: (Certainly looks the part. There's somethin'...strange about him, though. Can't put my finger on it.)
engSearchText:
(Certainly looks the part. There's somethin'...strange
about him, though. Can't put my finger on it.)
jpnChrName: （確かに、中々の使い手みてえだな。   ちょいと引っかかる気もするが……）
jpnSearchText:
（確かに、中々の使い手みてえだな。
ちょいと引っかかる気もするが……）

engChrName: Incidentally, Renne made for the Artisanal District, right?
engSearchText:
Incidentally, Renne made for the Artisanal
District, right?
jpnChrName: そういえばレン先輩は 職人街の方を見に行ったみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえばレン先輩は
職人街の方を見に行ったみたいですね。

engChrName: Maybe she's thinking to buy Tita a souvenir or something...
