engSearchText:
Maybe she's thinking to buy Tita a souvenir
or something...
jpnChrName: ティータ先輩への土産話でも 探しに行ったのかな……？
jpnSearchText:
ティータ先輩への土産話でも
探しに行ったのかな……？

engChrName: I feel like I owe her one as well. She was a huge help last year.
engSearchText:
I feel like I owe her one as well. She was a huge help
last year.
jpnChrName: 僕も去年はお世話になりましたから、 何かお土産を見繕いたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
僕も去年はお世話になりましたから、
何かお土産を見繕いたいですね。

engChrName: (Tita? That name rings a bell, but I can't place it...)
engSearchText: (Tita? That name rings a bell, but I can't place it...)
jpnChrName: （ティータ先輩……？   あれ、どこかで聞いたような……）
jpnSearchText:
（ティータ先輩……？
あれ、どこかで聞いたような……）

engChrName: Back when I was in school in the Empire, I had this amazing group of upperclassmen who helped me with my studies.
engSearchText:
Back when I was in school in the Empire, I had this
amazing group of upperclassmen who helped me with
my studies.
jpnChrName: 向こう──留学元の帝国の学院でも 素晴らしい先輩達にお世話になっていまして。
jpnSearchText:
向こう──留学元の帝国の学院でも
素晴らしい先輩達にお世話になっていまして。

engChrName: They've already gone and graduated, but not before sharing some of their secrets on how to talk 'romance.' Or something along those lines.
engSearchText:
They've already gone and graduated, but not before
sharing some of their secrets on how to
talk 'romance.' Or something along those lines.
jpnChrName: その人はもう卒業してしまったんですが、 恋バナのコツも教わった事がありますね。
jpnSearchText:
その人はもう卒業してしまったんですが、
恋バナのコツも教わった事がありますね。

engChrName: This trip is an excellent opportunity to broaden our horizons. Little point in being shy!
engSearchText:
This trip is an excellent opportunity to broaden
our horizons. Little point in being shy!
jpnChrName: 折角の旅先ですし 雑談も楽しまないとですね。
jpnSearchText:
折角の旅先ですし
雑談も楽しまないとですね。

engChrName: The pharmacy over there had quite the mix of stuff, almost like a convenience store.
engSearchText:
The pharmacy over there had quite the mix of stuff,
almost like a convenience store.
jpnChrName: あちらの薬局も面白かったですよ。
jpnSearchText: あちらの薬局も面白かったですよ。

engChrName: You had your medicine there, but then groceries and other goods, too.
engSearchText:
You had your medicine there, but then groceries and
other goods, too.
jpnChrName: 医薬品だけでなく、生活雑貨や 食品まで取り扱っていて……
jpnSearchText:
医薬品だけでなく、生活雑貨や
食品まで取り扱っていて……

engChrName: They're even open all day, according to the sign.
engSearchText: They're even open all day, according to the sign.
jpnChrName: さらに深夜２４時まで営業しているそうです。
jpnSearchText: さらに深夜２４時まで営業しているそうです。

engChrName: Guess there's something to be said for having whatever you need, whenever you need it.
engSearchText:
Guess there's something to be said for having
whatever you need, whenever you need it.
jpnChrName: 利便性を追求することで顧客を囲い込む…… うーん、新しい着眼点ですよね。
jpnSearchText:
利便性を追求することで顧客を囲い込む……
うーん、新しい着眼点ですよね。

engChrName: We first-years decided to take a little unguided tour of the city.
engSearchText:
We first-years decided to take a little unguided tour of
the city.
jpnChrName: 僕たちは、仲のいい１年生同士で 見て回る事にしたんです。
jpnSearchText:
僕たちは、仲のいい１年生同士で
見て回る事にしたんです。

engChrName: We've been to Roer, which is where Reinford's headquartered, and we thought that place was high-tech, but boy...
engSearchText:
We've been to Roer, which is where Reinford's
headquartered, and we thought that place was
high-tech, but boy...
jpnChrName: それにしても、帝国でも《ＲＦグループ》の膝元 ルーレなんかは先進的な街並みですが……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、帝国でも《ＲＦグループ》の膝元
ルーレなんかは先進的な街並みですが……

engChrName: Basel is just in a whole other league. It's got so much stuff going on—they have these huge facilities and experiments, all within city limits.
engSearchText:
Basel is just in a whole other league. It's got so much
stuff going on—they have these huge facilities and
experiments, all within city limits.
jpnChrName: このバーゼルはそれとも違って 様々な社会実験も行われているようですね。
jpnSearchText:
このバーゼルはそれとも違って
様々な社会実験も行われているようですね。

engChrName: I hardly know where to look first. I wanna take in as much of this place as I can.
engSearchText:
I hardly know where to look first. I wanna take in as
much of this place as I can.
jpnChrName: ふふ、気になるポイントも多いですし なるべく効率的に見て回らないと。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、気になるポイントも多いですし
なるべく効率的に見て回らないと。

engChrName: *huff* Phew... I just tagged along with Julian... *huff* To try and help, but...
engSearchText:
*huff* Phew... I just tagged along with Julian...
*huff* To try and help, but...
jpnChrName: ぜえ、ぜえ……ユリアンが、 復旧を手伝うっつーから付いてきたが……
jpnSearchText:
ぜえ、ぜえ……ユリアンが、
復旧を手伝うっつーから付いてきたが……

engChrName: ...what are those things, solid metal?! *huff* They're so damn heavy!
engSearchText:
...what are those things, solid metal?! *huff* They're
so damn heavy!
jpnChrName: ──この資材重すぎじゃね！？ 鉄の塊かっつーの！！
jpnSearchText:
──この資材重すぎじゃね！？
鉄の塊かっつーの！！

engChrName: And there he is, just pickin' 'em up and haulin' 'em out, over and over again like they're nothing...
engSearchText:
And there he is, just pickin' 'em up and haulin' 'em
out, over and over again like they're nothing...
jpnChrName: いや、それ以上に……ユリアンの奴は これを軽々と、何往復も……
jpnSearchText:
いや、それ以上に……ユリアンの奴は
これを軽々と、何往復も……

engChrName: I was just thinking about how Julian got so popular, and I think that there's my answer. He ain't just a pretty face... Geez.
engSearchText:
I was just thinking about how Julian got so popular,
and I think that there's my answer. He ain't just a
pretty face... Geez.
jpnChrName: 昨日も思ったけど、こいつマジでスゲェよ…… モテるってのは顔だけじゃねぇんだな……
jpnSearchText:
昨日も思ったけど、こいつマジでスゲェよ……
モテるってのは顔だけじゃねぇんだな……

engChrName: Thought I might learn his secret by taggin' up with him on this...
engSearchText:
Thought I might learn his secret by taggin' up with
him on this...
jpnChrName: オレも少しは誠実さってのを 身に着けようかと、ボランティアにきたが……
jpnSearchText:
オレも少しは誠実さってのを
身に着けようかと、ボランティアにきたが……

engChrName: ...but man. He's got the brains AND the brawn. And a total lady-killer face, too!
engSearchText:
...but man. He's got the brains AND the brawn.
And a total lady-killer face, too!
jpnChrName: ユリアンの奴、顔だけじゃねえな…… これがマジモンのイケメンって奴かよ……！！
jpnSearchText:
ユリアンの奴、顔だけじゃねえな……
これがマジモンのイケメンって奴かよ……！！

engChrName: So like, Chignon won't move a rege.
engSearchText: So like, Chignon won't move a rege.
jpnChrName: なんかシニョンが一歩も 動かなくなっちまってよ～。
jpnSearchText:
なんかシニョンが一歩も
動かなくなっちまってよ～。

engChrName: Julian went to go check out the weapons shop, and he hasn't come back.
engSearchText:
Julian went to go check out the weapons shop, and he
hasn't come back.
jpnChrName: ユリアンも武具ショップを見たいって 言ってから戻ってこねえし。
jpnSearchText:
ユリアンも武具ショップを見たいって
言ってから戻ってこねえし。

engChrName: Is it just me, or am I the only one actually trying to study stuff here? Agnès, what's your take?
engSearchText:
Is it just me, or am I the only one actually trying to
study stuff here? Agnès, what's your take?
jpnChrName: あ、真面目に視察研修してんの オレだけじゃね？　なあアニエスちゃんっ！
jpnSearchText:
あ、真面目に視察研修してんの
オレだけじゃね？　なあアニエスちゃんっ！

engChrName: Er, well, who's to say?
engSearchText: Er, well, who's to say?
jpnChrName: さ、さあ、どうなんでしょう……
jpnSearchText: さ、さあ、どうなんでしょう……

engChrName: Julian was telling me that honesty is what girls like. That you gotta be yourself, y'know?
engSearchText:
Julian was telling me that honesty is what girls like.
That you gotta be yourself, y'know?
jpnChrName: 昨晩ユリアンに、女にモテるなら 誠実さを身に付けろって言われてよ。
jpnSearchText:
昨晩ユリアンに、女にモテるなら
誠実さを身に付けろって言われてよ。

engChrName: That makes a lotta sense—from this day forward, I'm gonna be the most honest guy you've ever seen!
engSearchText:
That makes a lotta sense—from this day forward, I'm
gonna be the most honest guy you've ever seen!
jpnChrName: 今日からオレは誠実に生きるぜ！ 見ててくれよな、アニエスちゃん！
jpnSearchText:
今日からオレは誠実に生きるぜ！
見ててくれよな、アニエスちゃん！

engChrName: Julian! Help a brother out!
engSearchText: Julian! Help a brother out!
jpnChrName: ユリアン～っ！　そこんとこ 是非ともプリーズミーっ！！
jpnSearchText:
ユリアン～っ！　そこんとこ
是非ともプリーズミーっ！！

engChrName: All right, all right, haha... The first step is trust, generally. Women like sincerity in a man.
engSearchText:
All right, all right, haha... The first step is
trust, generally. Women like sincerity in a man.
jpnChrName: はは……ライエルはまず 女性の信頼を勝ち取る所からかな？
jpnSearchText:
はは……ライエルはまず
女性の信頼を勝ち取る所からかな？

engChrName: Man, these new orbal goodies are where it's at!
engSearchText: Man, these new orbal goodies are where it's at!
jpnChrName: やっぱ最新の導力製品はオトコの浪漫だよな～っ！
jpnSearchText: やっぱ最新の導力製品はオトコの浪漫だよな～っ！

engChrName: This place really lives up to its name. You've got some cutting-edge tech on display here!
engSearchText:
This place really lives up to its name. You've got some
cutting-edge tech on display here!
jpnChrName: ヴェルヌプラザって言うだけあって 最高ランクのラインナップも勢ぞろいだったぜ！
jpnSearchText:
ヴェルヌプラザって言うだけあって
最高ランクのラインナップも勢ぞろいだったぜ！

engChrName: ...Not that I could afford any of this with my part-time pay. Ugh...
engSearchText:
...Not that I could afford any of this with my
part-time pay. Ugh...
jpnChrName: ……まっ、オレ様のバイト代じゃ 手が届かねえけどなっ！
jpnSearchText:
……まっ、オレ様のバイト代じゃ
手が届かねえけどなっ！

engChrName: Er, Lyle, you might not wanna say that out loud.
engSearchText: Er, Lyle, you might not wanna say that out loud.
jpnChrName: いや、ライエル…… なんでそこで自慢げなのよ～？
jpnSearchText:
いや、ライエル……
なんでそこで自慢げなのよ～？

engChrName: C'mon, c'mon, we gotta get going! There's so much to see!
engSearchText:
C'mon, c'mon, we gotta get going! There's so much
to see!
jpnChrName: なーなー、まずどこ見に行く！？
jpnSearchText: なーなー、まずどこ見に行く！？

engChrName: The motor pavilion's a hot spot, but I really wanna check out those official Verne shops, too!
engSearchText:
The motor pavilion's a hot spot, but I really wanna
check out those official Verne shops, too!
jpnChrName: モーターパビリオンも捨てがたいけど、 ヴェルヌの直営店ってのにも惹かれるよな～。
jpnSearchText:
モーターパビリオンも捨てがたいけど、
ヴェルヌの直営店ってのにも惹かれるよな～。

engChrName: Imagine gettin' my hands on one of those new stereos... They'd be a total chick magnet back home!
engSearchText:
Imagine gettin' my hands on one of those
new stereos... They'd be a total chick magnet
back home!
jpnChrName: 最新のステレオとか買い揃えたら かなりのモテステータスになんじゃね！？
jpnSearchText:
最新のステレオとか買い揃えたら
かなりのモテステータスになんじゃね！？

engChrName: Tch... Was gonna bounce, but this old fart had to trip and fall in front of me.
engSearchText:
Tch... Was gonna bounce, but this old fart had to trip
and fall in front of me.
jpnChrName: チッ……フケようと思ったら 目の前で婆さんが転んで……
jpnSearchText:
チッ……フケようと思ったら
目の前で婆さんが転んで……

engChrName: ...Wasn't nothin'. Don't need no thanks, I don't wanna stick around here any longer.
engSearchText:
...Wasn't nothin'. Don't need no thanks, I don't
wanna stick around here any longer.
jpnChrName: そ、そんだけだ。 礼なんざ、むしろ迷惑だっつの。
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんだけだ。
礼なんざ、むしろ迷惑だっつの。

engChrName: (James has always been a bit rough around the edges, but, well...)
engSearchText:
(James has always been a bit rough around the edges,
but, well...)
jpnChrName: （ジェイムス先輩、とっつきにくい人だと   思ってましたけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（ジェイムス先輩、とっつきにくい人だと
思ってましたけど……）

engChrName: (Guess he's got his reasons for actin' like a jerkoff.)
engSearchText: (Guess he's got his reasons for actin' like a jerkoff.)
jpnChrName: （ま、事情があってワルを   気取ってるだけみてえだからな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、事情があってワルを
気取ってるだけみてえだからな。）

engChrName: (But y'know, he's got a good side to him. He shows a little bit of that sometimes.)
engSearchText:
(But y'know, he's got a good side to him. He shows a
little bit of that sometimes.)
jpnChrName: （キッカケもあったようだし   少しは進んでるんじゃねえか？）
jpnSearchText:
（キッカケもあったようだし
少しは進んでるんじゃねえか？）

engChrName: (At any rate, none of my business.)
engSearchText: (At any rate, none of my business.)
jpnChrName: （ま、事情は知らねえが……）
jpnSearchText: （ま、事情は知らねえが……）

engChrName: (He strikes me as the bluffin' type. It's all an act.)
engSearchText: (He strikes me as the bluffin' type. It's all an act.)
jpnChrName: （生粋のワルっつーより   突っ張ってるだけなんじゃねえか？）
jpnSearchText:
（生粋のワルっつーより
突っ張ってるだけなんじゃねえか？）

engChrName: Puzzle game, huh? Feel like they're just toyin' with me...
engSearchText:
Puzzle game, huh? Feel like they're just toyin'
with me...
jpnChrName: 謎解きゲーム、か。 いいように使われた気もしなくはないが……
jpnSearchText:
謎解きゲーム、か。
いいように使われた気もしなくはないが……

engChrName: ...but eh. Guess it wasn't the worst way to kill some time.
engSearchText:
...but eh. Guess it wasn't the worst way to kill
some time.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、たまの気晴らしと思えば 悪くない余興だったかもな。
jpnSearchText:
……まあ、たまの気晴らしと思えば
悪くない余興だったかもな。

engChrName: Ahem! Might as well hit the sack early tonight.
engSearchText: Ahem! Might as well hit the sack early tonight.
jpnChrName: コホン、ともかく今夜は早めに休むか。 明日もそれなりに忙しいからな。
jpnSearchText:
コホン、ともかく今夜は早めに休むか。
明日もそれなりに忙しいからな。

engChrName: 'From the engineer, a pair of ZCF goggles will spell your way'?
engSearchText:
'From the engineer, a pair of ZCF goggles will spell
your way'?
jpnChrName: 『技師からＺＣＦ製のゴーグルを受け取り、   刻まれた言葉を確認せよ。』……？
jpnSearchText:
『技師からＺＣＦ製のゴーグルを受け取り、
刻まれた言葉を確認せよ。』……？

engChrName: ...What do ZCF goggles have to do with anything? I hate stupid scavenger hunts like these.
engSearchText:
...What do ZCF goggles have to do with anything?
I hate stupid scavenger hunts like these.
jpnChrName: どうしてここでＺＣＦ製のゴーグルが出て来るんだ？ これも何かのヒントなのか……？
jpnSearchText:
どうしてここでＺＣＦ製のゴーグルが出て来るんだ？
これも何かのヒントなのか……？

engChrName: Hmph. Not bad.
engSearchText: Hmph. Not bad.
jpnChrName: フン、案外悪くはねぇが……
jpnSearchText: フン、案外悪くはねぇが……

engChrName: Whenever I see one of those fancy ETWS models, I can't help but think of him...
engSearchText:
Whenever I see one of those fancy ETWS models, I
can't help but think of him...
jpnChrName: エトワスの高級車見てると、 アイツを思い出しちまうな……
jpnSearchText:
エトワスの高級車見てると、
アイツを思い出しちまうな……

engChrName: Ugh... I knew this'd be boring...
engSearchText: Ugh... I knew this'd be boring...
jpnChrName: チッ……ダルすぎんだろ……
jpnSearchText: チッ……ダルすぎんだろ……

engChrName: But no, they had to just drag me here, anyway. Freakin' Student Council president...
engSearchText:
But no, they had to just drag me here, anyway.
Freakin' Student Council president...
jpnChrName: そもそも俺は来たくて来てんじゃねーし。 ……あのクソ生徒会長の野郎が……
jpnSearchText:
そもそも俺は来たくて来てんじゃねーし。
……あのクソ生徒会長の野郎が……

engChrName: Grrgh. Just thinkin' about it's gettin' me pissed.
engSearchText: Grrgh. Just thinkin' about it's gettin' me pissed.
jpnChrName: ………ッ……… 思い出すだけで胸クソ悪ィ……
jpnSearchText:
………ッ………
思い出すだけで胸クソ悪ィ……

engChrName: (I wonder what Renne said to him...?)
engSearchText: (I wonder what Renne said to him...?)
jpnChrName: （レン先輩……何を話したんだろう……？）
jpnSearchText: （レン先輩……何を話したんだろう……？）

engChrName: Sasha's annoying, as usual. Can't gimme some peace and quiet...
engSearchText:
Sasha's annoying, as usual. Can't gimme some peace
and quiet...
jpnChrName: サーシャの野郎も張り切りやがって。 クソうぜぇんだっつの……
jpnSearchText:
サーシャの野郎も張り切りやがって。
クソうぜぇんだっつの……

engChrName: And why the hell do I gotta babysit the freshmen?
engSearchText: And why the hell do I gotta babysit the freshmen?
jpnChrName: なんで俺が下級生共の子守りなんざ……
jpnSearchText: なんで俺が下級生共の子守りなんざ……

engChrName: Oh, thank you so much, young man!
engSearchText: Oh, thank you so much, young man!
jpnChrName: ありがとうね、学生さん…… 転んだところを助けてくれるなんて。
jpnSearchText:
ありがとうね、学生さん……
転んだところを助けてくれるなんて。

engChrName: Hmm... Ohh, is your uniform from that big school in the capital? My, you're just an upstanding young man!
engSearchText:
Hmm... Ohh, is your uniform from that big school in
the capital? My, you're just an upstanding young man!
jpnChrName: その制服、首都の学校だったかしら。 なんて出来た生徒さんなんでしょう……！
jpnSearchText:
その制服、首都の学校だったかしら。
なんて出来た生徒さんなんでしょう……！

engChrName: Wha...?! No, that ain't nothin'!
engSearchText: Wha...?! No, that ain't nothin'!
jpnChrName: なっ……ンなんじゃねえ！
jpnSearchText: なっ……ンなんじゃねえ！

engChrName: I just...happened to be here. Tch. You're embarrassin' me, geezer.
engSearchText:
I just...happened to be here. Tch. You're embarrassin'
me, geezer.
jpnChrName: これはたまたまだ…… ムズ痒いこと言うんじゃねーよ。
jpnSearchText:
これはたまたまだ……
ムズ痒いこと言うんじゃねーよ。

engChrName: Oh, thank you ever so much. I just had to go out and get my groceries, in spite of everything going on...
engSearchText:
Oh, thank you ever so much. I just had to go out and
get my groceries, in spite of everything going on...
jpnChrName: 本当に助かったわ、こんな時でも お買い物はしないとだしねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
本当に助かったわ、こんな時でも
お買い物はしないとだしねぇ……

engChrName: Just, watch your stinkin' feet, okay? There's still rubble everywhere.
engSearchText:
Just, watch your stinkin' feet, okay? There's still
rubble everywhere.
jpnChrName: ……チッ、せめて足元に気を付けやがれ。 まだこの辺りだって片付いて──
jpnSearchText:
……チッ、せめて足元に気を付けやがれ。
まだこの辺りだって片付いて──

engChrName: Oh, dear. You're right... I could use a hand. Can you help me, young man?
engSearchText:
Oh, dear. You're right... I could use a hand. Can you
help me, young man?
jpnChrName: あら……送ってくれるの？
jpnSearchText: あら……送ってくれるの？

engChrName: Wha—?! H-Hell no, I—!
engSearchText: Wha—?! H-Hell no, I—!
jpnChrName: お、送るかっつーの！！
jpnSearchText: お、送るかっつーの！！

engChrName: Renne left me in charge here. I'm trying to coordinate all the students so that we can get everything sorted out.
engSearchText:
Renne left me in charge here. I'm trying to coordinate
all the students so that we can get everything
sorted out.
jpnChrName: レンから一時的に引率を任されちゃってね。 生徒への指示はあたしが出させてもらってるわ。
jpnSearchText:
レンから一時的に引率を任されちゃってね。
生徒への指示はあたしが出させてもらってるわ。

engChrName: The student council's helping me out, which is a big help...
engSearchText:
The student council's helping me out, which is a
big help...
jpnChrName: 生徒会とも連携してるし そっちは大丈夫だけど……
jpnSearchText:
生徒会とも連携してるし
そっちは大丈夫だけど……

engChrName: ...but I'm still nervous. There's a lot of time before that special unit gets here in the evening... Anything could happen before then.
engSearchText:
...but I'm still nervous. There's a lot of time before
that special unit gets here in the evening...
Anything could happen before then.
jpnChrName: 特殊部隊が到着するっていう夕方までの間── この空白期間はちょっと気になるわね。
jpnSearchText:
特殊部隊が到着するっていう夕方までの間──
この空白期間はちょっと気になるわね。

engChrName: I just need to make sure the students are all safe and accounted for.
engSearchText:
I just need to make sure the students are all safe and
accounted for.
jpnChrName: 生徒たちに万が一がないよう、 そこだけは気を配っておかないと。
jpnSearchText:
生徒たちに万が一がないよう、
そこだけは気を配っておかないと。

engChrName: I'm trying to keep all the students inside, but I've had to make a couple exceptions so far.
engSearchText:
I'm trying to keep all the students inside, but I've had
to make a couple exceptions so far.
jpnChrName: 生徒の外出は許可制にしているわ。
jpnSearchText: 生徒の外出は許可制にしているわ。

engChrName: Julian and Lyle volunteered to help with the cleanup out there, so I let them outside...
engSearchText:
Julian and Lyle volunteered to help with the cleanup
out there, so I let them outside...
jpnChrName: ユリアンとライエルはボランティアを 申し出たから許可したけど……
jpnSearchText:
ユリアンとライエルはボランティアを
申し出たから許可したけど……

engChrName: ...but then James snuck out again. Goddess, he's just such a handful.
engSearchText:
...but then James snuck out again. Goddess, he's just
such a handful.
jpnChrName: ジェイムスはまた抜け出したようね。 まったくもう……
jpnSearchText:
ジェイムスはまた抜け出したようね。
まったくもう……

engChrName: Well, I'll keep my eye out for him, and whatever else comes up. You guys be careful, too!
engSearchText:
Well, I'll keep my eye out for him, and whatever else
comes up. You guys be careful, too!
jpnChrName: ま、万が一がないよう気を配っておくわ。 アニエスたちも十分気を付けてね！
jpnSearchText:
ま、万が一がないよう気を配っておくわ。
アニエスたちも十分気を付けてね！

engChrName: So what've we got? Today's reflections, tomorrow's plans... Lots of stuff to keep track of.
engSearchText:
So what've we got? Today's reflections,
tomorrow's plans... Lots of stuff to keep track of.
jpnChrName: 今日の振り返りに、明日の予定── みんなしっかりやってるかしら？
jpnSearchText:
今日の振り返りに、明日の予定──
みんなしっかりやってるかしら？

engChrName: We sophomores have our big research papers due, too.
engSearchText:
We sophomores have our big research papers
due, too.
jpnChrName: ま、あたしたち２年も レポートを提出しないとなんだけどね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、あたしたち２年も
レポートを提出しないとなんだけどね。

engChrName: Wait, what about James? Oh, damn it, did he sneak out again?
engSearchText:
Wait, what about James? Oh, damn it, did he sneak
out again?
jpnChrName: そういえばジェイムス…… あいつまた抜け出したみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえばジェイムス……
あいつまた抜け出したみたいね。

engChrName: Renne seems to have caught wind of that... I'll leave him to her.
engSearchText:
Renne seems to have caught wind of that... I'll leave
him to her.
jpnChrName: レンも気づいてるみたいだし、 まあ今は放っておいてあげますか。
jpnSearchText:
レンも気づいてるみたいだし、
まあ今は放っておいてあげますか。

engChrName: I believe it was back in the spring when she, well...did what she did.
engSearchText:
I believe it was back in the spring when she, well...did
what she did.
jpnChrName: 今年の春だったかしらね、 レンが学校でアレをやらかしたのは──
jpnSearchText:
今年の春だったかしらね、
レンが学校でアレをやらかしたのは──

engChrName: Though in his defense, James wasn't at fault. It was his partner in crime, Ronald—and he got crushed for it. Like, I'm talkin' FLATTENED.
engSearchText:
Though in his defense, James wasn't at fault. It was
his partner in crime, Ronald—and he got crushed
for it. Like, I'm talkin' FLATTENED.
jpnChrName: どちらかって言うと、やらかしてたロナール…… ジェイムスの悪友を叩き潰したってのが正しいけど。
jpnSearchText:
どちらかって言うと、やらかしてたロナール……
ジェイムスの悪友を叩き潰したってのが正しいけど。

engChrName: Ever since then, wouldn't you know it, she's been super popular!
engSearchText:
Ever since then, wouldn't you know it, she's been
super popular!
jpnChrName: あれ以来、学校の風通しも良くなったし あの子の人気もうなぎ登りだったんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
あれ以来、学校の風通しも良くなったし
あの子の人気もうなぎ登りだったんだけど。

engChrName: James has his own recollection of things, I'm sure. He has a bit of a...cloudy disposition.
engSearchText:
James has his own recollection of things, I'm sure.
He has a bit of a...cloudy disposition.
jpnChrName: ジェイムスは思う所があるみたいでね～。 ……あいつも不器用っていうか。
jpnSearchText:
ジェイムスは思う所があるみたいでね～。
……あいつも不器用っていうか。

engChrName: If you need to tell the big four apart, look no further than their management strategies...
engSearchText:
If you need to tell the big four apart, look no further
than their management strategies...
jpnChrName: 四大ライセンシーの方向性の違いは 経営戦略にも現れていて──
jpnSearchText:
四大ライセンシーの方向性の違いは
経営戦略にも現れていて──

engChrName: (James looks like he's...having fun? Wack.)
engSearchText: (James looks like he's...having fun? Wack.)
jpnChrName: （うん、ジェイムスもそれなりに   楽しめてるかな？）
jpnSearchText:
（うん、ジェイムスもそれなりに
楽しめてるかな？）

engChrName: (I hope he finds a way to move on from all that...)
engSearchText: (I hope he finds a way to move on from all that...)
jpnChrName: （あいつもいい加減、先に進める   キッカケがあればいいんだけどね～。）
jpnSearchText:
（あいつもいい加減、先に進める
キッカケがあればいいんだけどね～。）

engChrName: Okay, everyone's here! Let's get this show on the road!
engSearchText:
Okay, everyone's here! Let's get this show on
the road!
jpnChrName: よし、全員揃ったわね！ 私達の班もそろそろ行くわよ～！
jpnSearchText:
よし、全員揃ったわね！
私達の班もそろそろ行くわよ～！

engChrName: Given who we have, the motor pavilion would be a good place to hit up first.
engSearchText:
Given who we have, the motor pavilion would be a
good place to hit up first.
jpnChrName: この面子なら、まずは モーターパビリオンからかしら。
jpnSearchText:
この面子なら、まずは
モーターパビリオンからかしら。

engChrName: I need to work together with Renne to make sure this trip is a success!
engSearchText:
I need to work together with Renne to make sure this
trip is a success!
jpnChrName: レンとも連携しつつ 上手く引率していかないとね♪
jpnSearchText:
レンとも連携しつつ
上手く引率していかないとね♪

engChrName: We're still open here, thankfully—the damage wasn't bad enough to make us close.
engSearchText:
We're still open here, thankfully—the damage wasn't
bad enough to make us close.
jpnChrName: 被害が少なかったため、完全な閉館には ならなかった事は幸いでしたが……
jpnSearchText:
被害が少なかったため、完全な閉館には
ならなかった事は幸いでしたが……

engChrName: But business is awfully slow today...and I can't blame people. Everybody's out there trying to pick up the pieces...literally.
engSearchText:
But business is awfully slow today...and I can't
blame people. Everybody's out there trying to pick up
the pieces...literally.
jpnChrName: やはり関係企業の方々も復旧でお忙しいですし、 お客様が来やすい状況でもないですしね……
jpnSearchText:
やはり関係企業の方々も復旧でお忙しいですし、
お客様が来やすい状況でもないですしね……

engChrName: That said, if you need anything, we're open and ready.
engSearchText:
That said, if you need anything, we're open
and ready.
jpnChrName: 閑散としてはいますが……一応開放していますので、 何かご用があればお入りください。
jpnSearchText:
閑散としてはいますが……一応開放していますので、
何かご用があればお入りください。

engChrName: Our lights started flickering this morning, and I'm not sure why...
engSearchText:
Our lights started flickering this morning, and I'm
not sure why...
jpnChrName: 今朝から照明が…… 時折点滅することがあるようで……
jpnSearchText:
今朝から照明が……
時折点滅することがあるようで……

engChrName: Surely the lamps aren't all going bad at once? We check them regularly.
engSearchText:
Surely the lamps aren't all going bad at once?
We check them regularly.
jpnChrName: 導力灯が切れかけているのでしょうか。 定期チェックはしているのですが……
jpnSearchText:
導力灯が切れかけているのでしょうか。
定期チェックはしているのですが……

engChrName: Hmm... I'll have to lodge a ticket with the utility people.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I'll have to lodge a ticket with the
utility people.
jpnChrName: う～ん、後で担当者に連絡して 確認してもらわないといけませんね。
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、後で担当者に連絡して
確認してもらわないといけませんね。

engChrName: There's always something going on here at the pavilion.
engSearchText:
There's always something going on here at
the pavilion.
jpnChrName: 当パビリオンでは、定期的に イベントなども催しているんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
当パビリオンでは、定期的に
イベントなども催しているんですよ。

engChrName: We do industry press conferences, Z1 photoshoots, and even RC tournaments for kids.
engSearchText:
We do industry press conferences, Z1 photoshoots,
and even RC tournaments for kids.
jpnChrName: 新車発表会にＺ１フォトコンテスト、 お子様向けのラジコン大会などもございますね。
jpnSearchText:
新車発表会にＺ１フォトコンテスト、
お子様向けのラジコン大会などもございますね。

engChrName: We make sure there's something for everyone here, so take a look around and take a load off. We hope to see you again!
engSearchText:
We make sure there's something for everyone here, so
take a look around and take a load off. We hope to
see you again!
jpnChrName: いつでもお楽しみいただけるよう 努力して参りますので、またいらして下さいね。
jpnSearchText:
いつでもお楽しみいただけるよう
努力して参りますので、またいらして下さいね。

engChrName: Welcome to the Basel Motor Pavilion. We've got the latest and greatest models from the big four on display. Do take a look!
engSearchText:
Welcome to the Basel Motor Pavilion. We've got the
latest and greatest models from the big four
on display. Do take a look!
jpnChrName: モーターパビリオンへようこそ、四大メーカーの 最新モデルをどうぞご覧ください。
jpnSearchText:
モーターパビリオンへようこそ、四大メーカーの
最新モデルをどうぞご覧ください。

engChrName: We've opened up displays for all the new models they unveiled this autumn.
engSearchText:
We've opened up displays for all the new models they
unveiled this autumn.
jpnChrName: 現在はこの秋発表の新車を 展示させていただいておりますね。
jpnSearchText:
現在はこの秋発表の新車を
展示させていただいておりますね。

engChrName: It's gotten us a lot of attention from gearheads the country over.
engSearchText:
It's gotten us a lot of attention from gearheads the
country over.
jpnChrName: ふふ、車を愛する方々が 連日詰めかけていらして……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、車を愛する方々が
連日詰めかけていらして……

engChrName: Of course, we've got models you can order today, too. Take a look around and see if there's anything you like.
engSearchText:
Of course, we've got models you can order today, too.
Take a look around and see if there's anything
you like.
jpnChrName: 即納が可能な車種もございますから、 どうかごゆっくりお楽しみくださいませ。
jpnSearchText:
即納が可能な車種もございますから、
どうかごゆっくりお楽しみくださいませ。

engChrName: Ingert's factory got hit, too, but they produce military vehicles over there, so the cars themselves were mostly fine.
engSearchText:
Ingert's factory got hit, too, but they produce military
vehicles over there, so the cars themselves were
mostly fine.
jpnChrName: インゲルトの工場も多少は被害がありましたが、 軍用車も作っている関係上守りは硬くてね……
jpnSearchText:
インゲルトの工場も多少は被害がありましたが、
軍用車も作っている関係上守りは硬くてね……

engChrName: We have a good deal of spare parts in stock here, so we're gonna try and help supply the other companies with whatever they need.
engSearchText:
We have a good deal of spare parts in stock here, so
we're gonna try and help supply the other companies
with whatever they need.
jpnChrName: 予備の機材もそれなりにストックがありますしね、 その分他の会社の手助けになりたいものです。
jpnSearchText:
予備の機材もそれなりにストックがありますしね、
その分他の会社の手助けになりたいものです。

engChrName: That's what the vice manager said, and I'm happy to stick to that.
engSearchText:
That's what the vice manager said, and I'm happy to
stick to that.
jpnChrName: 副工場長もそのつもりだと言っていましたしね。
jpnSearchText: 副工場長もそのつもりだと言っていましたしね。

engChrName: We've got our own problems to iron out, though. Our communications network got thrown out of whack here...
engSearchText:
We've got our own problems to iron out, though.
Our communications network got thrown out of
whack here...
jpnChrName: しかしこの展示場も通信などの調子が 悪くなってきたそうで……
jpnSearchText:
しかしこの展示場も通信などの調子が
悪くなってきたそうで……

engChrName: I have a friend who works for a factory on the outskirts of town. Turns out their comms are all messed up, too.
engSearchText:
I have a friend who works for a factory on the
outskirts of town. Turns out their comms are all
messed up, too.
jpnChrName: 実は今朝、郊外にて副工場長をしている 同期からも似たような話を聞きましてね。
jpnSearchText:
実は今朝、郊外にて副工場長をしている
同期からも似たような話を聞きましてね。

engChrName: I knew a lot of places got damaged, but I wasn't expecting that they'd get through to all the big factories and facilities, too...
engSearchText:
I knew a lot of places got damaged, but I wasn't
expecting that they'd get through to all the big
factories and facilities, too...
jpnChrName: バーゼル全域で不調が起きているとはいえ、 こうした最新施設にまで影響が出るとは。
jpnSearchText:
バーゼル全域で不調が起きているとはいえ、
こうした最新施設にまで影響が出るとは。

engChrName: The factories and the pavilion are constantly having their instruments checked...
engSearchText:
The factories and the pavilion are constantly having
their instruments checked...
jpnChrName: 工場もパビリオンも、機器の点検は常に 抜かりなく行っているのに……
jpnSearchText:
工場もパビリオンも、機器の点検は常に
抜かりなく行っているのに……

engChrName: Petra's been putting a lot of thought into remodeling Leno's brand image. She's trying to get more mass-market appeal.
engSearchText:
Petra's been putting a lot of thought into remodeling
Leno's brand image. She's trying to get more
mass-market appeal.
jpnChrName: ペトラさんも、レノという大衆向けのブランドを いかに魅力的に売るかをよく考えている。
jpnSearchText:
ペトラさんも、レノという大衆向けのブランドを
いかに魅力的に売るかをよく考えている。

engChrName: I could stand to learn a lot from her marketing tactics. She really knows how to get products out there.
engSearchText:
I could stand to learn a lot from her marketing tactics.
She really knows how to get products out there.
jpnChrName: 色々な人に売り込むって意味では、 私にとっても参考になるところも多い。
jpnSearchText:
色々な人に売り込むって意味では、
私にとっても参考になるところも多い。

engChrName: Ingert has its customer base, but we're looking to broaden our reach, too, where we can.
engSearchText:
Ingert has its customer base, but we're looking to
broaden our reach, too, where we can.
jpnChrName: インゲルトは人を選ぶかもしれないが、 ある程度は顧客層も広げたいですしな。
jpnSearchText:
インゲルトは人を選ぶかもしれないが、
ある程度は顧客層も広げたいですしな。

engChrName: What can I do you for? You interested in a... Ohh, hold on. I see that glint in your eye. You're a fan, aren't you?
engSearchText:
What can I do you for? You interested in a...
Ohh, hold on. I see that glint in your eye. You're a
fan, aren't you?
jpnChrName: 《インゲルト》の製品にご関心がおありですか？ いや……察するに既にご愛用されているので？
jpnSearchText:
《インゲルト》の製品にご関心がおありですか？
いや……察するに既にご愛用されているので？

engChrName: Good catch! My pickup's my baby—actually took it out here with me!
engSearchText:
Good catch! My pickup's my baby—actually took it
out here with me!
jpnChrName: ああ……よく分かったな！ ここにもお宅のＰＵに乗って……！
jpnSearchText:
ああ……よく分かったな！
ここにもお宅のＰＵに乗って……！

engChrName: 'Eyy, a man of culture! I can tell by that look in your eyes that you know quality when you see it.
engSearchText:
'Eyy, a man of culture! I can tell by that look in your
eyes that you know quality when you see it.
jpnChrName: はは、やはりそうでしたか。 インゲルトのユーザーは視線で分かりますよ。
jpnSearchText:
はは、やはりそうでしたか。
インゲルトのユーザーは視線で分かりますよ。

engChrName: We pride ourselves on how modular our cars are. They're strong, they're durable, and you can customize 'em however you want!
engSearchText:
We pride ourselves on how modular our cars are.
They're strong, they're durable, and you can
customize 'em however you want!
jpnChrName: 我が社の製品は馬力と耐久性に加え、 各種カスタム向きの拡張性が売りですからね。
jpnSearchText:
我が社の製品は馬力と耐久性に加え、
各種カスタム向きの拡張性が売りですからね。

engChrName: I saw you walk in and your eyes just jumped right to the suspension and cooling—I know those are popular mods on our models.
engSearchText:
I saw you walk in and your eyes just jumped right to
the suspension and cooling—I know those are
popular mods on our models.
jpnChrName: お客様は車体全体より、カスタムにおいて重要な ラジエーターや車軸等を熱心に見ていらした。
jpnSearchText:
お客様は車体全体より、カスタムにおいて重要な
ラジエーターや車軸等を熱心に見ていらした。

engChrName: You're an avid aftermarket shopper yourself, if I had to guess. You know exactly where to look.
engSearchText:
You're an avid aftermarket shopper yourself, if I had
to guess. You know exactly where to look.
jpnChrName: 当社製品の熱心なユーザーは、そういう部分に 自然と目が行く傾向があるものでしてな。
jpnSearchText:
当社製品の熱心なユーザーは、そういう部分に
自然と目が行く傾向があるものでしてな。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. Guilty as charged. But y'know, it takes that same kinda mindset to KNOW people like doin' that.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. Guilty as charged. But y'know, it takes that
same kinda mindset to KNOW people like doin' that.
jpnChrName: はは、そいつは一本取られた。 だが、それが判るあんたも、中々なもんだな？
jpnSearchText:
はは、そいつは一本取られた。
だが、それが判るあんたも、中々なもんだな？

engChrName: So somethin' tells me you're a gearhead yourself. Am I right?
engSearchText:
So somethin' tells me you're a gearhead yourself.
Am I right?
jpnChrName: インゲルトの社員ってだけじゃねぇ…… あんたも結構嗜んでいるんじゃないのか？
jpnSearchText:
インゲルトの社員ってだけじゃねぇ……
あんたも結構嗜んでいるんじゃないのか？

engChrName: Haha... You got me. I probably spend like half my bonuses on aftermarket mods.
engSearchText:
Haha... You got me. I probably spend like half my
bonuses on aftermarket mods.
jpnChrName: ええ、それは勿論。 ボーナスの半分はカスタムにつぎ込むほどで……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、それは勿論。
ボーナスの半分はカスタムにつぎ込むほどで……

engChrName: I've got some photos of my new project here, you wanna take a look?
engSearchText:
I've got some photos of my new project here, you
wanna take a look?
jpnChrName: もし良ければ、我が愛車の写真を お見せしましょうか？
jpnSearchText:
もし良ければ、我が愛車の写真を
お見せしましょうか？

engChrName: Oh, I'd just be honored. What kinda pimped-out ride does an honest-to-Goddess Ingert engineer come up with?
engSearchText:
Oh, I'd just be honored. What kinda pimped-out ride
does an honest-to-Goddess Ingert engineer come
up with?
jpnChrName: インゲルトのベテラン社員のカスタム……！ よし、参考までに──
jpnSearchText:
インゲルトのベテラン社員のカスタム……！
よし、参考までに──

engChrName: ...NOW who's slacking off on the job?
engSearchText: ...NOW who's slacking off on the job?
jpnChrName: ……そろそろ仕事に戻ろうぜ、おっさん。
jpnSearchText: ……そろそろ仕事に戻ろうぜ、おっさん。

engChrName: Part of what makes this job so satisfying is meeting customers and getting their feedback on our products.
engSearchText:
Part of what makes this job so satisfying is meeting
customers and getting their feedback on our products.
jpnChrName: ユーザーにお会いして言葉を交わせるのも、 メーカー販売員のやり甲斐の一つですね。
jpnSearchText:
ユーザーにお会いして言葉を交わせるのも、
メーカー販売員のやり甲斐の一つですね。

engChrName: We really hammer in how utilitarian and customizable our cars are, and that gets us a more specific customer demographic compared to Leno.
engSearchText:
We really hammer in how utilitarian and
customizable our cars are, and that gets us a more
specific customer demographic compared to Leno.
jpnChrName: 当社の売りは実用性と拡張性……その意味で、 レノなどに比べ、拘りのあるお客様も多い。
jpnSearchText:
当社の売りは実用性と拡張性……その意味で、
レノなどに比べ、拘りのあるお客様も多い。

engChrName: So when I talk to a customer about our models and aftermarket mods, we really see eye to eye a lot. It's like making a friend!
engSearchText:
So when I talk to a customer about our models and
aftermarket mods, we really see eye to eye a lot.
It's like making a friend!
jpnChrName: そうした方々に各種のモデルやカスタムを直接 紹介できるのですから、面白いものです。
jpnSearchText:
そうした方々に各種のモデルやカスタムを直接
紹介できるのですから、面白いものです。

engChrName: How's about a drink tonight, Chamberlain? It's been a while since we hit the town together.
engSearchText:
How's about a drink tonight, Chamberlain? It's been
a while since we hit the town together.
jpnChrName: チェンバレンさん、 久しぶりにこの後一杯どうですか？
jpnSearchText:
チェンバレンさん、
久しぶりにこの後一杯どうですか？

engChrName: I figure we both deserve it—we both got put through the wringer, but we went and hit our sales quotas anyway!
engSearchText:
I figure we both deserve it—we both got put through
the wringer, but we went and hit our sales
quotas anyway!
jpnChrName: お互い、社内では多少不調もありましたが、 目標の売り上げも達成できそうですし、息抜きに。
jpnSearchText:
お互い、社内では多少不調もありましたが、
目標の売り上げも達成できそうですし、息抜きに。

engChrName: I might take you up on that. I could use a break to unwind after how hectic it's been lately.
engSearchText:
I might take you up on that. I could use a break to
unwind after how hectic it's been lately.
jpnChrName: それは良いですね、ここのところは 忙しかったですし、気晴らしと行きますか。
jpnSearchText:
それは良いですね、ここのところは
忙しかったですし、気晴らしと行きますか。

engChrName: I do have some business stuff I wanted to talk to you about, though—like cost-cutting tactics and those new safety regs, namely.
engSearchText:
I do have some business stuff I wanted to talk to you
about, though—like cost-cutting tactics and those
new safety regs, namely.
jpnChrName: 久しぶりに、そちらの安全対策や低価格戦略の 話も参考に聞いてみたいですしね。
jpnSearchText:
久しぶりに、そちらの安全対策や低価格戦略の
話も参考に聞いてみたいですしね。

engChrName: I personally want to try and broaden Ingert's customer base, too. Maybe you could teach me a thing or two?
engSearchText:
I personally want to try and broaden Ingert's customer
base, too. Maybe you could teach me a thing or two?
jpnChrName: 私個人の望みですが、インゲルト車も 客層を広げて良い頃合いと思うのでね。
jpnSearchText:
私個人の望みですが、インゲルト車も
客層を広げて良い頃合いと思うのでね。

engChrName: Well, I wouldn't mind that...just as long as it doesn't get in the way of my frothy mugs.
engSearchText:
Well, I wouldn't mind that...just as long as it doesn't
get in the way of my frothy mugs.
jpnChrName: まあ、その辺りも息抜きを害さない程度に……
jpnSearchText: まあ、その辺りも息抜きを害さない程度に……

engChrName: Competitors we may be, but we're fellow four-wheelers first and foremost!
engSearchText:
Competitors we may be, but we're fellow
four-wheelers first and foremost!
jpnChrName: お互いライバルとは言え、共和国の車を 広めていきたい思いは一緒ですからね。
jpnSearchText:
お互いライバルとは言え、共和国の車を
広めていきたい思いは一緒ですからね。

engChrName: Seriously...? They wrecked the Leno factory's whole assembly line?
engSearchText:
Seriously...? They wrecked the Leno factory's whole
assembly line?
jpnChrName: 何と……レノの工場では工作機械が 壊されてしまったのですか……
jpnSearchText:
何と……レノの工場では工作機械が
壊されてしまったのですか……

engChrName: They did... There's no timetable for when we'll have everything back up and running.
engSearchText:
They did... There's no timetable for when we'll have
everything back up and running.
jpnChrName: ええ……工場勤めの後輩が言うには工作機械の 入れ替えの目途も立っていないらしくて……
jpnSearchText:
ええ……工場勤めの後輩が言うには工作機械の
入れ替えの目途も立っていないらしくて……

engChrName: We can't order anything right now, anyway, because our suppliers got hit, too. It's looking like we'll be out of commission for a while...
engSearchText:
We can't order anything right now, anyway, because
our suppliers got hit, too. It's looking like we'll be out
of commission for a while...
jpnChrName: 何せ工作機械メーカーも何社か被害を…… レノ第二工場もいつ操業再開できるか……
jpnSearchText:
何せ工作機械メーカーも何社か被害を……
レノ第二工場もいつ操業再開できるか……

engChrName: Hmm... You know, I recall you guys were still using last-gen manufacturing tools over there, right?
engSearchText:
Hmm... You know, I recall you guys were still using
last-gen manufacturing tools over there, right?
jpnChrName: ふむ……そういえば、レノの工作機械はうちより 一世代前の型がまだ主力でしたよね？
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……そういえば、レノの工作機械はうちより
一世代前の型がまだ主力でしたよね？

engChrName: Our Factory 3 might have some of those old tools lying around—we retrofitted the place with newer parts.
engSearchText:
Our Factory 3 might have some of those old tools
lying around—we retrofitted the place with
newer parts.
jpnChrName: 実はインゲルト第三工場では、 前のモデルの機械類もまだ保管されていたはず。
jpnSearchText:
実はインゲルト第三工場では、
前のモデルの機械類もまだ保管されていたはず。

engChrName: The vice manager and I go way back, so I might be able to call in a favor and get that stuff transferred to Leno.
engSearchText:
The vice manager and I go way back, so I might be
able to call in a favor and get that stuff transferred
to Leno.
jpnChrName: そこの副工場長とは旧知の仲ですし、 レノ側に譲渡できないか話してみましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
そこの副工場長とは旧知の仲ですし、
レノ側に譲渡できないか話してみましょうか。

engChrName: It was built to Verne's specifications, if I recall, but it should work on a Leno assembly line with some tweaking.
engSearchText:
It was built to Verne's specifications, if I recall, but it
should work on a Leno assembly line with
some tweaking.
jpnChrName: 確かに同じヴェルヌ規格ですし、微調整をすれば レノの製造ラインにも組み込めますが……
jpnSearchText:
確かに同じヴェルヌ規格ですし、微調整をすれば
レノの製造ラインにも組み込めますが……

engChrName: You'd really do that for us?
engSearchText: You'd really do that for us?
jpnChrName: 本当にお願いしていただけるのですか？
jpnSearchText: 本当にお願いしていただけるのですか？

engChrName: Of course. We're friends first and business rivals second. At the end of the day, we have the same passion for automotive engineering.
engSearchText:
Of course. We're friends first and business
rivals second. At the end of the day, we have the same
passion for automotive engineering.
jpnChrName: ええ、困った時はお互い様ですし、私達は 本質的には同志ですし気にしないでください。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、困った時はお互い様ですし、私達は
本質的には同志ですし気にしないでください。

engChrName: I'll shoot him a message. Can you get me a list of your damaged equipment at some point?
engSearchText:
I'll shoot him a message. Can you get me a list of your
damaged equipment at some point?
jpnChrName: 副工場長にメールしておきますよ、 あとで壊れた機材のリストを教えてもらえれば。
jpnSearchText:
副工場長にメールしておきますよ、
あとで壊れた機材のリストを教えてもらえれば。

engChrName: Man, I knew Chamberlain had connections, but I never thought he'd go that far out of his way for us...
engSearchText:
Man, I knew Chamberlain had connections, but I
never thought he'd go that far out of his way for us...
jpnChrName: チェンバレンさんが工場の方と親しいのは 知っていましたが、まさかこんな打診を頂けるとは。
jpnSearchText:
チェンバレンさんが工場の方と親しいのは
知っていましたが、まさかこんな打診を頂けるとは。

engChrName: Well, I'd better hold up my end of the plan. I'll get in touch with Factory 2.
engSearchText:
Well, I'd better hold up my end of the plan. I'll get in
touch with Factory 2.
jpnChrName: それでは私も、工場方面に改めて 確認を取らないと……
jpnSearchText:
それでは私も、工場方面に改めて
確認を取らないと……

engChrName: It's times like these when we gotta put our differences aside and work as a team!
engSearchText:
It's times like these when we gotta put our differences
aside and work as a team!
jpnChrName: こんな時こそ、ヴェルヌ・グループで手を取り合い 乗り越えねばなりませんね……！
jpnSearchText:
こんな時こそ、ヴェルヌ・グループで手を取り合い
乗り越えねばなりませんね……！

engChrName: I'm hearing that the factory on the outskirts of town has been having power and comms trouble, too...
engSearchText:
I'm hearing that the factory on the outskirts of town
has been having power and comms trouble, too...
jpnChrName: どうにもバーゼル郊外の工場でも通信や エネルギー供給が不安定なようで……
jpnSearchText:
どうにもバーゼル郊外の工場でも通信や
エネルギー供給が不安定なようで……

engChrName: They're manufacturing our new model—it's supposed to go on sale in the spring. I hope they get that resolved soon...and that it doesn't spread.
engSearchText:
They're manufacturing our new model—it's supposed
to go on sale in the spring. I hope they get that
resolved soon...and that it doesn't spread.
jpnChrName: 来春に発売する新車も製造ラインに乗った事ですし 製造ミスに波及しない事を願いたいものです……
jpnSearchText:
来春に発売する新車も製造ラインに乗った事ですし
製造ミスに波及しない事を願いたいものです……

engChrName: Having someone like Chamberlain in charge at Ingert really lights a fire under me. It's like having a good rival, y'know?
engSearchText:
Having someone like Chamberlain in charge at Ingert
really lights a fire under me. It's like having a good
rival, y'know?
jpnChrName: チェンバレンさんのような優秀な方がインゲルトの 担当者なのは、私としても色々刺激を受けますよ。
jpnSearchText:
チェンバレンさんのような優秀な方がインゲルトの
担当者なのは、私としても色々刺激を受けますよ。

engChrName: We push each other to grow and develop bigger, better stuff—in the end, we both benefit!
engSearchText:
We push each other to grow and develop bigger,
better stuff—in the end, we both benefit!
jpnChrName: やはり、競い甲斐のあるライバルがいてこそ、 高め合える事も多いですからね。
jpnSearchText:
やはり、競い甲斐のあるライバルがいてこそ、
高め合える事も多いですからね。

engChrName: We're seeing that firsthand with Leno's success. I and the company as a whole grow and improve every day!
engSearchText:
We're seeing that firsthand with Leno's success. I and
the company as a whole grow and improve every day!
jpnChrName: 私自身もレノのブランドも、 まだまだ成長していけるはずです！
jpnSearchText:
私自身もレノのブランドも、
まだまだ成長していけるはずです！

engChrName: Welcome to the Leno exhibition space! This is our flagship model here.
engSearchText:
Welcome to the Leno exhibition space! This is our
flagship model here.
jpnChrName: 《レノ》の展示スペースへようこそ。 今期の注目は、こちらのモデルになります。
jpnSearchText:
《レノ》の展示スペースへようこそ。
今期の注目は、こちらのモデルになります。

engChrName: We worked hard on the interior for this revision to try and court older drivers. It's much more comfortable inside than before!
engSearchText:
We worked hard on the interior for this revision to
try and court older drivers. It's much more
comfortable inside than before!
jpnChrName: 高齢者ドライバーの増加を見据えての、 計器表示やシートの構造を工夫したもので……
jpnSearchText:
高齢者ドライバーの増加を見据えての、
計器表示やシートの構造を工夫したもので……

engChrName: Leno's the everyman's car, yeah? I see them all over the place nowadays.
engSearchText:
Leno's the everyman's car, yeah? I see them all over
the place nowadays.
jpnChrName: レノってのは確か、大衆向けの クセが少ない乗用車が得意なところか。
jpnSearchText:
レノってのは確か、大衆向けの
クセが少ない乗用車が得意なところか。

engChrName: When I was taking driver's ed, they stuffed me in a Leno made for newbies.
engSearchText:
When I was taking driver's ed, they stuffed me in a
Leno made for newbies.
jpnChrName: オレが免許取った時の教習車も、 初心者向けだって事でレノの車だったな。
jpnSearchText:
オレが免許取った時の教習車も、
初心者向けだって事でレノの車だったな。

engChrName: Leno specializes in safety and economy, rather than power or carrying capacity.
engSearchText:
Leno specializes in safety and economy, rather than
power or carrying capacity.
jpnChrName: 積載力やエンジン出力よりも安全性と 買いやすい値段を重視してる会社ですし。
jpnSearchText:
積載力やエンジン出力よりも安全性と
買いやすい値段を重視してる会社ですし。

engChrName: Per their slogan, they manufacture 'cars everyone can count on'.
engSearchText:
Per their slogan, they manufacture 'cars everyone can
count on'.
jpnChrName: “家族で使う車”や“初心者にも安心” といったイメージも強いかと……
jpnSearchText:
“家族で使う車”や“初心者にも安心”
といったイメージも強いかと……

engChrName: That's the common perception, yeah. We're a big hit with families and people who need daily drivers.
engSearchText:
That's the common perception, yeah. We're a big hit
with families and people who need daily drivers.
jpnChrName: ええ、確かにそうしたイメージを持たれる 方も多いかもしれないですね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、確かにそうしたイメージを持たれる
方も多いかもしれないですね。

engChrName: But that's not all we do! We make RC cars, off-roaders, and we field entries on the Z1 circuit, too.
engSearchText:
But that's not all we do! We make RC cars,
off-roaders, and we field entries on the Z1
circuit, too.
jpnChrName: ですが最近はＲＣなどのオフロード車の開発や Ｚ１のリベンジに向けての取り組みもしており……
jpnSearchText:
ですが最近はＲＣなどのオフロード車の開発や
Ｚ１のリベンジに向けての取り組みもしており……

engChrName: We're careful not to pigeonhole ourselves into any one niche. We're growing and evolving every day.
engSearchText:
We're careful not to pigeonhole ourselves into any
one niche. We're growing and evolving every day.
jpnChrName: 我が社もこう見えて進化を続けているのですよ。
jpnSearchText: 我が社もこう見えて進化を続けているのですよ。

engChrName: That's what we're all about: we make cars you can count on, no matter what it is you do.
engSearchText:
That's what we're all about: we make cars you can
count on, no matter what it is you do.
jpnChrName: レノのモットーはより多くの人に 安全で便利な車に親しんでもらう事。
jpnSearchText:
レノのモットーはより多くの人に
安全で便利な車に親しんでもらう事。

engChrName: We really pride ourselves on that mass appeal: our cars have been adopted by just about every class and demographic.
engSearchText:
We really pride ourselves on that mass appeal: our
cars have been adopted by just about every class
and demographic.
jpnChrName: 他のメーカーよりも多くの層に受け入れて いただいていると自負しております。
jpnSearchText:
他のメーカーよりも多くの層に受け入れて
いただいていると自負しております。

engChrName: They're plenty safe and a cinch to drive, making them popular with all different kinds of people.
engSearchText:
They're plenty safe and a cinch to drive, making them
popular with all different kinds of people.
jpnChrName: 当社は、運転のしやすさと徹底した安全性能で より多くの人に親しんでいただいていますので。
jpnSearchText:
当社は、運転のしやすさと徹底した安全性能で
より多くの人に親しんでいただいていますので。

engChrName: I actually got some money from that Kaela lady after what happened.
engSearchText:
I actually got some money from that Kaela lady after
what happened.
jpnChrName: 実はあの後、カエラさんって人から 協力金を貰っちゃったの。
jpnSearchText:
実はあの後、カエラさんって人から
協力金を貰っちゃったの。

engChrName: I told her I didn't need it, but she insisted. She wanted to thank me for the help.
engSearchText:
I told her I didn't need it, but she insisted.
She wanted to thank me for the help.
jpnChrName: いらないって言ったんだけど、どうしても 『協力に見合った礼をさせてほしい』って言われてね。
jpnSearchText:
いらないって言ったんだけど、どうしても
『協力に見合った礼をさせてほしい』って言われてね。

engChrName: So what do I spend it on? Maybe I'll get me some souvenirs...
engSearchText:
So what do I spend it on? Maybe I'll get me
some souvenirs...
jpnChrName: 折角だし、この浮いたミラで バーゼルのお土産でも買っちゃおうかしら。
jpnSearchText:
折角だし、この浮いたミラで
バーゼルのお土産でも買っちゃおうかしら。

engChrName: This... This isn't really happening, is it?
engSearchText: This... This isn't really happening, is it?
jpnChrName: まさかこんな事になっちゃうなんて……
jpnSearchText: まさかこんな事になっちゃうなんて……

engChrName: N-No, snap out of it! I have to do something! My Kabul got cut up from all the shrapnel!
engSearchText:
N-No, snap out of it! I have to do something!
My Kabul got cut up from all the shrapnel!
jpnChrName: カブールも破片とかで細かい傷が 付いちゃったみたいだし、何とかしないと！
jpnSearchText:
カブールも破片とかで細かい傷が
付いちゃったみたいだし、何とかしないと！

engChrName: It's up to me now. No excuses!
engSearchText: It's up to me now. No excuses!
jpnChrName: ついでにやれる事があったら 力になりたいよねっ！
jpnSearchText:
ついでにやれる事があったら
力になりたいよねっ！

engChrName: My uncle wanted me to run some errands for him in exchange for covering my travel costs.
engSearchText:
My uncle wanted me to run some errands for him in
exchange for covering my travel costs.
jpnChrName: 伯父さんに旅費出してもらったんだけど、 条件としてお使いするよう言われててさ～！
jpnSearchText:
伯父さんに旅費出してもらったんだけど、
条件としてお使いするよう言われててさ～！

engChrName: Get this: one of his old friends is a factory manager! And I get to meet him! You think I'll get to watch him work, too?!
engSearchText:
Get this: one of his old friends is a factory manager!
And I get to meet him! You think I'll get to watch
him work, too?!
jpnChrName: でもインゲルトの工場長やってるらしいから もしかしたら見学させてもらえるかも……！？
jpnSearchText:
でもインゲルトの工場長やってるらしいから
もしかしたら見学させてもらえるかも……！？

engChrName: I'll have to ask my uncle! Surely he can pull some strings for his super cute niece?!
engSearchText:
I'll have to ask my uncle! Surely he can pull some
strings for his super cute niece?!
jpnChrName: エッヘン、ここは可愛い姪っ子力を発揮して 頼み込んでみよっかな～？
jpnSearchText:
エッヘン、ここは可愛い姪っ子力を発揮して
頼み込んでみよっかな～？

engChrName: My uncle was an Ingert engineer, so I'm a big Ingert fangirl, too!
engSearchText:
My uncle was an Ingert engineer, so I'm a big Ingert
fangirl, too!
jpnChrName: 伯父さんがインゲルトで技師やってたからね。 あたしもインゲルトは好きなんだよね～！
jpnSearchText:
伯父さんがインゲルトで技師やってたからね。
あたしもインゲルトは好きなんだよね～！

engChrName: I drive a Leno, though. It's what I can afford!
engSearchText: I drive a Leno, though. It's what I can afford!
jpnChrName: ま、愛車は可愛いレノを使ってるけど スポーティなのも悪くないっていうか！
jpnSearchText:
ま、愛車は可愛いレノを使ってるけど
スポーティなのも悪くないっていうか！

engChrName: I really wanna get a sports car, though. Once I scrounge up enough mira... Gah, I just can't wait!
engSearchText:
I really wanna get a sports car, though. Once I
scrounge up enough mira... Gah, I just can't wait!
jpnChrName: いつかあたしもミラを貯めて……！ う～ん、待ちきれないよ～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
いつかあたしもミラを貯めて……！
う～ん、待ちきれないよ～っ！！

jpnChrName: あ、お二人は……
jpnSearchText: あ、お二人は……

engChrName: Oh, hey, you two. Didn't know you were comin' out here.
engSearchText:
Oh, hey, you two. Didn't know you were comin'
out here.
jpnChrName: ユニファとグレアムじゃねえか。 なんだ、来てたのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
ユニファとグレアムじゃねえか。
なんだ、来てたのかよ？

engChrName: We're planning a big drive, so we figured why not?
engSearchText: We're planning a big drive, so we figured why not?
jpnChrName: うんうん、首都から遠征がてら たまに車を飛ばして来てるんだよね～！
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、首都から遠征がてら
たまに車を飛ばして来てるんだよね～！

engChrName: We wanted to check out those new models from autumn... Man, these things rock!
engSearchText:
We wanted to check out those new models
from autumn... Man, these things rock!
jpnChrName: 秋の新車目当てだったんだが…… やっぱりスポーツカーは最高だな！
jpnSearchText:
秋の新車目当てだったんだが……
やっぱりスポーツカーは最高だな！

engChrName: Cosmetically, it doesn't look much different from my old model, but the suspension here is...
engSearchText:
Cosmetically, it doesn't look much different from my
old model, but the suspension here is...
jpnChrName: 俺が買った時よりマイナーチェンジ したみたいだが、足回りのチューニングが……
jpnSearchText:
俺が買った時よりマイナーチェンジ
したみたいだが、足回りのチューニングが……

engChrName: Man, this thing's gonna fly right through the corners! That's Ingert for you—they know how to get the best outta their parts!
engSearchText:
Man, this thing's gonna fly right through the corners!
That's Ingert for you—they know how to get the best
outta their parts!
jpnChrName: これでコーナリング性能も上げてくるなんて さっすがインゲルト！　ニクいよね～！！
jpnSearchText:
これでコーナリング性能も上げてくるなんて
さっすがインゲルト！　ニクいよね～！！

engChrName: And are those new tire compounds, too? Haven't seen these before. Hah, they're always lookin' for ways to improve!
engSearchText:
And are those new tire compounds, too? Haven't seen
these before. Hah, they're always lookin' for ways
to improve!
jpnChrName: ああ、タイヤも新素材を使ってるらしい。 この辺りの合わせ技が真骨頂っつーか……！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、タイヤも新素材を使ってるらしい。
この辺りの合わせ技が真骨頂っつーか……！

engChrName: As if he weren't enough of a kid in a candy store... Not knocking it, though.
engSearchText:
As if he weren't enough of a kid in a candy store...
Not knocking it, though.
jpnChrName: ハッ、ガキみたいに目を輝かせやがって…… まあ気持ちはわかるけどよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、ガキみたいに目を輝かせやがって……
まあ気持ちはわかるけどよ。

engChrName: (Aaron looks like he's having fun, too.)
engSearchText: (Aaron looks like he's having fun, too.)
jpnChrName: （そういうアーロンさんも   なんだか楽しそうですけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（そういうアーロンさんも
なんだか楽しそうですけど……）

engChrName: (This pavilion does seem to draw like-minded fans.)
engSearchText: (This pavilion does seem to draw like-minded fans.)
jpnChrName: （ふふっ、ここには自然と   導力車好きの方が集まるのかもしれませんね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふっ、ここには自然と
導力車好きの方が集まるのかもしれませんね。）

engChrName: Oooh, this is that new ETWS model... Man, that price, though!
engSearchText:
Oooh, this is that new ETWS model... Man, that
price, though!
jpnChrName: これが噂のエトワスの新車…… ちょっと値段もハンパないね……
jpnSearchText:
これが噂のエトワスの新車……
ちょっと値段もハンパないね……

engChrName: That thing's a monster. Bet you the High Bloods have one of those.
engSearchText:
That thing's a monster. Bet you the High Bloods
have one of those.
jpnChrName: まさにモンスターマシンだな。 《ハイブラッズ》のリーダーの車も恐らくは……
jpnSearchText:
まさにモンスターマシンだな。
《ハイブラッズ》のリーダーの車も恐らくは……

engChrName: Grr! How DARE they one-up Ingert! I-I mean, it's not like I'm jealous!
engSearchText:
Grr! How DARE they one-up Ingert! I-I mean, it's
not like I'm jealous!
jpnChrName: むむむっ！　打倒エトワス！！ 羨ましくなんてないんだからねっ！！
jpnSearchText:
むむむっ！　打倒エトワス！！
羨ましくなんてないんだからねっ！！

engChrName: That was really nice—got to see the Z1 exhibit and everything. Probably best we head on home, now.
engSearchText:
That was really nice—got to see the Z1 exhibit
and everything. Probably best we head on home, now.
jpnChrName: Ｚ１マシンの展示も堪能したし、 そろそろ帰る頃合いかもな。
jpnSearchText:
Ｚ１マシンの展示も堪能したし、
そろそろ帰る頃合いかもな。

engChrName: Yeah, I'm fresh out of travel money now. I really owe my uncle for that.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I'm fresh out of travel money now. I really owe
my uncle for that.
jpnChrName: そだね～、伯父さんに貰った旅費も 大体使っちゃったし。
jpnSearchText:
そだね～、伯父さんに貰った旅費も
大体使っちゃったし。

engChrName: Oh, wait, that reminds me! He told me to say hello to a friend of his at the factory! He said he's a manager there!
engSearchText:
Oh, wait, that reminds me! He told me to say hello to
a friend of his at the factory! He said he's a
manager there!
jpnChrName: そうだ、伯父さんの元同僚が工場長やってるから 挨拶しとけって言われてたんだっけ！
jpnSearchText:
そうだ、伯父さんの元同僚が工場長やってるから
挨拶しとけって言われてたんだっけ！

engChrName: Hah, go figure he's got friends in high places. Sure, why not?
engSearchText:
Hah, go figure he's got friends in high places.
Sure, why not?
jpnChrName: ハハ、流石はインゲルトの元技師だよな。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、流石はインゲルトの元技師だよな。

engChrName: I know it's kinda just an errand, but man, the thought of meeting a factory manager has me psyched!
engSearchText:
I know it's kinda just an errand, but man, the thought
of meeting a factory manager has me psyched!
jpnChrName: お使いの一環とはいえ、そんな人に会えるなんざ 俺たちにとっても有り難い話だぜ……！
jpnSearchText:
お使いの一環とはいえ、そんな人に会えるなんざ
俺たちにとっても有り難い話だぜ……！

engChrName: Right? I'm gonna ask if we can watch him work!
engSearchText: Right? I'm gonna ask if we can watch him work!
jpnChrName: うんうん、ついでに見学させて もらえないか頼んでみよっか～っ！
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、ついでに見学させて
もらえないか頼んでみよっか～っ！

engChrName: Whew... Yesterday was just wild.
engSearchText: Whew... Yesterday was just wild.
jpnChrName: いや～、昨日は大変だったよ！
jpnSearchText: いや～、昨日は大変だったよ！

engChrName: We were coming home from the Ingert factory, and wham! That's when the attack broke out!
engSearchText:
We were coming home from the Ingert factory,
and wham! That's when the attack broke out!
jpnChrName: インゲルトの工場から帰る所で あの襲撃事件が起きちゃってさ～っ！
jpnSearchText:
インゲルトの工場から帰る所で
あの襲撃事件が起きちゃってさ～っ！

engChrName: We made a beeline for the car and booked it outta there—like an action movie, I swear!
engSearchText:
We made a beeline for the car and booked it outta
there—like an action movie, I swear!
jpnChrName: 無我夢中で車を出して振り切ったが…… どこぞのアクション映画みたいになっちまったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
無我夢中で車を出して振り切ったが……
どこぞのアクション映画みたいになっちまったぜ。

engChrName: But now we're stuck here. They've closed down the road back to the capital, so...now what?
engSearchText:
But now we're stuck here. They've closed down the
road back to the capital, so...now what?
jpnChrName: 交通規制とかで首都にも帰れなく なっちまったし……どうしたもんだかな。
jpnSearchText:
交通規制とかで首都にも帰れなく
なっちまったし……どうしたもんだかな。

engChrName: And they're saying the Ingert factory was damaged, too...
engSearchText:
And they're saying the Ingert factory was
damaged, too...
jpnChrName: うん……インゲルトの工場も 被害があったみたいだし……
jpnSearchText:
うん……インゲルトの工場も
被害があったみたいだし……

engChrName: ...Y'know, maybe we can pitch in and help out over there?
engSearchText:
...Y'know, maybe we can pitch in and help out
over there?
jpnChrName: あたしたちも手伝えそうな事、 探してみよっか。
jpnSearchText:
あたしたちも手伝えそうな事、
探してみよっか。

engChrName: Not a bad idea! That's our chance to pay it forward to our favorite brand!
engSearchText:
Not a bad idea! That's our chance to pay it forward to
our favorite brand!
jpnChrName: そうだな──車を愛するものとして 少しでも力になるとするか！
jpnSearchText:
そうだな──車を愛するものとして
少しでも力になるとするか！

engChrName: I was awfully rattled there...but I'm glad we managed to help.
engSearchText:
I was awfully rattled there...but I'm glad we managed
to help.
jpnChrName: 色々あり過ぎて混乱しちまったけど、 事件解決の手伝いができて良かったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
色々あり過ぎて混乱しちまったけど、
事件解決の手伝いができて良かったぜ。

engChrName: But I still feel really on edge... The city's on lockdown, cops are crawling all over the streets... It just doesn't feel safe anymore.
engSearchText:
But I still feel really on edge... The city's on
lockdown, cops are crawling all over the streets...
It just doesn't feel safe anymore.
jpnChrName: しかし、街の封鎖といい街中にいる警備員といい、 なんつうか不穏だよな……
jpnSearchText:
しかし、街の封鎖といい街中にいる警備員といい、
なんつうか不穏だよな……

engChrName: Just promise me you guys won't do anything crazy like before, got it? Goddess forbid you get caught up in another attack.
engSearchText:
Just promise me you guys won't do anything crazy like
before, got it? Goddess forbid you get caught up in
another attack.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん達も一枚噛んでるなら、 さっきみたく無茶しすぎないようにな。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん達も一枚噛んでるなら、
さっきみたく無茶しすぎないようにな。

engChrName: My car was made in Basel, so it's...really disheartening to see what's going on here.
engSearchText:
My car was made in Basel, so it's...really
disheartening to see what's going on here.
jpnChrName: 俺の愛車も、このバーゼルで作られたんだ。 他人事とは思えないしな。
jpnSearchText:
俺の愛車も、このバーゼルで作られたんだ。
他人事とは思えないしな。

engChrName: But, well, if we're stuck here because of the road closures, then we might as well make ourselves useful while we're here!
engSearchText:
But, well, if we're stuck here because of the road
closures, then we might as well make ourselves useful
while we're here!
jpnChrName: どうせ交通規制で帰れなくなっちまったし、 できる事を探してみるか！
jpnSearchText:
どうせ交通規制で帰れなくなっちまったし、
できる事を探してみるか！

engChrName: I've been seeing a bunch of cops around here since this morning. Way more than usual.
engSearchText:
I've been seeing a bunch of cops around here since
this morning. Way more than usual.
jpnChrName: そういや……今朝から警察官を ちょくちょく見かけるんだが……
jpnSearchText:
そういや……今朝から警察官を
ちょくちょく見かけるんだが……

engChrName: Did something happen? We'd better be careful, just in case.
engSearchText:
Did something happen? We'd better be careful, just
in case.
jpnChrName: 何か事件でもあったのか？ ふむ、一応気を付けておかないとな。
jpnSearchText:
何か事件でもあったのか？
ふむ、一応気を付けておかないとな。

engChrName: I saved a bit of money by buying the last-gen model, but I still had to take out a ten-year loan...
engSearchText:
I saved a bit of money by buying the last-gen model,
but I still had to take out a ten-year loan...
jpnChrName: 俺が買ったのは一世代前のだが それでも１０年ローンを組んだんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
俺が買ったのは一世代前のだが
それでも１０年ローンを組んだんだよな。

engChrName: Worth it, though! There's nothing like having your very own speed machine!
engSearchText:
Worth it, though! There's nothing like having your
very own speed machine!
jpnChrName: だが後悔したことは一度もないぜ。 それだけの価値がスポーツカーにはある！
jpnSearchText:
だが後悔したことは一度もないぜ。
それだけの価値がスポーツカーにはある！

engChrName: So I can't go cheating on my baby with some shinier model. I gotta break her in first!
engSearchText:
So I can't go cheating on my baby with some
shinier model. I gotta break her in first!
jpnChrName: はは、新車に浮気せず 今の愛車を乗りこなしてやらないとな！
jpnSearchText:
はは、新車に浮気せず
今の愛車を乗りこなしてやらないとな！

engChrName: Urgh... I thought everybody else was modding their cars, but nope. It was just me all along...
engSearchText:
Urgh... I thought everybody else was modding their
cars, but nope. It was just me all along...
jpnChrName: くっ……オレだけムキになって カスタムで勝とうとしてたなんて……
jpnSearchText:
くっ……オレだけムキになって
カスタムで勝とうとしてたなんて……

engChrName: I mean, just... How the heck does Millia drive her car like that with no mods at all?! It doesn't make sense!
engSearchText:
I mean, just... How the heck does Millia drive her car
like that with no mods at all?! It doesn't make sense!
jpnChrName: てかミーリア、マジで何食って育ったら あのテク使えるようになるってんだよ……！
jpnSearchText:
てかミーリア、マジで何食って育ったら
あのテク使えるようになるってんだよ……！

engChrName: So those guys at the pavilion were actually real car racers!
engSearchText:
So those guys at the pavilion were actually real
car racers!
jpnChrName: そういやモーターパビリオンにいた 兄ちゃんたち、走り屋ってやつなんだってな。
jpnSearchText:
そういやモーターパビリオンにいた
兄ちゃんたち、走り屋ってやつなんだってな。

engChrName: I heard them talking about how they came from the capital and stuff.
engSearchText:
I heard them talking about how they came from the
capital and stuff.
jpnChrName: 首都の方からきた走り屋だって 言ってるのが聞こえたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
首都の方からきた走り屋だって
言ってるのが聞こえたんだ。

engChrName: Man, I wish I could go there and race the real thing, too. I wanna grow up, already!
engSearchText:
Man, I wish I could go there and race the real
thing, too. I wanna grow up, already!
jpnChrName: 走り屋か……良いなぁ、ロマンってヤツだよ。 やっぱりいずれはモノホンの車で競いてぇ……！
jpnSearchText:
走り屋か……良いなぁ、ロマンってヤツだよ。
やっぱりいずれはモノホンの車で競いてぇ……！

engChrName: They said they didn't know if there'd be an RC tournament this month... Man, and I was so ready to beat Millia this time, too!
engSearchText:
They said they didn't know if there'd be an RC
tournament this month... Man, and I was so ready to
beat Millia this time, too!
jpnChrName: 今月のＲＣ大会、開催できるか判らねぇなんて…… クソ、次こそアイツに勝とうと思ってたのに！
jpnSearchText:
今月のＲＣ大会、開催できるか判らねぇなんて……
クソ、次こそアイツに勝とうと思ってたのに！

engChrName: Well, if there's no tourney, then I'll make my own or something! I wanna challenge her again, and THIS time, I'm gonna win!
engSearchText:
Well, if there's no tourney, then I'll make my own
or something! I wanna challenge her again, and
THIS time, I'm gonna win!
jpnChrName: こうなったら野良試合でも何でもいい…… 負けっぱなしだけは絶対にごめんだ！
jpnSearchText:
こうなったら野良試合でも何でもいい……
負けっぱなしだけは絶対にごめんだ！

engChrName: Man, there's just something about cars. Having all that power at your fingertips, feeling the wind rushing by...!
engSearchText:
Man, there's just something about cars. Having all
that power at your fingertips, feeling the wind rushing
by...!
jpnChrName: やっぱり車ってのは憧れるよな、 風を切る感じがたまらなさそうだ！
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり車ってのは憧れるよな、
風を切る感じがたまらなさそうだ！

engChrName: RC cars are cool and all, but once I'm old enough to get my license, I wanna take a real car out for a spin!
engSearchText:
RC cars are cool and all, but once I'm old enough to
get my license, I wanna take a real car out for a spin!
jpnChrName: あーあ、ＲＣも良いけど、早く免許取れる 歳になってモノホンでかっ飛ばしたいぜ。
jpnSearchText:
あーあ、ＲＣも良いけど、早く免許取れる
歳になってモノホンでかっ飛ばしたいぜ。

engChrName: At the moment, we're assessing damages to Verne Company and affiliates.
engSearchText:
At the moment, we're assessing damages to Verne
Company and affiliates.
jpnChrName: 只今、ヴェルヌ傘下の企業の 被害状況を確認している所なんです。
jpnSearchText:
只今、ヴェルヌ傘下の企業の
被害状況を確認している所なんです。

engChrName: Some of our business partners' manufacturing plants were hit particularly hard. We don't know when they'll be fully operational again.
engSearchText:
Some of our business partners' manufacturing plants
were hit particularly hard. We don't know when
they'll be fully operational again.
jpnChrName: 製造プラントが被害を受けた社もあり── 完全復旧には時間がかかるかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
製造プラントが被害を受けた社もあり──
完全復旧には時間がかかるかもしれません。

engChrName: But all things considered, this terrorist attack could have been a lot worse. Our total losses don't amount to much.
engSearchText:
But all things considered, this terrorist attack could
have been a lot worse. Our total losses don't amount
to much.
jpnChrName: ですがその……テロの規模の割に 被害額は大したことは無く……
jpnSearchText:
ですがその……テロの規模の割に
被害額は大したことは無く……

engChrName: What, then, was the mafia trying to accomplish...?
engSearchText: What, then, was the mafia trying to accomplish...?
jpnChrName: マフィアたちの狙いは 一体何だったんでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
マフィアたちの狙いは
一体何だったんでしょうか……？

engChrName: Um, about Professor Callaghan... If you learn of his whereabouts, please let us know.
engSearchText:
Um, about Professor Callaghan... If you learn of his
whereabouts, please let us know.
jpnChrName: えっと、キャラハン教授のこと…… 私たちからも宜しくお願い申し上げます。
jpnSearchText:
えっと、キャラハン教授のこと……
私たちからも宜しくお願い申し上げます。

engChrName: We haven't been able to reach him. He's been our company advisor for years and years, and now he's just...gone.
engSearchText:
We haven't been able to reach him. He's been our
company advisor for years and years, and now he's
just...gone.
jpnChrName: ここ最近は姿をお見せになっていませんが 長年我が社の顧問を務めている方ですから……
jpnSearchText:
ここ最近は姿をお見せになっていませんが
長年我が社の顧問を務めている方ですから……

engChrName: I can only hope that he's safe, wherever he is.
engSearchText: I can only hope that he's safe, wherever he is.
jpnChrName: どこかでご無事であればいいのですが……
jpnSearchText: どこかでご無事であればいいのですが……

engChrName: *sigh* So the network issues are still ongoing...
engSearchText: *sigh* So the network issues are still ongoing...
jpnChrName: ふう、導力ネットの不調…… やっぱり直っていないようですね……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、導力ネットの不調……
やっぱり直っていないようですね……

engChrName: Even our business lines have been spotty as of late.
engSearchText: Even our business lines have been spotty as of late.
jpnChrName: グループ間の業務回線でも 不自然な遅延が発生していて……
jpnSearchText:
グループ間の業務回線でも
不自然な遅延が発生していて……

engChrName: It seemed like that was resolved for a second, but... well, evidently not.
engSearchText:
It seemed like that was resolved for a second, but...
well, evidently not.
jpnChrName: 日中の一時期は マシになっていたのですけど……
jpnSearchText:
日中の一時期は
マシになっていたのですけど……

engChrName: The Verne Company's partnerships bring more than twenty companies under our umbrella.
engSearchText:
The Verne Company's partnerships bring more than
twenty companies under our umbrella.
jpnChrName: ヴェルヌ社は、主な傘下だけでも ２０社以上の企業から成り立っているんです。
jpnSearchText:
ヴェルヌ社は、主な傘下だけでも
２０社以上の企業から成り立っているんです。

engChrName: Each company is still managed individually, but our vertical integration strategy puts us on par with the Empire's own Reinford Company.
engSearchText:
Each company is still managed individually, but our
vertical integration strategy puts us on par with the
Empire's own Reinford Company.
jpnChrName: 経営は独立していますが、グループ連結では 帝国の《ＲＦ社》を上回る規模ですね。
jpnSearchText:
経営は独立していますが、グループ連結では
帝国の《ＲＦ社》を上回る規模ですね。

engChrName: Thanks to this structure, we have over 300 projects actively in development—though this does introduce some headaches.
engSearchText:
Thanks to this structure, we have over 300 projects
actively in development—though this does introduce
some headaches.
jpnChrName: 開発プロジェクトは３００以上── もっとも、それ故の苦労も多いのですが。
jpnSearchText:
開発プロジェクトは３００以上──
もっとも、それ故の苦労も多いのですが。

engChrName: We managers certainly have our work cut out for us, juggling those projects and partners all at once. We manage, though, haha.
engSearchText:
We managers certainly have our work cut out for us,
juggling those projects and partners all at once.
We manage, though, haha.
jpnChrName: プロジェクト間の調整に折衝…… ふふ、私たち事務方も大変なんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
プロジェクト間の調整に折衝……
ふふ、私たち事務方も大変なんですよ。

engChrName: I see President Rooster's gone home for the day. He's quite the presence in the office.
engSearchText:
I see President Rooster's gone home for the day.
He's quite the presence in the office.
jpnChrName: ルースター社長はお帰りになりました。 ふう……あの方も中々手ごわいですね。
jpnSearchText:
ルースター社長はお帰りになりました。
ふう……あの方も中々手ごわいですね。

engChrName: Our project's hit a major roadblock, unfortunately. We need more manpower if we want to deliver on time.
engSearchText:
Our project's hit a major roadblock, unfortunately.
We need more manpower if we want to deliver
on time.
jpnChrName: しかしこちらのプロジェクトは大詰め── 人手を投入して納期に間に合わせないと。
jpnSearchText:
しかしこちらのプロジェクトは大詰め──
人手を投入して納期に間に合わせないと。

engChrName: The project itself is highly confidential. If the president could just agree to our budget, that would make things a lot easier...
engSearchText:
The project itself is highly confidential. If the
president could just agree to our budget, that would
make things a lot easier...
jpnChrName: ……少々機密性の高い内容ですし、 社長に受けて頂けると安心なのですが……
jpnSearchText:
……少々機密性の高い内容ですし、
社長に受けて頂けると安心なのですが……

engChrName: President Rooster, if you could greenlight some budget allocation for this new project, then we—
engSearchText:
President Rooster, if you could greenlight some
budget allocation for this new project, then we—
jpnChrName: それではルースター社長、そちらからも 人員と予算を回して頂けるという事で──
jpnSearchText:
それではルースター社長、そちらからも
人員と予算を回して頂けるという事で──

engChrName: Absolutely not. We're stretched too thin as is.
engSearchText: Absolutely not. We're stretched too thin as is.
jpnChrName: いやいや、我が社は別に ２つもプロジェクトを持っておるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
いやいや、我が社は別に
２つもプロジェクトを持っておるんだ。

engChrName: We already have two major projects—we can't handle a third without new hires. Come back to me with an impact plan and we'll go from there.
engSearchText:
We already have two major projects—we can't handle
a third without new hires. Come back to me with an
impact plan and we'll go from there.
jpnChrName: そう簡単にはいかんよ。 むしろ予算を回してくれるなら人員は……
jpnSearchText:
そう簡単にはいかんよ。
むしろ予算を回してくれるなら人員は……

engChrName: That's going to be tricky... We don't have the budget space to fit much more.
engSearchText:
That's going to be tricky... We don't have the budget
space to fit much more.
jpnChrName: う～ん、困りましたね。 予算に余裕はありませんし──
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、困りましたね。
予算に余裕はありませんし──

engChrName: This is a high-priority project direct from Verne Company.
engSearchText:
This is a high-priority project direct from
Verne Company.
jpnChrName: ヴェルヌ本社直属の 非常に高度なプロジェクトなんです。
jpnSearchText:
ヴェルヌ本社直属の
非常に高度なプロジェクトなんです。

engChrName: We would have loved to cooperate on this project, but...
engSearchText:
We would have loved to cooperate on this
project, but...
jpnChrName: ルースター社長にも ご協力頂きたかったのですが……
jpnSearchText:
ルースター社長にも
ご協力頂きたかったのですが……

engChrName: Well, that's not what I'm worried about. It's more the budget.
engSearchText:
Well, that's not what I'm worried about. It's more
the budget.
jpnChrName: それは吝（やぶさ）かじゃないが、 潤沢な予算くらいはだねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
それは吝（やぶさ）かじゃないが、
潤沢な予算くらいはだねぇ……

engChrName: Indeed. This is likely the best compromise available— this should at least get the project off the ground.
engSearchText:
Indeed. This is likely the best compromise available—
this should at least get the project off the ground.
jpnChrName: ええ、こちらが折衷案になります。 ある程度融通を利かせるという事で……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、こちらが折衷案になります。
ある程度融通を利かせるという事で……

engChrName: Well, frankly, I don't see what's in it for us. This is a big responsibility for little benefit down the river.
engSearchText:
Well, frankly, I don't see what's in it for us. This is a
big responsibility for little benefit down the river.
jpnChrName: う～む、我が社からすれば 今一つ旨味がないというか……
jpnSearchText:
う～む、我が社からすれば
今一つ旨味がないというか……

engChrName: That said, I've heard grumblings of a different project...
engSearchText:
That said, I've heard grumblings of a
different project...
jpnChrName: そういえばヴァレリア君、噂じゃ もう一つプロジェクトが回っているとか。
jpnSearchText:
そういえばヴァレリア君、噂じゃ
もう一つプロジェクトが回っているとか。

engChrName: I can try and pull some strings for you there.
engSearchText: I can try and pull some strings for you there.
jpnChrName: そちらの方が私も 協力できるやもしれんぞ？
jpnSearchText:
そちらの方が私も
協力できるやもしれんぞ？

engChrName: I appreciate it, but we should be fine. That project is a bit...unique.
engSearchText:
I appreciate it, but we should be fine. That project is a
bit...unique.
jpnChrName: いえ……お気持ちだけいただきましょう。 もう一方のプロジェクトは特殊なようで……
jpnSearchText:
いえ……お気持ちだけいただきましょう。
もう一方のプロジェクトは特殊なようで……

engChrName: Honestly, I don't know much about it myself. We don't know who's working on it—whatever it is, it's highly confidential.
engSearchText:
Honestly, I don't know much about it myself.
We don't know who's working on it—whatever it is,
it's highly confidential.
jpnChrName: 実は私も詳しくは知らされておらず、 関わっている技術者も非公開なんです。
jpnSearchText:
実は私も詳しくは知らされておらず、
関わっている技術者も非公開なんです。

engChrName: So it would seem... I'm not privy to any of that info myself, either.
engSearchText:
So it would seem... I'm not privy to any of that info
myself, either.
jpnChrName: それはまた……随分と機密性が高いのだな……
jpnSearchText: それはまた……随分と機密性が高いのだな……

engChrName: (Every company has its secrets, but it's rare to run into a project even more confidential than our own... What are they up to there?)
engSearchText:
(Every company has its secrets, but it's rare to run
into a project even more confidential than our own...
What are they up to there?)
jpnChrName: （我々の議題も機密案件だが、それ以上とは。   一体どのようなものなのか……）
jpnSearchText:
（我々の議題も機密案件だが、それ以上とは。
一体どのようなものなのか……）

engChrName: I'm sorry I can't go into more detail. This is a very strange project...
engSearchText:
I'm sorry I can't go into more detail. This is a very
strange project...
jpnChrName: 申し訳ありません、 あちらは相当特殊なようで……
jpnSearchText:
申し訳ありません、
あちらは相当特殊なようで……

engChrName: I heard they've expunged all their international engineers from the project, too...
engSearchText:
I heard they've expunged all their international
engineers from the project, too...
jpnChrName: なんでも外国籍の技術者も 完全に排除しているとか……
jpnSearchText:
なんでも外国籍の技術者も
完全に排除しているとか……

engChrName: (Now that piques my interest. I don't have any inroads there, though—I can't brute force my way into that war room.)
engSearchText:
(Now that piques my interest. I don't have any
inroads there, though—I can't brute force my way
into that war room.)
jpnChrName: （ううむ、ますます気になるが……   突っ込んでも仕方なさそうじゃな……）
jpnSearchText:
（ううむ、ますます気になるが……
突っ込んでも仕方なさそうじゃな……）

engChrName: Goodness... I never thought I'd witness something so horrible.
engSearchText:
Goodness... I never thought I'd witness something
so horrible.
jpnChrName: ううむ、まさかこのような事件が 起きてしまうとはな……
jpnSearchText:
ううむ、まさかこのような事件が
起きてしまうとはな……

engChrName: Our factory faced significant damages. It'll be a while until we're fully operational again.
engSearchText:
Our factory faced significant damages. It'll be a while
until we're fully operational again.
jpnChrName: 我が社の工場も被害があってな。 復旧までしばらくかかりそうじゃわい……
jpnSearchText:
我が社の工場も被害があってな。
復旧までしばらくかかりそうじゃわい……

engChrName: I had no idea... It's good that our projects weren't compromised, but our manufacturing side will really be taking the heat now.
engSearchText:
I had no idea... It's good that our projects weren't
compromised, but our manufacturing side will really
be taking the heat now.
jpnChrName: そうでしたか……例のプロジェクトも 被害はなかったものの遅延が発生してしまい……
jpnSearchText:
そうでしたか……例のプロジェクトも
被害はなかったものの遅延が発生してしまい……

engChrName: The due date for that government armament contract really worries me... Can we make it after this?
engSearchText:
The due date for that government armament contract
really worries me... Can we make it after this?
jpnChrName: 困りましたね、政府から受注した “新兵装”の製造──納期は厳守なのですが。
jpnSearchText:
困りましたね、政府から受注した
“新兵装”の製造──納期は厳守なのですが。

engChrName: How's our head count looking? Do we have any spare hands to direct to that?
engSearchText:
How's our head count looking? Do we have any spare
hands to direct to that?
jpnChrName: というかルースター社長、 もしや今、人員が余っておられます？
jpnSearchText:
というかルースター社長、
もしや今、人員が余っておられます？

engChrName: Hmm... Can you put together a budget plan? If you can get us enough to cover repair costs...
engSearchText:
Hmm... Can you put together a budget plan? If you
can get us enough to cover repair costs...
jpnChrName: ヴァレリア君こそ、特別予算が組めんかね。 工場の復旧さえ賄ってもらえるなら──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァレリア君こそ、特別予算が組めんかね。
工場の復旧さえ賄ってもらえるなら──

engChrName: Certainly! I can get that for you. It's nice to see eye to eye, heehee.
engSearchText:
Certainly! I can get that for you. It's nice to see eye to
eye, heehee.
jpnChrName: ええ、それなら……！ ふふっ、利害が一致しましたね！
jpnSearchText:
ええ、それなら……！
ふふっ、利害が一致しましたね！

engChrName: Indeed. I couldn't possibly hope for more. Let's work through this together!
engSearchText:
Indeed. I couldn't possibly hope for more. Let's work
through this together!
jpnChrName: ああ、我が社としても願ってもない。 どうかよろしくお願いするぞ！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、我が社としても願ってもない。
どうかよろしくお願いするぞ！

engChrName: Right! Leave the recovery efforts to me!
engSearchText: Right! Leave the recovery efforts to me!
jpnChrName: 良かった……！　そちらの工場の復旧は どうかお任せください……！
jpnSearchText:
良かった……！　そちらの工場の復旧は
どうかお任せください……！

engChrName: Good, good. I'll help wherever I can myself.
engSearchText: Good, good. I'll help wherever I can myself.
jpnChrName: うむ、私も可能な限り力になろう。
jpnSearchText: うむ、私も可能な限り力になろう。

engChrName: Basel is in disarray... We all need to work together to surmount it!
engSearchText:
Basel is in disarray... We all need to work together to
surmount it!
jpnChrName: バーゼルもこの状況だしな、 力を合わせて乗り切るとしようぞ！
jpnSearchText:
バーゼルもこの状況だしな、
力を合わせて乗り切るとしようぞ！

engChrName: I never thought terrorists would strike here... Communications are back up, at least.
engSearchText:
I never thought terrorists would strike here...
Communications are back up, at least.
jpnChrName: まさかこの街がテロの標的になるとは…… 通信は一応、回復したようですが……
jpnSearchText:
まさかこの街がテロの標的になるとは……
通信は一応、回復したようですが……

engChrName: We've been swamped with new reservations—there are tons of people stuck here because they can't go home.
engSearchText:
We've been swamped with new reservations—there
are tons of people stuck here because they can't
go home.
jpnChrName: 当ホテルでも、交通規制で帰れなくなった 方々の受け入れを行っております。
jpnSearchText:
当ホテルでも、交通規制で帰れなくなった
方々の受け入れを行っております。

engChrName: I really, really hope we can just get back to normal soon. I'm getting tired of all this.
engSearchText:
I really, really hope we can just get back to
normal soon. I'm getting tired of all this.
jpnChrName: そうは言っても、一日でも早く 解決してほしいというのが本音でしょうが……
jpnSearchText:
そうは言っても、一日でも早く
解決してほしいというのが本音でしょうが……

engChrName: It was bad enough trying to work through the network issues. It was driving our online reservation system haywire.
engSearchText:
It was bad enough trying to work through the
network issues. It was driving our online reservation
system haywire.
jpnChrName: 件の通信不良、少々困りましたね。 当ホテルはネット予約システムもありましてね。
jpnSearchText:
件の通信不良、少々困りましたね。
当ホテルはネット予約システムもありましてね。

engChrName: We had double-bookings, outages, random cancellations... It was a nightmare.
engSearchText:
We had double-bookings, outages,
random cancellations... It was a nightmare.
jpnChrName: システム側の処理が追い付かず、二重予約や 誤キャンセルが何件かあったようです。
jpnSearchText:
システム側の処理が追い付かず、二重予約や
誤キャンセルが何件かあったようです。

engChrName: We've never had to deal with anything like that before, and I hope we don't have to again. It's horrifically bad for ratings.
engSearchText:
We've never had to deal with anything like that
before, and I hope we don't have to again.
It's horrifically bad for ratings.
jpnChrName: 今まではこうした不具合も無かったですし、 評判のためにも避けたいものですが。
jpnSearchText:
今まではこうした不具合も無かったですし、
評判のためにも避けたいものですが。

engChrName: The students from Aramis are really well behaved, even at night. Guess that's what going to a prestigious school does for you.
engSearchText:
The students from Aramis are really well behaved,
even at night. Guess that's what going to a
prestigious school does for you.
jpnChrName: アラミスの生徒は夜も素行が良くて感心します。 流石は名門校といったところですか。
jpnSearchText:
アラミスの生徒は夜も素行が良くて感心します。
流石は名門校といったところですか。

engChrName: Oh, real quick: was it just me, or did the network feel really laggy around noon today? I dunno what was up with that...
engSearchText:
Oh, real quick: was it just me, or did the network feel
really laggy around noon today? I dunno what was up
with that...
jpnChrName: ところで……昼頃からホテル内の通信機器が 重くなっている気がするのですが、何でしょう？
jpnSearchText:
ところで……昼頃からホテル内の通信機器が
重くなっている気がするのですが、何でしょう？

engChrName: We just had it upgraded, so it's not like our equipment is bad...
engSearchText:
We just had it upgraded, so it's not like our
equipment is bad...
jpnChrName: この前更新したばかりの機器もですし、 故障という訳でもなさそうなのですがねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
この前更新したばかりの機器もですし、
故障という訳でもなさそうなのですがねぇ……

engChrName: So Aramis Academy is visiting, huh? I don't recall them doing that in previous years... Guess this year's been really good for them.
engSearchText:
So Aramis Academy is visiting, huh? I don't recall
them doing that in previous years... Guess this year's
been really good for them.
jpnChrName: アラミス高等学校の視察研修── 今年は例年以上に盛況のようですね。
jpnSearchText:
アラミス高等学校の視察研修──
今年は例年以上に盛況のようですね。

engChrName: Well, Basel's a wonderful place for students to learn more about engineering. I hope they see that firsthand.
engSearchText:
Well, Basel's a wonderful place for students to learn
more about engineering. I hope they see
that firsthand.
jpnChrName: ふふ、学生の皆さんにはこの機会に バーゼルの魅力に触れて欲しいものです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、学生の皆さんにはこの機会に
バーゼルの魅力に触れて欲しいものです。
