engChrName: And big tech isn't all we have, either—just look around! The geography here is simply breathtaking. Our food is well worth the trip, too.
engSearchText:
And big tech isn't all we have, either—just look
around! The geography here is simply breathtaking.
Our food is well worth the trip, too.
jpnChrName: 最先端の技術だけでなく、美しい峡谷や 伝統的な郷土料理などもありますからね。
jpnSearchText:
最先端の技術だけでなく、美しい峡谷や
伝統的な郷土料理などもありますからね。

engChrName: I-I got caught up in it right in the middle of a work meeting at Verne...
engSearchText:
I-I got caught up in it right in the middle of a work
meeting at Verne...
jpnChrName: 昨日はヴェルヌ社で商談中に 事件に巻き込まれてしまってね……
jpnSearchText:
昨日はヴェルヌ社で商談中に
事件に巻き込まれてしまってね……

engChrName: I never thought that would happen to me... They put the meeting on hold for now...
engSearchText:
I never thought that would happen to me... They put
the meeting on hold for now...
jpnChrName: ま、まさかこんな事になるとは…… 商談も一時保留になってしまったし……
jpnSearchText:
ま、まさかこんな事になるとは……
商談も一時保留になってしまったし……

engChrName: So Almata was behind it? I remember they had that attack in Langport recently...
engSearchText:
So Almata was behind it? I remember they had that
attack in Langport recently...
jpnChrName: それにしても……犯人はまたアルマータか。 少し前にも煌都で事件を起こしたが……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……犯人はまたアルマータか。
少し前にも煌都で事件を起こしたが……

engChrName: Then Anchorville, and now here, too. I just don't get it... What's the point? Why are they wreaking all this havoc...?
engSearchText:
Then Anchorville, and now here, too. I just don't
get it... What's the point? Why are they wreaking all
this havoc...?
jpnChrName: 今度はバーゼルとアンカーヴィルで同時多発テロ、 経済的被害も馬鹿にならないが、狙いは何なんだ？
jpnSearchText:
今度はバーゼルとアンカーヴィルで同時多発テロ、
経済的被害も馬鹿にならないが、狙いは何なんだ？

engChrName: Today we finally meet with the Verne Company to hammer out a big partnership.
engSearchText:
Today we finally meet with the Verne Company to
hammer out a big partnership.
jpnChrName: さて、今日はいよいよ ヴェルヌ本社で技術提携の交渉だ……
jpnSearchText:
さて、今日はいよいよ
ヴェルヌ本社で技術提携の交渉だ……

engChrName: Cooperation with the academic community is one of Verne's founding principles, so they're pretty receptive to the idea.
engSearchText:
Cooperation with the academic community is one of
Verne's founding principles, so they're pretty
receptive to the idea.
jpnChrName: 産学共同がヴェルヌの理念だからね、 そうハードルが高い訳じゃないんだが。
jpnSearchText:
産学共同がヴェルヌの理念だからね、
そうハードルが高い訳じゃないんだが。

engChrName: It's just, after the foundation got cut out, things have been a bit dicey...
engSearchText:
It's just, after the foundation got cut out, things have
been a bit dicey...
jpnChrName: 近年はホラ、“財団外し”なんて 強引な事もやっているらしいし、うーん……
jpnSearchText:
近年はホラ、“財団外し”なんて
強引な事もやっているらしいし、うーん……

engChrName: But I can't let that get to me. I'm gonna ace this! Just rehearse and execute!
engSearchText:
But I can't let that get to me. I'm gonna ace this!
Just rehearse and execute!
jpnChrName: いや、考え過ぎは良くないな。 準備も万端だし、後は当たって砕けるだけだ！
jpnSearchText:
いや、考え過ぎは良くないな。
準備も万端だし、後は当たって砕けるだけだ！

engChrName: ...O-Okay, maybe 'execute' is a bit much. But I'll get it done, one way or another!
engSearchText:
...O-Okay, maybe 'execute' is a bit much. But I'll get
it done, one way or another!
jpnChrName: い、いや、砕けるのは良くないな。 うまく纏まってほしい所だ。
jpnSearchText:
い、いや、砕けるのは良くないな。
うまく纏まってほしい所だ。

engChrName: I gotta focus on bringing everybody together...but can I? I heard Verne's offices were a mess this morning...
engSearchText:
I gotta focus on bringing everybody together...but
can I? I heard Verne's offices were a mess
this morning...
jpnChrName: しかし……今朝からヴェルヌ社は ゴタゴタしているとも聞いたが……
jpnSearchText:
しかし……今朝からヴェルヌ社は
ゴタゴタしているとも聞いたが……

engChrName: No, no, bad thoughts! Don't overthink it! Just go!
engSearchText: No, no, bad thoughts! Don't overthink it! Just go!
jpnChrName: か、考え過ぎは良くない、良くないとも…… アポの時間になったら向かうとしよう！
jpnSearchText:
か、考え過ぎは良くない、良くないとも……
アポの時間になったら向かうとしよう！

engChrName: I recognize those school uniforms... They're from a really famous academy back in the capital.
engSearchText:
I recognize those school uniforms... They're from a
really famous academy back in the capital.
jpnChrName: そう言えば、あの制服の子らは確か 首都の名門校の生徒だったか。
jpnSearchText:
そう言えば、あの制服の子らは確か
首都の名門校の生徒だったか。

engChrName: Must be nice to be young! They should take advantage of that opportunity while they can.
engSearchText:
Must be nice to be young! They should take
advantage of that opportunity while they can.
jpnChrName: いやぁ、青春を感じるものだね。 一度しかない時間、有効に使って欲しいよ。
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、青春を感じるものだね。
一度しかない時間、有効に使って欲しいよ。

engChrName: I can't deny I'm envious. I never got to do any fancy trips or work studies when I was in school.
engSearchText:
I can't deny I'm envious. I never got to do any fancy
trips or work studies when I was in school.
jpnChrName: 僕のところはああいう研修が無かっただけに、 見ていて羨ましいものだねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
僕のところはああいう研修が無かっただけに、
見ていて羨ましいものだねぇ。

engChrName: This is my first time in Basel—I'm here for work. And I gotta say, this place is every bit as futuristic as they said!
engSearchText:
This is my first time in Basel—I'm here for work.
And I gotta say, this place is every bit as futuristic as
they said!
jpnChrName: バーゼルへの出張は初めてだが…… 本当に先進的な街並みなんだな。
jpnSearchText:
バーゼルへの出張は初めてだが……
本当に先進的な街並みなんだな。

engChrName: Langport has its own New Town, but they sure as heck don't have aerotrams or giant orbal generators.
engSearchText:
Langport has its own New Town, but they sure as
heck don't have aerotrams or giant orbal generators.
jpnChrName: 煌都も新市街を中心に発展しているが、 エアロトラムなんて流石に無いしな。
jpnSearchText:
煌都も新市街を中心に発展しているが、
エアロトラムなんて流石に無いしな。

engChrName: This really feels like a cutting-edge city, in every sense.
engSearchText:
This really feels like a cutting-edge city, in
every sense.
jpnChrName: あの大型導力ジェネレーターというのも 工業都市感を沸々と感じさせるよなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
あの大型導力ジェネレーターというのも
工業都市感を沸々と感じさせるよなぁ。

engChrName: I got to visit the observatory and the special research building. That should give me plenty of material for my report!
engSearchText:
I got to visit the observatory and the special
research building. That should give me plenty of
material for my report!
jpnChrName: 特別研究棟や天文台も訪れられましたし、 レポートの題材も問題無さそうです。
jpnSearchText:
特別研究棟や天文台も訪れられましたし、
レポートの題材も問題無さそうです。

engChrName: I'll join back up with you tomorrow. Let's make sure to get our parts done!
engSearchText:
I'll join back up with you tomorrow. Let's make sure
to get our parts done!
jpnChrName: 明日もヴァンさん達に合流させて頂きますから どうかよろしくお願いしますね。
jpnSearchText:
明日もヴァンさん達に合流させて頂きますから
どうかよろしくお願いしますね。

engChrName: Ah, Van!
engSearchText: Ah, Van!
jpnChrName: あ、ヴァンさん、皆さんも……
jpnSearchText: あ、ヴァンさん、皆さんも……

engChrName: Yo. What's up? You doin' some puzzle solving?
engSearchText: Yo. What's up? You doin' some puzzle solving?
jpnChrName: よぉ、そっちはどうだ？ 今日の振り返りみたいだが……
jpnSearchText:
よぉ、そっちはどうだ？
今日の振り返りみたいだが……

engChrName: Mhm. We're going over all the information we gathered.
engSearchText:
Mhm. We're going over all the information
we gathered.
jpnChrName: はい、それと情報交換も 兼ねている感じですね。
jpnSearchText:
はい、それと情報交換も
兼ねている感じですね。

engChrName: Maaan, there was so much to see! And then there was that surprise right at the end!
engSearchText:
Maaan, there was so much to see! And then there was
that surprise right at the end!
jpnChrName: いや～、見所が多すぎてクタクタかも。 最後にあんなサプライズまであったし！
jpnSearchText:
いや～、見所が多すぎてクタクタかも。
最後にあんなサプライズまであったし！

engChrName: I know, right? I think I could use a break, though. There's only so much stuff my brain can handle— I'm full!
engSearchText:
I know, right? I think I could use a break, though.
There's only so much stuff my brain can handle—
I'm full!
jpnChrName: うんうん、楽しかったけど 正直頭がパンクしそうだよ～！
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、楽しかったけど
正直頭がパンクしそうだよ～！

engChrName: Heehee. Now, don't just wander around town aimlessly, okay? You won't have a cohesive report without cohesive research!
engSearchText:
Heehee. Now, don't just wander around town
aimlessly, okay? You won't have a cohesive report
without cohesive research!
jpnChrName: ふふ、漫然と回っていたんじゃ レポートが纏まらないわよ？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、漫然と回っていたんじゃ
レポートが纏まらないわよ？

engChrName: You should pick a direction and stick to it, then soak up as much info as you can tomorrow!
engSearchText:
You should pick a direction and stick to it, then soak
up as much info as you can tomorrow!
jpnChrName: 今夜中に方針を固めて、明日以降 見るべきポイントを整理しておく事ね。
jpnSearchText:
今夜中に方針を固めて、明日以降
見るべきポイントを整理しておく事ね。

engChrName: Okay!
engSearchText: Okay!
jpnChrName: はあ～い！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>はあ～い！！

engChrName: (And THERE's the Student Council prez side of her. Push comes to shove, she's right on top of things.)
engSearchText:
(And THERE's the Student Council prez side of her.
Push comes to shove, she's right on top of things.)
jpnChrName: （ハッ、生徒会長らしい事も   してんじゃねーか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ハッ、生徒会長らしい事も
してんじゃねーか。）

engChrName: I understand you have plenty of school work to tend to, Ms. Claudel, but please make sure to get enough sleep as well.
engSearchText:
I understand you have plenty of school work to tend
to, Ms. Claudel, but please make sure to get enough
sleep as well.
jpnChrName: アニエス様、学業もあって大変でしょうが どうかゆっくりお休みになって下さいね。
jpnSearchText:
アニエス様、学業もあって大変でしょうが
どうかゆっくりお休みになって下さいね。

engChrName: Don't worry, I will! I'm really looking forward to tomorrow!
engSearchText:
Don't worry, I will! I'm really looking forward
to tomorrow!
jpnChrName: はい……！　また明日も よろしくお願いしますね！
jpnSearchText:
はい……！　また明日も
よろしくお願いしますね！

engChrName: We helped out with the evacuation yesterday, and then that sorta led us here to the hotel.
engSearchText:
We helped out with the evacuation yesterday, and
then that sorta led us here to the hotel.
jpnChrName: 昨日、避難誘導を手伝った流れで 少しホテルにも協力させてもらってるの。
jpnSearchText:
昨日、避難誘導を手伝った流れで
少しホテルにも協力させてもらってるの。

engChrName: It's tough... Holing up in cramped little rooms isn't good for anybody's mental health right now.
engSearchText:
It's tough... Holing up in cramped little rooms isn't
good for anybody's mental health right now.
jpnChrName: ずっと部屋に籠りきりじゃ みんな参っちゃいそうだしね。
jpnSearchText:
ずっと部屋に籠りきりじゃ
みんな参っちゃいそうだしね。

engChrName: Don't push yourselves too much, okay? You especially, Agnès.
engSearchText:
Don't push yourselves too much, okay?
You especially, Agnès.
jpnChrName: アニエスも、事情があるのは分かるけど ……無理だけはしないでね？
jpnSearchText:
アニエスも、事情があるのは分かるけど
……無理だけはしないでね？

engChrName: If things get to be too much, we're always here to help.
engSearchText:
If things get to be too much, we're always here
to help.
jpnChrName: いざとなったらあたしたちも 頼って欲しいかな～、なんて。
jpnSearchText:
いざとなったらあたしたちも
頼って欲しいかな～、なんて。

engChrName: Thank you, Odette. We all need to do our part!
engSearchText: Thank you, Odette. We all need to do our part!
jpnChrName: うん、ありがとうオデット。 みんなの事もお願いね。
jpnSearchText:
うん、ありがとうオデット。
みんなの事もお願いね。

engChrName: Yup, yup! You can count on me!
engSearchText: Yup, yup! You can count on me!
jpnChrName: えっへん、任せておきなさいって！
jpnSearchText: えっへん、任せておきなさいって！

engChrName: Renne's plenty busy, so we need to pick up the slack as her fellow councilmembers!
engSearchText:
Renne's plenty busy, so we need to pick up the slack
as her fellow councilmembers!
jpnChrName: レン先輩も忙しそうだし、あたし達も 生徒会としての役目を果たすつもりよ。
jpnSearchText:
レン先輩も忙しそうだし、あたし達も
生徒会としての役目を果たすつもりよ。

engChrName: We'll hold down the fort here. Be careful out there, okay, Agnès?
engSearchText:
We'll hold down the fort here. Be careful out there,
okay, Agnès?
jpnChrName: こっちは任せておいて。 アニエスも、無理だけはしないでね？
jpnSearchText:
こっちは任せておいて。
アニエスも、無理だけはしないでね？

engChrName: Sounds like you had a pretty productive day out there, Agnès. Nice!
engSearchText:
Sounds like you had a pretty productive day out
there, Agnès. Nice!
jpnChrName: アニエスにとっても有意義だったみたいで、 うんうん、よかったよかった。
jpnSearchText:
アニエスにとっても有意義だったみたいで、
うんうん、よかったよかった。

engChrName: We're splitting up tomorrow, too, but I'll be able to take care of things here.
engSearchText:
We're splitting up tomorrow, too, but I'll be able to
take care of things here.
jpnChrName: 明日も別行動になりそうだけど こっちは何とかしておきますから。
jpnSearchText:
明日も別行動になりそうだけど
こっちは何とかしておきますから。

engChrName: Keep our Agnès safe!
engSearchText: Keep our Agnès safe!
jpnChrName: アニエスの事、よろしくお願いしますね！
jpnSearchText: アニエスの事、よろしくお願いしますね！

engChrName: Catch you later!
engSearchText: Catch you later!
jpnChrName: それじゃあアニエス、また後でね！
jpnSearchText: それじゃあアニエス、また後でね！

engChrName: You have this knack for seeing things we can't. I bet you'll find plenty of good stuff out there! Tell us all about it tonight, okay?
engSearchText:
You have this knack for seeing things we can't. I bet
you'll find plenty of good stuff out there! Tell us all
about it tonight, okay?
jpnChrName: きっと別行動の分、私達とは違ったものも 見れるだろうし、夜には話聞かせてね。
jpnSearchText:
きっと別行動の分、私達とは違ったものも
見れるだろうし、夜には話聞かせてね。

engChrName: I finally got in touch with my family... Whew. I can finally catch my breath.
engSearchText:
I finally got in touch with my family... Whew. I can
finally catch my breath.
jpnChrName: さっきようやく家族と連絡できて…… ふぅ、やっと落ち着けたよ～。
jpnSearchText:
さっきようやく家族と連絡できて……
ふぅ、やっと落ち着けたよ～。

engChrName: Mom and Dad were both worried—and I can't blame them, of course.
engSearchText:
Mom and Dad were both worried—and I can't blame
them, of course.
jpnChrName: お父さんとお母さんも心配してたみたい。 ……そりゃあそうだよねぇ～。
jpnSearchText:
お父さんとお母さんも心配してたみたい。
……そりゃあそうだよねぇ～。

engChrName: First we get caught up in a terrorist attack on a field trip, and now we've got special forces taking us in...
engSearchText:
First we get caught up in a terrorist attack on a field
trip, and now we've got special forces taking us in...
jpnChrName: 研修旅行先でテロに遭遇して 特殊部隊に守ってもらうなんて……
jpnSearchText:
研修旅行先でテロに遭遇して
特殊部隊に守ってもらうなんて……

engChrName: Just my luck, huh? Feels like I walked onto the set of an action movie by mistake... Haha.
engSearchText:
Just my luck, huh? Feels like I walked onto the set of
an action movie by mistake... Haha.
jpnChrName: まるで映画みたいっていうか。 あはは、まだ実感が湧かないかも。
jpnSearchText:
まるで映画みたいっていうか。
あはは、まだ実感が湧かないかも。

engChrName: I could barely keep myself together. I'm doing a lot better today, thankfully.
engSearchText:
I could barely keep myself together. I'm doing a lot
better today, thankfully.
jpnChrName: 昨日は動転しちゃってたけど ようやく落ち着けたかなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
昨日は動転しちゃってたけど
ようやく落ち着けたかなぁ。

engChrName: It just still doesn't feel real...but I don't have the time to dwell on that. Gotta keep on truckin', right, Agnès?
engSearchText:
It just still doesn't feel real...but I don't have the time
to dwell on that. Gotta keep on truckin',
right, Agnès?
jpnChrName: まだいまいち実感がないけど…… アニエスはやるべき事をしてるんだよね？
jpnSearchText:
まだいまいち実感がないけど……
アニエスはやるべき事をしてるんだよね？

engChrName: Odette, Albert, Julian... They're all amazing. Just putting themselves out there to help without a second thought...
engSearchText:
Odette, Albert, Julian... They're all amazing.
Just putting themselves out there to help without a
second thought...
jpnChrName: オデットやアルベール君、ユリアン君も…… 凄いな、ちゃんと行動できてて……
jpnSearchText:
オデットやアルベール君、ユリアン君も……
凄いな、ちゃんと行動できてて……

engChrName: So I was talking to the store manager a second ago, right?
engSearchText:
So I was talking to the store manager a second
ago, right?
jpnChrName: ねえ聞いて聞いて～！ さっき店長さんに聞いたんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ねえ聞いて聞いて～！
さっき店長さんに聞いたんだけど……

engChrName: He said the latest consumer-model orbal cameras can take video, too, like movie cameras do!
engSearchText:
He said the latest consumer-model orbal cameras can
take video, too, like movie cameras do!
jpnChrName: 最近の一部のオーバルカメラには 映像を撮れる機種もあるんだって！
jpnSearchText:
最近の一部のオーバルカメラには
映像を撮れる機種もあるんだって！

engChrName: I'm sure the quality's not as nice—gotta make concessions for consumer-grade stuff. But man, what if I could make my own homemade movies?
engSearchText:
I'm sure the quality's not as nice—gotta make
concessions for consumer-grade stuff. But man, what
if I could make my own homemade movies?
jpnChrName: 映画会社の導力カメラには及ばないだろうけど ……これって、個人で映画も撮れちゃう！？
jpnSearchText:
映画会社の導力カメラには及ばないだろうけど
……これって、個人で映画も撮れちゃう！？

engChrName: I can't believe you can just do that now...! I'm hyped outta my mind!
engSearchText:
I can't believe you can just do that now...! I'm hyped
outta my mind!
jpnChrName: ま、まさかこんな発見が…… う～ん、昨日以上に燃えてきたっ！！
jpnSearchText:
ま、まさかこんな発見が……
う～ん、昨日以上に燃えてきたっ！！

engChrName: Just think about it! My OWN movie, recorded and directed myself!
engSearchText:
Just think about it! My OWN movie, recorded and
directed myself!
jpnChrName: 映像を撮れるカメラを使えば 個人でも映画が撮れちゃうかも！
jpnSearchText:
映像を撮れるカメラを使えば
個人でも映画が撮れちゃうかも！

engChrName: ...Huh? Wait, is it really only the top-end cameras that do that? And they cost HOW much?!
engSearchText:
...Huh? Wait, is it really only the top-end cameras
that do that? And they cost HOW much?!
jpnChrName: あれ……で、でもメチャクチャお高い 最上位機種みたい……！？
jpnSearchText:
あれ……で、でもメチャクチャお高い
最上位機種みたい……！？

engChrName: Aaagh! Goddess, I'm gonna go mad! I gotta get my hands on one of those, but how?!
engSearchText:
Aaagh! Goddess, I'm gonna go mad! I gotta get my
hands on one of those, but how?!
jpnChrName: はぅぅ……！　なにか…… 何かいい名案は……！！
jpnSearchText:
はぅぅ……！　なにか……
何かいい名案は……！！

engChrName: Right, gotta sit down and focus on my report tomorrow.
engSearchText:
Right, gotta sit down and focus on my
report tomorrow.
jpnChrName: そっか、明日からはちゃんと レポートを見据えて動かないとね……！
jpnSearchText:
そっか、明日からはちゃんと
レポートを見据えて動かないとね……！

engChrName: Now, what to write about? I'm thinking maybe film history...
engSearchText:
Now, what to write about? I'm thinking maybe
film history...
jpnChrName: あたしはやっぱり導力映画を 中心に纏めたいけど……
jpnSearchText:
あたしはやっぱり導力映画を
中心に纏めたいけど……

engChrName: Renne showed me all sorts of stuff. I'd love to write about the foundation and ZCF's tech, too!
engSearchText:
Renne showed me all sorts of stuff. I'd love to write
about the foundation and ZCF's tech, too!
jpnChrName: せっかくレン先輩が色々見せてくれたし、 財団やＺＣＦの事も書きたいかも～！
jpnSearchText:
せっかくレン先輩が色々見せてくれたし、
財団やＺＣＦの事も書きたいかも～！

engChrName: Ugh, why do I have to be POOR?! I want my hands on all the latest film tech! I want it so bad!
engSearchText:
Ugh, why do I have to be POOR?! I want my hands
on all the latest film tech! I want it so bad!
jpnChrName: くう～っ！！　中々お目に掛かれない 最新の映像機器！！　あたしもほし～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
くう～っ！！　中々お目に掛かれない
最新の映像機器！！　あたしもほし～っ！！

engChrName: Actually, Renne and the others passed by before. She said she has something cool to show me!
engSearchText:
Actually, Renne and the others passed by before.
She said she has something cool to show me!
jpnChrName: そういえばレン先輩たちが通りかかってね。 面白い所に連れてってくれるって！
jpnSearchText:
そういえばレン先輩たちが通りかかってね。
面白い所に連れてってくれるって！

engChrName: I wonder where she's gonna take me? Oooh, I'm so curious!
engSearchText:
I wonder where she's gonna take me? Oooh, I'm
so curious!
jpnChrName: 一体なんだろ！？　気になる～！！
jpnSearchText: 一体なんだろ！？　気になる～！！

engChrName: So Chignon, why'd you pick Basel, out of curiosity?
engSearchText: So Chignon, why'd you pick Basel, out of curiosity?
jpnChrName: つーかシニョン、お前なんで 研修先、バーゼルにしたんだよ？
jpnSearchText:
つーかシニョン、お前なんで
研修先、バーゼルにしたんだよ？

engChrName: Isn't Tharbad more the entertainment hot spot?
engSearchText: Isn't Tharbad more the entertainment hot spot?
jpnChrName: もっと映画のロケ地っぽい街も あったんじゃね？
jpnSearchText:
もっと映画のロケ地っぽい街も
あったんじゃね？

engChrName: In practice, yes. But where'd all that film equipment come from? That's right: Basel!
engSearchText:
In practice, yes. But where'd all that film equipment
come from? That's right: Basel!
jpnChrName: 甘いね諸君、バーゼルは 導力映画・発祥の地でもあるのだよっ！
jpnSearchText:
甘いね諸君、バーゼルは
導力映画・発祥の地でもあるのだよっ！

engChrName: Plus, I mean, LOOK at this place! You've got so many picturesque locations for a film shoot, it's not even funny!
engSearchText:
Plus, I mean, LOOK at this place! You've got so
many picturesque locations for a film shoot, it's not
even funny!
jpnChrName: それに来るときに見たでしょ、 オージュ峡谷の見事な滝はロケ地としても──
jpnSearchText:
それに来るときに見たでしょ、
オージュ峡谷の見事な滝はロケ地としても──

engChrName: Ah, haha. Got'cha. My bad for asking.
engSearchText: Ah, haha. Got'cha. My bad for asking.
jpnChrName: あーハイハイ、 聞いたオレが馬鹿だったみてーだ。
jpnSearchText:
あーハイハイ、
聞いたオレが馬鹿だったみてーだ。

engChrName: He has a point—this city is absolutely stunning. Maybe we should make a point of going here again.
engSearchText:
He has a point—this city is absolutely stunning.
Maybe we should make a point of going here again.
jpnChrName: はは……でも確かに景観も綺麗だよね。 その辺りも予定に追加してみようか。
jpnSearchText:
はは……でも確かに景観も綺麗だよね。
その辺りも予定に追加してみようか。

engChrName: Verne's HQ is huuuge! I mean, I guess I shouldn't be so surprised—they're the nation's leader in just about everything, film tech included.
engSearchText:
Verne's HQ is huuuge! I mean, I guess I shouldn't be
so surprised—they're the nation's leader in just about
everything, film tech included.
jpnChrName: もちヴェルヌ社の本拠地ってのも大きいよ～！ なにせ導力カメラのトップシェアだからね！
jpnSearchText:
もちヴェルヌ社の本拠地ってのも大きいよ～！
なにせ導力カメラのトップシェアだからね！

engChrName: Oh, man! This is bleeding edge! There's so much cool video tech here! Oh, oh, and there's this other place...!
engSearchText:
Oh, man! This is bleeding edge! There's so much cool
video tech here! Oh, oh, and there's this other
place...!
jpnChrName: 他にも最新の映像技術が目白押し── これはチェックするしかないっしょ！！
jpnSearchText:
他にも最新の映像技術が目白押し──
これはチェックするしかないっしょ！！

engChrName: I've been putting in orders for replacement materials. Hopefully we can get back in business soon.
engSearchText:
I've been putting in orders for replacement materials.
Hopefully we can get back in business soon.
jpnChrName: 修理と復旧のため、諸々の資材の 手配をしていたところです。
jpnSearchText:
修理と復旧のため、諸々の資材の
手配をしていたところです。

engChrName: Being under direct management should help us a lot—we can just hit up HQ for whatever parts we need.
engSearchText:
Being under direct management should help us a
lot—we can just hit up HQ for whatever parts
we need.
jpnChrName: 直営ストアであった事が役に立てそうです、 本社や各工場ともこまめに連絡が出来ますしね。
jpnSearchText:
直営ストアであった事が役に立てそうです、
本社や各工場ともこまめに連絡が出来ますしね。

engChrName: And on a personal level, I want to be a mediator so others can get in touch with HQ for help. It's the least I can do to give back to the city.
engSearchText:
And on a personal level, I want to be a mediator so
others can get in touch with HQ for help. It's the
least I can do to give back to the city.
jpnChrName: 他に私自身も、本社や主要工場への連絡や 相談の窓口として街のために貢献できればと。
jpnSearchText:
他に私自身も、本社や主要工場への連絡や
相談の窓口として街のために貢献できればと。

engChrName: This lady came in asking for some alloy machining tools. I ended up selling her some spare machines we had.
engSearchText:
This lady came in asking for some alloy
machining tools. I ended up selling her some spare
machines we had.
jpnChrName: 研究員の女性に特殊なレアメタル合金用の 作業工具を売らせてもらいましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
研究員の女性に特殊なレアメタル合金用の
作業工具を売らせてもらいましたよ。

engChrName: Guess she's in the market for those alloys herself... She's probably headed over to Giscard's now.
engSearchText:
Guess she's in the market for those alloys herself...
She's probably headed over to Giscard's now.
jpnChrName: 合金も探している様子だったので、 ジスカール工房へ向かったのではないでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
合金も探している様子だったので、
ジスカール工房へ向かったのではないでしょうか。

engChrName: The distribution network seems really unstable right now... I'm worried it might affect our tuning service.
engSearchText:
The distribution network seems really unstable
right now... I'm worried it might affect our
tuning service.
jpnChrName: どうにも導力供給が不安定なようで…… 調整サービスに影響が出ないか心配ですね。
jpnSearchText:
どうにも導力供給が不安定なようで……
調整サービスに影響が出ないか心配ですね。

engChrName: I did some digging, and I can confirm it's not just us—the whole city's running into issues.
engSearchText:
I did some digging, and I can confirm it's not just
us—the whole city's running into issues.
jpnChrName: 私どもの方でも点検はしていますが、 やはりバーゼル全体の問題らしく……
jpnSearchText:
私どもの方でも点検はしていますが、
やはりバーゼル全体の問題らしく……

engChrName: I contacted HQ about it, but they said they don't have a timetable.
engSearchText:
I contacted HQ about it, but they said they don't
have a timetable.
jpnChrName: 一応、本社にも問い合わせましたが、 すぐには対応できないとの事です。
jpnSearchText:
一応、本社にも問い合わせましたが、
すぐには対応できないとの事です。

engChrName: We might have to put them in the hot seat, if this keeps up.
engSearchText:
We might have to put them in the hot seat, if this
keeps up.
jpnChrName: 長引くようであれば、グループで対応を 講じる必要性も出てくるかもしれないですね。
jpnSearchText:
長引くようであれば、グループで対応を
講じる必要性も出てくるかもしれないですね。

engChrName: Education-industry partnership is a big tenet here at Verne, so we're actively cooperating with the institute on a variety of projects.
engSearchText:
Education-industry partnership is a big tenet here at
Verne, so we're actively cooperating with the institute
on a variety of projects.
jpnChrName: ヴェルヌは産学協同が伝統ですしね、 我が店も積極的に大学の研究に協力しています。
jpnSearchText:
ヴェルヌは産学協同が伝統ですしね、
我が店も積極的に大学の研究に協力しています。

engChrName: That's one of the big reasons why we're able to innovate as much as we do: a lot of students land jobs at Verne straight out of college.
engSearchText:
That's one of the big reasons why we're able to
innovate as much as we do: a lot of students land jobs
at Verne straight out of college.
jpnChrName: 数々のイノベーションが成し遂げられたのも、 基礎研究の共有もあってのものといえるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
数々のイノベーションが成し遂げられたのも、
基礎研究の共有もあってのものといえるでしょう。

engChrName: That builds a really strong alumni network, too. I have a ton of colleagues both here at Verne and at the institute.
engSearchText:
That builds a really strong alumni network, too.
I have a ton of colleagues both here at Verne and at
the institute.
jpnChrName: 私も本社や関連企業に技師や研究員の知人が 多いですし、繋ぎの窓口として協力しています。
jpnSearchText:
私も本社や関連企業に技師や研究員の知人が
多いですし、繋ぎの窓口として協力しています。

engChrName: I might be more of a manager nowadays, but beyond that, I'm part of the bridge connecting the two sides together. I find that really fulfilling.
engSearchText:
I might be more of a manager nowadays, but beyond
that, I'm part of the bridge connecting the two
sides together. I find that really fulfilling.
jpnChrName: 店舗経営に転じた身とは言え、こうして自分なりに 開発に貢献できますし、やり甲斐あるものです。
jpnSearchText:
店舗経営に転じた身とは言え、こうして自分なりに
開発に貢献できますし、やり甲斐あるものです。

engChrName: Welcome to Verne Plaza. We're managed directly by the Verne Company, so we've got stuff your other Verne retailers might not.
engSearchText:
Welcome to Verne Plaza. We're managed directly by
the Verne Company, so we've got stuff your other
Verne retailers might not.
jpnChrName: ヴェルヌ・プラザへようこそ。 まだ珍しい直営店ですが、お見知りおきを。
jpnSearchText:
ヴェルヌ・プラザへようこそ。
まだ珍しい直営店ですが、お見知りおきを。

engChrName: Our first-party management also lets us put in direct orders for you, among other special services.
engSearchText:
Our first-party management also lets us put in direct
orders for you, among other special services.
jpnChrName: 当店では直営店ならではのアフターサービスや 迅速な取り寄せを売りにしていましてね。
jpnSearchText:
当店では直営店ならではのアフターサービスや
迅速な取り寄せを売りにしていましてね。

engChrName: It's one of the many benefits that come with being right here in Verne's backyard. It's proved a big hit with customers here.
engSearchText:
It's one of the many benefits that come with being
right here in Verne's backyard. It's proved a big hit
with customers here.
jpnChrName: これが中々便利だと好評なもので…… やはり、ヴェルヌのお膝元の強みと言えますね。
jpnSearchText:
これが中々便利だと好評なもので……
やはり、ヴェルヌのお膝元の強みと言えますね。

engChrName: We're looking to expand this business model, too. We want to open first-party Verne stores all across the country for the best customer experience.
engSearchText:
We're looking to expand this business model, too.
We want to open first-party Verne stores all across
the country for the best customer experience.
jpnChrName: いずれは各地に直営店を立ち上げて、もっと 手軽で便利な販売体制を確立したい限りです。
jpnSearchText:
いずれは各地に直営店を立ち上げて、もっと
手軽で便利な販売体制を確立したい限りです。

engChrName: We were expecting to take some losses with arms sales slowing down, but it still stings.
engSearchText:
We were expecting to take some losses with arms
sales slowing down, but it still stings.
jpnChrName: 武具取引の停滞と復旧コストによる損失は…… 予想内とはいえ痛手に変わらないですね。
jpnSearchText:
武具取引の停滞と復旧コストによる損失は……
予想内とはいえ痛手に変わらないですね。

engChrName: Incidentally, about those two projects—the equipment for Marduk's security detail and the engineering behind that new airship...
engSearchText:
Incidentally, about those two projects—the
equipment for Marduk's security detail and the
engineering behind that new airship...
jpnChrName: ……ところで、街に展開しているＭＫ社の 警備員たちの装備に、彼らの最新飛行艦……
jpnSearchText:
……ところで、街に展開しているＭＫ社の
警備員たちの装備に、彼らの最新飛行艦……

engChrName: I can't help but wonder how they were constructed. They look reliable, for sure, but...foreign, all the same.
engSearchText:
I can't help but wonder how they were constructed.
They look reliable, for sure, but...foreign, all
the same.
jpnChrName: 改めて見ると、頼もしくはあるが……彼らの技術が どう構築された代物なのか気になりますね……
jpnSearchText:
改めて見ると、頼もしくはあるが……彼らの技術が
どう構築された代物なのか気になりますね……

engChrName: Foreign as in, I have NEVER seen anything like it from Calvard's domestic production. As an engineer, that really gets me thinking...
engSearchText:
Foreign as in, I have NEVER seen anything like it
from Calvard's domestic production. As an engineer,
that really gets me thinking...
jpnChrName: 既存の国やメーカーとは違った系統の軍事技術…… やはり技師としては興味をそそられます……
jpnSearchText:
既存の国やメーカーとは違った系統の軍事技術……
やはり技師としては興味をそそられます……

engChrName: The store's been hit by this orbal instability business, too, so I went ahead and double-checked our wiring.
engSearchText:
The store's been hit by this orbal instability business,
too, so I went ahead and double-checked our wiring.
jpnChrName: 導力の不調……店にも影響が出そうなんで 一応配線や変圧器を確認してはみました。
jpnSearchText:
導力の不調……店にも影響が出そうなんで
一応配線や変圧器を確認してはみました。

engChrName: And as expected, our setup is perfectly fine. It's something bigger going on in the city...
engSearchText:
And as expected, our setup is perfectly fine.
It's something bigger going on in the city...
jpnChrName: やはり個々の設備には問題がない…… 街全体の導力揺らぎだけが直接の原因みたいです。
jpnSearchText:
やはり個々の設備には問題がない……
街全体の導力揺らぎだけが直接の原因みたいです。

engChrName: Our manager's talking with HQ to try and get it fixed, but outside of that, there's nothing we can do.
engSearchText:
Our manager's talking with HQ to try and get it
fixed, but outside of that, there's nothing we can do.
jpnChrName: こうなれば、店舗単位で打てる手はない…… 店長は本社に掛け合っているようだけど……
jpnSearchText:
こうなれば、店舗単位で打てる手はない……
店長は本社に掛け合っているようだけど……

engChrName: It's good that we're ahead of Reinford in small arms sales now, but we don't know what to make of Marduk yet.
engSearchText:
It's good that we're ahead of Reinford in small arms
sales now, but we don't know what to make of
Marduk yet.
jpnChrName: ヴェルヌの銃器類のシェアがＲＦを抜いたのは 良いとして……やはりＭＫ社は気になりますね。
jpnSearchText:
ヴェルヌの銃器類のシェアがＲＦを抜いたのは
良いとして……やはりＭＫ社は気になりますね。

engChrName: They're starting to rack up some market share now, but their inner workings are still a mystery—to say nothing of their schematics.
engSearchText:
They're starting to rack up some market share now,
but their inner workings are still a mystery—to say
nothing of their schematics.
jpnChrName: あそこもシェアを伸ばしているが、 どうにも技術体系が掴みにくいというか……
jpnSearchText:
あそこもシェアを伸ばしているが、
どうにも技術体系が掴みにくいというか……

engChrName: And now that they have government backing themselves, we need to take them seriously.
engSearchText:
And now that they have government backing
themselves, we need to take them seriously.
jpnChrName: しかも、共和国政府もあちらと取引がある以上、 単純なライバルとも言えないですがね。
jpnSearchText:
しかも、共和国政府もあちらと取引がある以上、
単純なライバルとも言えないですがね。

engChrName: I'd be happy to answer any questions you might have about weaponry. I'm an engineer, after all.
engSearchText:
I'd be happy to answer any questions you might
have about weaponry. I'm an engineer, after all.
jpnChrName: ……武具に関して何かあれば一声ください。 これでも一応、技師なんで。
jpnSearchText:
……武具に関して何かあれば一声ください。
これでも一応、技師なんで。

engChrName: Verne Company weapons have gotten lots of good press for their innovation.
engSearchText:
Verne Company weapons have gotten lots of good
press for their innovation.
jpnChrName: 最近は銃器や護身具もヴェルヌ系のものが 先進性を買われて人気なようで……
jpnSearchText:
最近は銃器や護身具もヴェルヌ系のものが
先進性を買われて人気なようで……

engChrName: Every day now, I get orders from the department store over in the capital for new parts and supplies.
engSearchText:
Every day now, I get orders from the department
store over in the capital for new parts and supplies.
jpnChrName: 首都の百貨店からもうちの店にパーツなどの 発注が毎日あるほどで……
jpnSearchText:
首都の百貨店からもうちの店にパーツなどの
発注が毎日あるほどで……

engChrName: The manager over there can be a bit obsessive, but once you get to know him, he's pretty sociable. Working with him's a breeze for me now.
engSearchText:
The manager over there can be a bit obsessive, but
once you get to know him, he's pretty sociable.
Working with him's a breeze for me now.
jpnChrName: まあ、あそこの場合は店主の拘りが強いのも…… 自分的には、情報共有しやすいから良いですが。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、あそこの場合は店主の拘りが強いのも……
自分的には、情報共有しやすいから良いですが。

engChrName: If there's anything you need, or any questions you wanna ask, feel free to pull me aside. I don't mind.
engSearchText:
If there's anything you need, or any questions you
wanna ask, feel free to pull me aside. I don't mind.
jpnChrName: ……作業に集中しているかもしれないですが、 何かあれば声をかけてくれて構わないです。
jpnSearchText:
……作業に集中しているかもしれないですが、
何かあれば声をかけてくれて構わないです。

engChrName: The company sent me here as a temp—that way, we can gather customer feedback straight from the ground level.
engSearchText:
The company sent me here as a temp—that way, we
can gather customer feedback straight from the
ground level.
jpnChrName: 一応、市場での声を参考にするために メーカーから出向した身ではあるんで……
jpnSearchText:
一応、市場での声を参考にするために
メーカーから出向した身ではあるんで……

engChrName: Thank the Goddess my husband and I made it out all right. We were both working at the time, but our workshops weren't damaged much.
engSearchText:
Thank the Goddess my husband and I made it out
all right. We were both working at the time, but our
workshops weren't damaged much.
jpnChrName: 昨日は怖かったわねぇ……幸い私も 夫の工場も無事でよかったけど……
jpnSearchText:
昨日は怖かったわねぇ……幸い私も
夫の工場も無事でよかったけど……

engChrName: I was surprised to see those field trip students jumping in to help evacuate people.
engSearchText:
I was surprised to see those field trip students
jumping in to help evacuate people.
jpnChrName: そういえば、首都から来ている高校生の子たち、 襲撃の時に避難誘導とか手伝っていたらしいわ。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、首都から来ている高校生の子たち、
襲撃の時に避難誘導とか手伝っていたらしいわ。

engChrName: They really went out on a limb there, didn't they? They're still kids!
engSearchText:
They really went out on a limb there, didn't they?
They're still kids!
jpnChrName: 今の高校生って、私らがイメージしている 以上にしっかりしているものなのねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
今の高校生って、私らがイメージしている
以上にしっかりしているものなのねぇ……

engChrName: Workers everywhere have been grumbling about problems with their orbal equipment... I hope they get that fixed soon.
engSearchText:
Workers everywhere have been grumbling about
problems with their orbal equipment... I hope they
get that fixed soon.
jpnChrName: お店の人たち、導力不調だとかで 困っているみたいだけど、大丈夫かしらねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
お店の人たち、導力不調だとかで
困っているみたいだけど、大丈夫かしらねぇ。

engChrName: It's been a headache for my husband, too—he came into work and the machines at his workshop just... wouldn't work.
engSearchText:
It's been a headache for my husband, too—he came
into work and the machines at his workshop just...
wouldn't work.
jpnChrName: 何でも、夫の勤めている工場でも機械が 止まったりして大変だって話だし……
jpnSearchText:
何でも、夫の勤めている工場でも機械が
止まったりして大変だって話だし……

engChrName: I've got orbal lights, orbal appliances... A good chunk of my home is wired up.
engSearchText:
I've got orbal lights, orbal appliances... A good chunk
of my home is wired up.
jpnChrName: とりあえず台所周りと照明周りの 細々とした導力製品を買ってみたけど……
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず台所周りと照明周りの
細々とした導力製品を買ってみたけど……

engChrName: They say smaller products tend to be less reliable, but not Verne's. They're really built to last—and they're full of nifty features, too!
engSearchText:
They say smaller products tend to be less reliable, but
not Verne's. They're really built to last—and they're
full of nifty features, too!
jpnChrName: ヴェルヌの純正品だと、こういう細かいものでも 長持ちしたり便利機能があるって聞くしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ヴェルヌの純正品だと、こういう細かいものでも
長持ちしたり便利機能があるって聞くしねぇ。

engChrName: I went shopping to kill some time. It wasn't all a waste, though—I got plenty of handy things at the Verne company store.
engSearchText:
I went shopping to kill some time. It wasn't all a
waste, though—I got plenty of handy things at the
Verne company store.
jpnChrName: 暇潰しのショッピングだったけど、 生活の役に立つなら別に良いでしょうし。
jpnSearchText:
暇潰しのショッピングだったけど、
生活の役に立つなら別に良いでしょうし。

engChrName: They have just all sorts of stuff here. You can't tell it's only Verne products by how much they have. Company stores are something else!
engSearchText:
They have just all sorts of stuff here. You can't tell
it's only Verne products by how much they have.
Company stores are something else!
jpnChrName: 流石は直営店だけあって、凄い品揃えねぇ。 ヴェルヌ純正品だけでこの多種多様っぷりだもの。
jpnSearchText:
流石は直営店だけあって、凄い品揃えねぇ。
ヴェルヌ純正品だけでこの多種多様っぷりだもの。

engChrName: I'm not buying any of the bigger stuff—that's all out of my budget. But just browsing is fun in its own right!
engSearchText:
I'm not buying any of the bigger stuff—that's all out
of my budget. But just browsing is fun in its
own right!
jpnChrName: 大きいものは高いしすぐには買えないけど、 こういうのって見ているだけで面白いわよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
大きいものは高いしすぐには買えないけど、
こういうのって見ているだけで面白いわよねぇ。

engChrName: My husband works at a workshop, so sometimes I browse the shelves for stuff he tells me about from work.
engSearchText:
My husband works at a workshop, so sometimes I
browse the shelves for stuff he tells me about
from work.
jpnChrName: 夫が工場勤めだし、彼から聞いた品を探すのも、 最近じゃ良い時間潰しになってるわ。
jpnSearchText:
夫が工場勤めだし、彼から聞いた品を探すのも、
最近じゃ良い時間潰しになってるわ。

engChrName: It's been really hairy... There were a lot of people injured in the attack, but because of the traffic restrictions, we're low on medicine...
engSearchText:
It's been really hairy... There were a lot of people
injured in the attack, but because of the traffic
restrictions, we're low on medicine...
jpnChrName: 昨日の襲撃で、負傷者も確認されていますが、 交通封鎖による医薬品の不足はさらに深刻で……
jpnSearchText:
昨日の襲撃で、負傷者も確認されていますが、
交通封鎖による医薬品の不足はさらに深刻で……

engChrName: But we're working with local pharmacies and medical companies to try and bridge the gap. We're managing now, at least.
engSearchText:
But we're working with local pharmacies and medical
companies to try and bridge the gap. We're managing
now, at least.
jpnChrName: 市内の医療機関や製薬会社の関連企業と連携して ある程度の融通は出来るようにできました。
jpnSearchText:
市内の医療機関や製薬会社の関連企業と連携して
ある程度の融通は出来るようにできました。

engChrName: Having all that research and production right here in the city is a real big strength, I've learned.
engSearchText:
Having all that research and production right here in
the city is a real big strength, I've learned.
jpnChrName: やはり、メーカーの施設や研究機関が多い事は こういう時にも強みになりますね。
jpnSearchText:
やはり、メーカーの施設や研究機関が多い事は
こういう時にも強みになりますね。

engChrName: It'll be a load off my back once those places are back to normal. We could use all help we can get...
engSearchText:
It'll be a load off my back once those places are back
to normal. We could use all help we can get...
jpnChrName: 一日も早く、医療施設や薬品工場が 平常通りになれば安心できるのですが……
jpnSearchText:
一日も早く、医療施設や薬品工場が
平常通りになれば安心できるのですが……

engChrName: We've gotten this volunteer who likes helping out with errands and stuff. He's been a huge help.
engSearchText:
We've gotten this volunteer who likes helping out
with errands and stuff. He's been a huge help.
jpnChrName: それにしても、あちらにいる方が雑務を 申し出てくれて助かりました。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、あちらにいる方が雑務を
申し出てくれて助かりました。

engChrName: Thanks to him, I've been able to focus on all the clerical stuff.
engSearchText:
Thanks to him, I've been able to focus on all the
clerical stuff.
jpnChrName: お陰で私も、医薬品関連の手配と調整に 専念できているのですが……
jpnSearchText:
お陰で私も、医薬品関連の手配と調整に
専念できているのですが……

engChrName: He shops here sometimes, too, though I couldn't tell you his name.
engSearchText:
He shops here sometimes, too, though I couldn't tell
you his name.
jpnChrName: お店にたまにいらっしゃるお客さんですよね。 名前などは存じ上げませんが……
jpnSearchText:
お店にたまにいらっしゃるお客さんですよね。
名前などは存じ上げませんが……

engChrName: My mentor, Professor Aurelie, told me about what happened at the institute...
engSearchText:
My mentor, Professor Aurelie, told me about
what happened at the institute...
jpnChrName: 大学の方で事件が起こった事は、恩師の オレリー教授より聞き及んでいます。
jpnSearchText:
大学の方で事件が起こった事は、恩師の
オレリー教授より聞き及んでいます。

engChrName: I didn't want to believe the rumors, but you could see it written all over those poor victims' faces. They looked terrible...
engSearchText:
I didn't want to believe the rumors, but you could see
it written all over those poor victims' faces.
They looked terrible...
jpnChrName: 噂には聞いていましたが……パワハラを 受けた方の体調は相当なもののようで……
jpnSearchText:
噂には聞いていましたが……パワハラを
受けた方の体調は相当なもののようで……

engChrName: As a pharmacist, I want to do whatever I can to help them recover. Those women, especially...
engSearchText:
As a pharmacist, I want to do whatever I can to help
them recover. Those women, especially...
jpnChrName: 薬剤師としても、特に女性研究員の方には同じ 女性としてもできる限りの支援をしたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
薬剤師としても、特に女性研究員の方には同じ
女性としてもできる限りの支援をしたいですね。

engChrName: I went to college here in Basel, so I'm honored that I get to practice my craft here, too.
engSearchText:
I went to college here in Basel, so I'm honored that I
get to practice my craft here, too.
jpnChrName: それにしても、やはり出身校のある バーゼルの地で薬剤師をできる事は光栄ですね。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、やはり出身校のある
バーゼルの地で薬剤師をできる事は光栄ですね。

engChrName: I was almost gonna work in Remiferia after I did a foreign semester there...but Basel gave me an offer, and I jumped at it.
engSearchText:
I was almost gonna work in Remiferia after I did a
foreign semester there...but Basel gave me an offer,
and I jumped at it.
jpnChrName: 留学先のレミフェリアでの就職も考えましたが…… お陰でこうした店に勤める機会にも恵まれました。
jpnSearchText:
留学先のレミフェリアでの就職も考えましたが……
お陰でこうした店に勤める機会にも恵まれました。

engChrName: It's just so exciting, being able to work with the cutting edge of the industry. Factor in the academy, too, and it's a deeply fulfilling job.
engSearchText:
It's just so exciting, being able to work with the
cutting edge of the industry. Factor in the academy,
too, and it's a deeply fulfilling job.
jpnChrName: 合弁会社の件も含め、こうした医薬品産業の 新しい形に触れる事も端的に言って面白いです。
jpnSearchText:
合弁会社の件も含め、こうした医薬品産業の
新しい形に触れる事も端的に言って面白いです。

engChrName: Welcome to Cerise Drugs. We've got all your medicinal needs, from OTCs to prescriptions from all the big manufacturers.
engSearchText:
Welcome to Cerise Drugs. We've got all your
medicinal needs, from OTCs to prescriptions from all
the big manufacturers.
jpnChrName: 《セリーズドラッグ》へようこそ。 製薬各社の製品の他、日用品等もございます。
jpnSearchText:
《セリーズドラッグ》へようこそ。
製薬各社の製品の他、日用品等もございます。

engChrName: I personally recommend the products made from Remiferia and Verne Company's joint venture. They're wonderfully effective!
engSearchText:
I personally recommend the products made from
Remiferia and Verne Company's joint venture.
They're wonderfully effective!
jpnChrName: 最近ですとレミフェリア企業とヴェルヌの 合弁製薬会社の製品がお勧めかと。
jpnSearchText:
最近ですとレミフェリア企業とヴェルヌの
合弁製薬会社の製品がお勧めかと。

engChrName: With them, you get the best of both worlds: Remiferia's cutting-edge medicine and Verne's low costs.
engSearchText:
With them, you get the best of both worlds:
Remiferia's cutting-edge medicine and Verne's
low costs.
jpnChrName: レミフェリアの先進医療とヴェルヌの生産力、 双方を活かした高品質かつ低価格の薬です。
jpnSearchText:
レミフェリアの先進医療とヴェルヌの生産力、
双方を活かした高品質かつ低価格の薬です。

engChrName: They may be a startup, but their quality speaks for itself. If you're in need of medicine, give them a shot!
engSearchText:
They may be a startup, but their quality speaks
for itself. If you're in need of medicine, give them
a shot!
jpnChrName: 新興企業になりますが、品質や安全性は 薬剤師として私からも保障いたします。
jpnSearchText:
新興企業になりますが、品質や安全性は
薬剤師として私からも保障いたします。

engChrName: It's awful, just...awful. But I can't sit idly by—I want to help however I can.
engSearchText:
It's awful, just...awful. But I can't sit idly by—I want
to help however I can.
jpnChrName: 大変な事になっちゃったけど、 俺にできる事は手伝いたいと思ってね。
jpnSearchText:
大変な事になっちゃったけど、
俺にできる事は手伝いたいと思ってね。

engChrName: I'm handling odd jobs while Luce runs the store. She has her hands full as is.
engSearchText:
I'm handling odd jobs while Luce runs the store.
She has her hands full as is.
jpnChrName: ルーチェさんにはやっぱり、本業に専念して もらいたいし……雑用くらい引き受けないと。
jpnSearchText:
ルーチェさんにはやっぱり、本業に専念して
もらいたいし……雑用くらい引き受けないと。

engChrName: We're like one big family here, y'know? And family doesn't leave family behind. We all gotta pitch in and help each other out.
engSearchText:
We're like one big family here, y'know? And family
doesn't leave family behind. We all gotta pitch in and
help each other out.
jpnChrName: お互い見知った仲だしね、 こういう時は助け合っていきたいものさ。
jpnSearchText:
お互い見知った仲だしね、
こういう時は助け合っていきたいものさ。

engChrName: Luce is really cool. She's so calm and collected, and she's really good at what she does!
engSearchText:
Luce is really cool. She's so calm and collected, and
she's really good at what she does!
jpnChrName: ルーチェさんの何がカッコイイって、 やっぱり専門分野にストイックなところかなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ルーチェさんの何がカッコイイって、
やっぱり専門分野にストイックなところかなぁ。

engChrName: She's like the opposite of me. I just go hopping from one odd job to another, but she's landed her dream job already.
engSearchText:
She's like the opposite of me. I just go hopping from
one odd job to another, but she's landed her dream
job already.
jpnChrName: 短期のバイトを転々としている俺とは真逆だけど、 ああいうのも充実しそうだと思ってさ。
jpnSearchText:
短期のバイトを転々としている俺とは真逆だけど、
ああいうのも充実しそうだと思ってさ。

engChrName: Maybe I should take notes and figure out what I wanna do...
engSearchText:
Maybe I should take notes and figure out what I
wanna do...
jpnChrName: 俺も何か専門的な事を勉強してみるかな……
jpnSearchText: 俺も何か専門的な事を勉強してみるかな……

engChrName: Y'know, maybe I can just start working at the pharmacy? I think I'm on good terms with Luce now—maybe she can teach me.
engSearchText:
Y'know, maybe I can just start working at
the pharmacy? I think I'm on good terms with Luce
now—maybe she can teach me.
jpnChrName: ルーチェさんももう顔馴染みみたいなものだし、 薬剤師のなり方とか教えてくれたりしないかな。
jpnSearchText:
ルーチェさんももう顔馴染みみたいなものだし、
薬剤師のなり方とか教えてくれたりしないかな。

engChrName: Sometimes I drop by at night, too... This store's almost becoming my life. That's not too weird, is it?
engSearchText:
Sometimes I drop by at night, too... This store's
almost becoming my life. That's not too weird, is it?
jpnChrName: 夜もここに来てしまった……最近の生活、 ほとんどこの店に依存しているな。
jpnSearchText:
夜もここに来てしまった……最近の生活、
ほとんどこの店に依存しているな。

engChrName: ...Man, I wonder if I count as a regular now, haha. I come here too often. You reckon the pharmacist knows me by name?
engSearchText:
...Man, I wonder if I count as a regular now, haha.
I come here too often. You reckon the pharmacist
knows me by name?
jpnChrName: これだけ入り浸っているとなれば……流石に あの薬剤師のお姉さんに覚えられちゃってそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
これだけ入り浸っているとなれば……流石に
あの薬剤師のお姉さんに覚えられちゃってそうだ。

engChrName: Compared to her, I'm just... She really isn't that much older than me, but she has her dream job and everything. She's amazing...
engSearchText:
Compared to her, I'm just... She really isn't that much
older than me, but she has her dream job
and everything. She's amazing...
jpnChrName: 考えてみればあの人……なんていうか、俺と大して 歳も変わらないのに専門職って感じがして凄いよな……
jpnSearchText:
考えてみればあの人……なんていうか、俺と大して
歳も変わらないのに専門職って感じがして凄いよな……

engChrName: ...Bleh, I'm getting distracted. Gotta finish up my errands for the night, I need some detergent and canned foods...
engSearchText:
...Bleh, I'm getting distracted. Gotta finish up my
errands for the night, I need some detergent and
canned foods...
jpnChrName: さて、良い加減に洗剤やら何やら一通り、 あと保存食も買い置きしておくかな……
jpnSearchText:
さて、良い加減に洗剤やら何やら一通り、
あと保存食も買い置きしておくかな……

engChrName: My folks are out of town for work, so I gotta clean the place up before they get back. I don't wanna THINK about what they'll do if I forget.
engSearchText:
My folks are out of town for work, so I gotta clean
the place up before they get back. I don't wanna
THINK about what they'll do if I forget.
jpnChrName: 両親が長期出張から帰ってくるまでに 家を綺麗にしなきゃ、また小言言われちまう。
jpnSearchText:
両親が長期出張から帰ってくるまでに
家を綺麗にしなきゃ、また小言言われちまう。

engChrName: Though they went off on me before, anyway... 'If you want us off your back, then land a job and STAY there!' I can't argue with that, but...man.
engSearchText:
Though they went off on me before, anyway... 'If you
want us off your back, then land a job and
STAY there!' I can't argue with that, but...man.
jpnChrName: まあ、小言言われたくなきゃ定職見つけろってのは その通りではあるんだけどさ……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、小言言われたくなきゃ定職見つけろってのは
その通りではあるんだけどさ……

engChrName: Heh heh... It wouldn't hurt to take just a quick little peek inside this store, would it...?
engSearchText:
Heh heh... It wouldn't hurt to take just a quick little
peek inside this store, would it...?
jpnChrName: へぇ、たまにはお店を覗いてみるのも 面白いかも……なんて……
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、たまにはお店を覗いてみるのも
面白いかも……なんて……

engChrName: I dunno when they're coming... I need to just take my mind off them while I still can. *sigh*
engSearchText:
I dunno when they're coming... I need to just take my
mind off them while I still can. *sigh*
jpnChrName: あの人達がいつ来てくれるか分からないし 今の内に気を紛らわせておこうっと……
jpnSearchText:
あの人達がいつ来てくれるか分からないし
今の内に気を紛らわせておこうっと……

engChrName: Eep! Wh-What is it?! Am I in your way?
engSearchText: Eep! Wh-What is it?! Am I in your way?
jpnChrName: ヒッ……！　な、なんですか！？ 私、お邪魔でしたか……？
jpnSearchText:
ヒッ……！　な、なんですか！？
私、お邪魔でしたか……？

engChrName: S-So sorry, I'll move!
engSearchText: S-So sorry, I'll move!
jpnChrName: すみません、今すぐどきますので……
jpnSearchText: すみません、今すぐどきますので……

engChrName: You're good, you're good. That was my bad.
engSearchText: You're good, you're good. That was my bad.
jpnChrName: おっと……こっちこそ悪いな、気にすんな。
jpnSearchText: おっと……こっちこそ悪いな、気にすんな。

engChrName: (She would appear to be a researcher at the Institute of Science.)
engSearchText:
(She would appear to be a researcher at the Institute
of Science.)
jpnChrName: （見た所、大学の研究員の方のようですね。）
jpnSearchText: （見た所、大学の研究員の方のようですね。）

engChrName: (Who were the people she was talking about? I'm kinda curious...)
engSearchText:
(Who were the people she was talking about?
I'm kinda curious...)
jpnChrName: （あの人達っていうのは誰の事でしょうか？   少し気になりますね。）
jpnSearchText:
（あの人達っていうのは誰の事でしょうか？
少し気になりますね。）

engChrName: Whew... Focus, Athena, focus. Gotta get this terminal checked out.
engSearchText:
Whew... Focus, Athena, focus. Gotta get this
terminal checked out.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……それじゃあ気を取り直して もうちょっと端末でも眺めてようかな。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……それじゃあ気を取り直して
もうちょっと端末でも眺めてようかな。

engChrName: I have no clue when they're coming... I need to try and take my mind off them while I have the chance.
engSearchText:
I have no clue when they're coming... I need to try
and take my mind off them while I have the chance.
jpnChrName: あの人達がいつ来てくれるか分からないし 気を紛らわせておこうっと……
jpnSearchText:
あの人達がいつ来てくれるか分からないし
気を紛らわせておこうっと……

engChrName: Oookay... I think I'll just wait here a little longer.
engSearchText: Oookay... I think I'll just wait here a little longer.
jpnChrName: ええと……私はこのままお店で 待たせてもらいますね……
jpnSearchText:
ええと……私はこのままお店で
待たせてもらいますね……

engChrName: So first, equip Pocel. Then perform some actions while you're S-Boosted. I'm thinking maybe... five times should work?
engSearchText:
So first, equip Pocel. Then perform some actions
while you're S-Boosted. I'm thinking maybe...
five times should work?
jpnChrName: 《ポケル》を装備して、『Ｓブースト』の 状態のまま５回行動をしたら教えて下さい……
jpnSearchText:
《ポケル》を装備して、『Ｓブースト』の
状態のまま５回行動をしたら教えて下さい……

engChrName: I'm counting on you guys!
engSearchText: I'm counting on you guys!
jpnChrName: 君たち、どうかよろしく頼んだよ……！
jpnSearchText: 君たち、どうかよろしく頼んだよ……！

engChrName: How'd it come to this...?
engSearchText: How'd it come to this...?
jpnChrName: はぁ……どうしてこんな事に……
jpnSearchText: はぁ……どうしてこんな事に……

engChrName: No, maybe there's still time. We just need a hero...!
engSearchText: No, maybe there's still time. We just need a hero...!
jpnChrName: いや、今ならまだ取り返せるはずだ。 早く……早く助けに来てくれよぉ……！
jpnSearchText:
いや、今ならまだ取り返せるはずだ。
早く……早く助けに来てくれよぉ……！

engChrName: (If memory serves, they work for a Verne weapons R&D contractor.)
engSearchText:
(If memory serves, they work for a Verne weapons
R&D contractor.)
jpnChrName: （この人は確か……ヴェルヌ社系列の   武器の開発部門の人だったかな。）
jpnSearchText:
（この人は確か……ヴェルヌ社系列の
武器の開発部門の人だったかな。）

engChrName: (What happened here, exactly...? They look out of sorts.)
engSearchText:
(What happened here, exactly...? They look out
of sorts.)
jpnChrName: （こんな場所で一人でソワソワして……   何かあったのかな？）
jpnSearchText:
（こんな場所で一人でソワソワして……
何かあったのかな？）

engChrName: After yesterday and then this, I see now why that analyst speaks so highly of you.
engSearchText:
After yesterday and then this, I see now why that
analyst speaks so highly of you.
jpnChrName: ……昨日の事件と今回の件で、分析官が 貴方達を評価している理由が分かった気がするわ。
jpnSearchText:
……昨日の事件と今回の件で、分析官が
貴方達を評価している理由が分かった気がするわ。

engChrName: So I'll back you up all the way—that's a promise.
engSearchText: So I'll back you up all the way—that's a promise.
jpnChrName: 引き続き、貴方達へのバックアップも 出来る限り協力させてもらいましょう。
jpnSearchText:
引き続き、貴方達へのバックアップも
出来る限り協力させてもらいましょう。

engChrName: Let's see how much we can corner the enemy before the task force arrives.
engSearchText:
Let's see how much we can corner the enemy before
the task force arrives.
jpnChrName: 特務部隊（タスクフォース）が駆け付ける前に どこまで迫れるのか……見届けさせてもらうわ。
jpnSearchText:
特務部隊（タスクフォース）が駆け付ける前に
どこまで迫れるのか……見届けさせてもらうわ。

engChrName: We've heard everything from the second lieutenant. Thank you for your cooperation, everyone.
engSearchText:
We've heard everything from the second lieutenant.
Thank you for your cooperation, everyone.
jpnChrName: 少尉殿から話は伺っていますよ。 皆さん、ご協力ありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText:
少尉殿から話は伺っていますよ。
皆さん、ご協力ありがとうございました。

engChrName: I can't believe an AI was driving the transport...
engSearchText: I can't believe an AI was driving the transport...
jpnChrName: ＡⅠが運搬車を運転していたなんて、 信じ難い話ではありますが……
jpnSearchText:
ＡⅠが運搬車を運転していたなんて、
信じ難い話ではありますが……

engChrName: ...but at any rate, I'm glad we got things taken care of in spite of all the chaos and confusion.
engSearchText:
...but at any rate, I'm glad we got things taken care of
in spite of all the chaos and confusion.
jpnChrName: この街が混乱している状況の中、 ひとつでも不安要素を減らす事ができて幸いでした。
jpnSearchText:
この街が混乱している状況の中、
ひとつでも不安要素を減らす事ができて幸いでした。

engChrName: Th-This wasn't what we agreed!
engSearchText: Th-This wasn't what we agreed!
jpnChrName: は、話が違うじゃないか……！
jpnSearchText: は、話が違うじゃないか……！

engChrName: You both gave me your word that you would stay on until the Xipha standard was ready for the general population!
engSearchText:
You both gave me your word that you would stay on
until the Xipha standard was ready for the
general population!
jpnChrName: 二人ともザイファ規格の民生化までは 付き合ってくれるんじゃなかったのかね！？
jpnSearchText:
二人ともザイファ規格の民生化までは
付き合ってくれるんじゃなかったのかね！？

engChrName: Sorryyy! But my main research reeeally needs my attention right now.
engSearchText:
Sorryyy! But my main research reeeally needs my
attention right now.
jpnChrName: すみませ～ん…… 本業の研究が押していまして～。
jpnSearchText:
すみませ～ん……
本業の研究が押していまして～。

engChrName: I've covered all the tasks I was specifically left with, though.
engSearchText:
I've covered all the tasks I was specifically left
with, though.
jpnChrName: 一応依頼されていた分までは しっかり終わらせていますけど～。
jpnSearchText:
一応依頼されていた分までは
しっかり終わらせていますけど～。

engChrName: As have I. Now it's time I devoted myself to that other project.
engSearchText:
As have I. Now it's time I devoted myself to that
other project.
jpnChrName: 私も持ち分のタスクは消化済み── 後は例のプロジェクトに充てる予定だ。
jpnSearchText:
私も持ち分のタスクは消化済み──
後は例のプロジェクトに充てる予定だ。

engChrName: ...Unless you would be willing to take responsibility were a problem to arise due to my lack of attention?
engSearchText:
...Unless you would be willing to take responsibility
were a problem to arise due to my lack of attention?
jpnChrName: そちらに専念できずに問題が起きた場合、 責任を取っていただけるなら話は別だが。
jpnSearchText:
そちらに専念できずに問題が起きた場合、
責任を取っていただけるなら話は別だが。

engChrName: Ugh... You know I can't do that...
engSearchText: Ugh... You know I can't do that...
jpnChrName: ぐっ、それは……
jpnSearchText: ぐっ、それは……

engChrName: Then it seems we've nothing else to discuss.
engSearchText: Then it seems we've nothing else to discuss.
jpnChrName: 異存がなければ失礼する。
jpnSearchText: 異存がなければ失礼する。

engChrName: I really am sorry about this.
engSearchText: I really am sorry about this.
jpnChrName: 本当にすみませんでした～。
jpnSearchText: 本当にすみませんでした～。

engChrName: Oh! I need to keep making improvements to that other thing I was given, too!
engSearchText:
Oh! I need to keep making improvements to that
other thing I was given, too!
jpnChrName: そうだ、向こうから頼まれた あれの改良も進めないと～……
jpnSearchText:
そうだ、向こうから頼まれた
あれの改良も進めないと～……

engChrName: Augh! Why must the professor's students all be like this?!
engSearchText:
Augh! Why must the professor's students all be
like this?!
jpnChrName: ええい、これだから博士の門下は……！
jpnSearchText: ええい、これだから博士の門下は……！

engChrName: Not to mention the woman herself! If she hadn't just up and left Basel in the first place, this wouldn't be an issue!
engSearchText:
Not to mention the woman herself! If she hadn't just
up and left Basel in the first place, this wouldn't be
an issue!
jpnChrName: そもそも彼女が無責任に バーゼルを離れさえしなければ……！
jpnSearchText:
そもそも彼女が無責任に
バーゼルを離れさえしなければ……！

engChrName: Meanwhile, Professor Callaghan's obsessed with his research into Aidios knows what...
engSearchText:
Meanwhile, Professor Callaghan's obsessed with his
research into Aidios knows what...
jpnChrName: この忙しい時にキャラハン教授も 訳の分からん研究に没頭しているし──
jpnSearchText:
この忙しい時にキャラハン教授も
訳の分からん研究に没頭しているし──

engChrName: What? ...ETWS and Red Star are threatening patent litigation?!
engSearchText:
What? ...ETWS and Red Star are threatening
patent litigation?!
jpnChrName: なんだ──…… エトワスとレッドスターが特許訴訟！？
jpnSearchText:
なんだ──……
エトワスとレッドスターが特許訴訟！？

engChrName: Then have their legal representative take care of it!
engSearchText: Then have their legal representative take care of it!
jpnChrName: とっとと顧問弁護士に仲裁させろ！
jpnSearchText: とっとと顧問弁護士に仲裁させろ！

engChrName: Aldra and ZCF have a partnership now? Is this through that tech union? What are the details?!
engSearchText:
Aldra and ZCF have a partnership now? Is this
through that tech union? What are the details?!
jpnChrName: アルドラとＺＣＦが技術提携……！？ 例の“連盟”か──内容はどうなっている！？
jpnSearchText:
アルドラとＺＣＦが技術提携……！？
例の“連盟”か──内容はどうなっている！？

engChrName: Project AF's been leaked?! But we had an agreement with Tyrell!
engSearchText:
Project AF's been leaked?! But we had an agreement
with Tyrell!
jpnChrName: “ＡＦ計画”の事前リーク！？ タイレルとは協定を結んでいるはずだぞ！？
jpnSearchText:
“ＡＦ計画”の事前リーク！？
タイレルとは協定を結んでいるはずだぞ！？

engChrName: It's already time for those educational visitations?! Bah—I don't have the time for this!
engSearchText:
It's already time for those educational visitations?!
Bah—I don't have the time for this!
jpnChrName: 視察研修……もうそんな時期か！？ ええい、そんな事まで対応してられるか！
jpnSearchText:
視察研修……もうそんな時期か！？
ええい、そんな事まで対応してられるか！

engChrName: *sigh* Why can't problems ever come one at a time?
engSearchText: *sigh* Why can't problems ever come one at a time?
jpnChrName: はあ……… こんな時に限って重なるものだな。
jpnSearchText:
はあ………
こんな時に限って重なるものだな。

engChrName: I can't deal with all of this...
engSearchText: I can't deal with all of this...
jpnChrName: どいつもこいつも……
jpnSearchText: どいつもこいつも……

engChrName: ...Wait a second. I may have just worked out the perfect card to play.
engSearchText:
...Wait a second. I may have just worked out the
perfect card to play.
jpnChrName: ……いや、待てよ。 たしか丁度いいのがいたはずだな。
jpnSearchText:
……いや、待てよ。
たしか丁度いいのがいたはずだな。

engChrName: She left another student back here, didn't she?
engSearchText: She left another student back here, didn't she?
jpnChrName: 彼女が残していった、もう一人の門下……
jpnSearchText: 彼女が残していった、もう一人の門下……

engChrName: As I recall, he's become obsessed with that old facility...
engSearchText:
As I recall, he's become obsessed with that
old facility...
jpnChrName: ……今はあの古臭い施設に ご執心なのだったか。
jpnSearchText:
……今はあの古臭い施設に
ご執心なのだったか。

engChrName: October 23rd, 1:05PM
engSearchText: October 23rd, 1:05PM

engChrName: Oh! Van, just look at this!
engSearchText: Oh! Van, just look at this!
jpnChrName: わぁ……！ ヴァンさん、これが……！
jpnSearchText:
わぁ……！
ヴァンさん、これが……！

engChrName: What is up with this place...? What a wild sight.
engSearchText: What is up with this place...? What a wild sight.
jpnChrName: オイオイ…… ……こうなってんのかよ。
jpnSearchText:
オイオイ……
……こうなってんのかよ。

engChrName: On the left is New Town. Off to the right is the Artisanal District...
engSearchText:
On the left is New Town. Off to the right is the
Artisanal District...
jpnChrName: 左手が新市街、右奥に見えるのが 伝統的な職人街ですか……
jpnSearchText:
左手が新市街、右奥に見えるのが
伝統的な職人街ですか……

engChrName: Yeah. And up top is the Basel Institute of Science.
engSearchText: Yeah. And up top is the Basel Institute of Science.
jpnChrName: ああ──で上にあるのが バーゼル理科大学ってわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──で上にあるのが
バーゼル理科大学ってわけだ。

engChrName: We're gonna be going around till we hit the parking lot in front of Verne HQ.
engSearchText:
We're gonna be going around till we hit the parking
lot in front of Verne HQ.
jpnChrName: このままぐるっと回って ヴェルヌ本社前の駐車場に止める。
jpnSearchText:
このままぐるっと回って
ヴェルヌ本社前の駐車場に止める。

engChrName: Time for us to have a chat with the CEO.
engSearchText: Time for us to have a chat with the CEO.
jpnChrName: 早速ＣＥＯとご対面と行くぞ。
jpnSearchText: 早速ＣＥＯとご対面と行くぞ。

engChrName: Amazing... I can't believe this city exists in the middle of a ravine.
engSearchText:
Amazing... I can't believe this city exists in the middle
of a ravine.
jpnChrName: 凄いな……峡谷地帯の真ん中に こんな街があるなんて。
jpnSearchText:
凄いな……峡谷地帯の真ん中に
こんな街があるなんて。

engChrName: Verne HQ...! I knew it was big, but seeing it up close is just ridonculous!
engSearchText:
Verne HQ...! I knew it was big, but seeing it up close
is just ridonculous!
jpnChrName: そこのビルが《ヴェルヌ社》かぁ、 さすがメチャクチャ大きいわね～！
jpnSearchText:
そこのビルが《ヴェルヌ社》かぁ、
さすがメチャクチャ大きいわね～！

engChrName: Oooh, and is that the aerotram I spy with my little eye?
engSearchText:
Oooh, and is that the aerotram I spy with my
little eye?
jpnChrName: あ、もしかして向こうに見えてるのが 《エアロトラム》ってヤツ？
jpnSearchText:
あ、もしかして向こうに見えてるのが
《エアロトラム》ってヤツ？

engChrName: Wow... Those are markedly different from the trams in Heimdallr.
engSearchText:
Wow... Those are markedly different from the trams
in Heimdallr.
jpnChrName: なるほど…… 帝都のトラムと全然違いますね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……
帝都のトラムと全然違いますね。

engChrName: Yooo, this place is legit! Mad respect!
engSearchText: Yooo, this place is legit! Mad respect!
jpnChrName: パネぇわバーゼル、マジリスペクトだぜ！
jpnSearchText: パネぇわバーゼル、マジリスペクトだぜ！

engChrName: (This looks to be a showroom floor for cars...)
engSearchText: (This looks to be a showroom floor for cars...)
jpnChrName: （これは……   導力車の展示場なのかな？）
jpnSearchText:
（これは……
導力車の展示場なのかな？）

engChrName: (That sounds right up Van's alley.)
engSearchText: (That sounds right up Van's alley.)
jpnChrName: （うーん、ヴァンさんが見たら   入り浸っちゃいそうな気が……）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん、ヴァンさんが見たら
入り浸っちゃいそうな気が……）

engChrName: All right, everyone! Let's get checked in at the hotel first.
engSearchText:
All right, everyone! Let's get checked in at the
hotel first.
jpnChrName: はいはい、それじゃあ ホテルのチェックインに行くよ。
jpnSearchText:
はいはい、それじゃあ
ホテルのチェックインに行くよ。

engChrName: Once we drop off our bags, we can go pay the fine people of the Verne Company a visit!
engSearchText:
Once we drop off our bags, we can go pay the fine
people of the Verne Company a visit!
jpnChrName: 荷物を置いたらヴェルヌ社に ご挨拶に伺いましょう。
jpnSearchText:
荷物を置いたらヴェルヌ社に
ご挨拶に伺いましょう。

engChrName: So that's why they call it a planned city... They developed the whole thing in big chunks.
engSearchText:
So that's why they call it a planned city...
They developed the whole thing in big chunks.
jpnChrName: なるほど……区画整備された “実験都市”って感じだな。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……区画整備された
“実験都市”って感じだな。

engChrName: Whoooa...! The HQ's bigger than anything I've seen in the capital!
engSearchText:
Whoooa...! The HQ's bigger than anything I've seen
in the capital!
jpnChrName: そちらがヴェルヌ社ですか……！ 首都のビルよりも大きいですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
そちらがヴェルヌ社ですか……！
首都のビルよりも大きいですねぇ。

engChrName: Fitting for the Republic's largest private company.
engSearchText: Fitting for the Republic's largest private company.
jpnChrName: ふふ、共和国最大の企業ですから。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、共和国最大の企業ですから。

engChrName: And I believe that hotel over there is where the students from Aramis are staying.
engSearchText:
And I believe that hotel over there is where the
students from Aramis are staying.
jpnChrName: ちなみにそちらがアラミスの方々が 泊まられるホテルのようですね。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにそちらがアラミスの方々が
泊まられるホテルのようですね。

engChrName: Oh, yeah, we're staying in different places.
engSearchText: Oh, yeah, we're staying in different places.
jpnChrName: あ……そっか、今回は 泊まる場所は別々なんですね。
jpnSearchText:
あ……そっか、今回は
泊まる場所は別々なんですね。

engChrName: Course... Yo, Van, we're in the Artisanal District, right?
engSearchText:
Course... Yo, Van, we're in the Artisanal
District, right?
jpnChrName: ハン……俺たちは例によって 職人街の方の宿だったか。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……俺たちは例によって
職人街の方の宿だったか。

engChrName: Uh, Van?
engSearchText: Uh, Van?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん？

engChrName: What's he looking at...? 'Motor Pavilion'?
engSearchText: What's he looking at...? 'Motor Pavilion'?
jpnChrName: あん……？ 《モーターパビリオン》──
jpnSearchText:
あん……？
《モーターパビリオン》──

engChrName: Right. Should've figured he'd get sidetracked by big wheels. And he calls ME a kid.
engSearchText:
Right. Should've figured he'd get sidetracked by
big wheels. And he calls ME a kid.
jpnChrName: 導力車の展示場かなんかか？ ったくガキかっつーの。
jpnSearchText:
導力車の展示場かなんかか？
ったくガキかっつーの。

engChrName: Don't knock it till you've tried it—looks like a nice little place. I'll take you there later if you want.
engSearchText:
Don't knock it till you've tried it—looks like a nice
little place. I'll take you there later if you want.
jpnChrName: ま、なかなかアガる施設だぜ？ 後で連れて行ってやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、なかなかアガる施設だぜ？
後で連れて行ってやるよ。

engChrName: For now, though, let's get down to business.
engSearchText: For now, though, let's get down to business.
jpnChrName: そんじゃ中に入るとすっか。
jpnSearchText: そんじゃ中に入るとすっか。

engChrName: (He's got a good eye... Small wonder that he's connected to the chief.)
engSearchText:
(He's got a good eye... Small wonder that he's
connected to the chief.)
jpnChrName: （……本当に鼻が利くわね。   主任の関係者なら納得だけど。）
jpnSearchText:
（……本当に鼻が利くわね。
主任の関係者なら納得だけど。）

engChrName: (At any rate, I need to focus on my work.)
engSearchText: (At any rate, I need to focus on my work.)
jpnChrName: （まあいいわ、こちらはこちらで   早速動かせてもらいましょう。）
jpnSearchText:
（まあいいわ、こちらはこちらで
早速動かせてもらいましょう。）

engChrName: Welcome to the Verne Company. What brings you here today?
engSearchText:
Welcome to the Verne Company. What brings you
here today?
jpnChrName: ようこそ、ヴェルヌ社へ。 本日はどういったご用件でしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
ようこそ、ヴェルヌ社へ。
本日はどういったご用件でしょうか？

engChrName: We're Arkride Solutions from the capital.
engSearchText: We're Arkride Solutions from the capital.
jpnChrName: 首都から出張してきた 《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
首都から出張してきた
《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだ。

engChrName: We're here on an official request from Elsaim.
engSearchText: We're here on an official request from Elsaim.
jpnChrName: エルザイム公国の依頼で来たんだが。
jpnSearchText: エルザイム公国の依頼で来たんだが。

engChrName: Ah, good. Mr. Tausend has been expecting you.
engSearchText: Ah, good. Mr. Tausend has been expecting you.
jpnChrName: ……ああ、伺っております。 タウゼントＣＥＯがお待ちです。
jpnSearchText:
……ああ、伺っております。
タウゼントＣＥＯがお待ちです。

engChrName: Take the elevator on your left to the meeting room. It's on the twentieth floor.
engSearchText:
Take the elevator on your left to the meeting room.
It's on the twentieth floor.
jpnChrName: 左手のエレベーターで ２０Ｆ会議室へどうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
左手のエレベーターで
２０Ｆ会議室へどうぞ。

engChrName: Arkride Solutions... So you're the investigators that Elsaim hired?
engSearchText:
Arkride Solutions... So you're the investigators that
Elsaim hired?
jpnChrName: 解決事務所…… 公国が雇ったとかいう調査屋か。
jpnSearchText:
解決事務所……
公国が雇ったとかいう調査屋か。

engChrName: Pretty much.
engSearchText: Pretty much.
jpnChrName: まあ、そんなところです。
jpnSearchText: まあ、そんなところです。

engChrName: They asked us to look into the various problems that have hit Basel.
engSearchText:
They asked us to look into the various problems that
have hit Basel.
jpnChrName: バーゼル市で起きている諸問題について 調査と対応を頼まれましてね。
jpnSearchText:
バーゼル市で起きている諸問題について
調査と対応を頼まれましてね。

engChrName: ...Putting their noses where they don't belong...
engSearchText: ...Putting their noses where they don't belong...
jpnChrName: ……余計なことを……
jpnSearchText: ……余計なことを……

engChrName: Umm...?
engSearchText: Umm...?
jpnChrName: ？　えっと……
jpnSearchText: ？　えっと……

engChrName: Ah, it's nothing.
engSearchText: Ah, it's nothing.
jpnChrName: いや、なんでもない。
jpnSearchText: いや、なんでもない。

engChrName: Let me get straight to the point: any concern is unfounded. We have everything under control.
engSearchText:
Let me get straight to the point: any concern
is unfounded. We have everything under control.
jpnChrName: ──結論から言えば心配無用だ。 全てはコントロール下にある。
jpnSearchText:
──結論から言えば心配無用だ。
全てはコントロール下にある。

engChrName: Do you, now...?
engSearchText: Do you, now...?
jpnChrName: ハン……？
jpnSearchText: ハン……？

engChrName: If you could please explain...
engSearchText: If you could please explain...
jpnChrName: と、仰いますと……？
jpnSearchText: と、仰いますと……？

engChrName: First, regarding the instability of the orbal net within the city...
engSearchText:
First, regarding the instability of the orbal net within
the city...
jpnChrName: まず市内の導力ネットの 不安定化についてだが……
jpnSearchText:
まず市内の導力ネットの
不安定化についてだが……

engChrName: ...it was discovered that it was a simple matter of heavy traffic on the net.
engSearchText:
...it was discovered that it was a simple matter of
heavy traffic on the net.
jpnChrName: あくまで導力ネット上の通信量（トラフィック）の 問題でしかないのが判明していてね。
jpnSearchText:
あくまで導力ネット上の通信量（トラフィック）の
問題でしかないのが判明していてね。

engChrName: And just like with our orbal distribution network, the problem has been solved. Isn't that so?
engSearchText:
And just like with our orbal distribution network, the
problem has been solved. Isn't that so?
jpnChrName: 導力供給網も同様、既に現時点で 対処・解決済み──そうだったな？
jpnSearchText:
導力供給網も同様、既に現時点で
対処・解決済み──そうだったな？

engChrName: Yes, generally speaking.
engSearchText: Yes, generally speaking.
jpnChrName: ……ええ、概ねですが。
jpnSearchText: ……ええ、概ねですが。

engChrName: The maximum delay of 8.3% is down to .35% as of this morning.
engSearchText:
The maximum delay of 8.3% is down to .35% as of
this morning.
jpnChrName: 最大8.3％発生していた遅滞も 今朝の段階で0.35％まで解消されています。
jpnSearchText:
最大8.3％発生していた遅滞も
今朝の段階で0.35％まで解消されています。

engChrName: That...does sound like a big drop, yeah.
engSearchText: That...does sound like a big drop, yeah.
jpnChrName: えと…… 確かに大分減ってますね。
jpnSearchText:
えと……
確かに大分減ってますね。

engChrName: You've still got that .35% hangin' around, though.
engSearchText: You've still got that .35% hangin' around, though.
jpnChrName: だがそれでも 0.35％は発生しているわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
だがそれでも
0.35％は発生しているわけだ。

engChrName: Ideally, that should be zero, yeah? Smells to me like there's still some stuff to figure out there.
engSearchText:
Ideally, that should be zero, yeah? Smells to me like
there's still some stuff to figure out there.
jpnChrName: そうなると自分たちが調べる余地も ゼロじゃあなさそうですね？
jpnSearchText:
そうなると自分たちが調べる余地も
ゼロじゃあなさそうですね？

engChrName: And that ain't the only issue you're dealing with, is it? What about the swell of 'visitors' buzzin' around the city?
engSearchText:
And that ain't the only issue you're dealing with, is it?
What about the swell of 'visitors' buzzin' around
the city?
jpnChrName: もう一つの懸念──見慣れぬ来訪者を 見かけるという噂もあるようですし。
jpnSearchText:
もう一つの懸念──見慣れぬ来訪者を
見かけるという噂もあるようですし。

engChrName: ...Is that not obvious?
engSearchText: ...Is that not obvious?
jpnChrName: ふう……考えてもみたまえ。
jpnSearchText: ふう……考えてもみたまえ。

engChrName: Basel is the beating heart of Calvard's industrial sector, home to my Verne Group and nearly one hundred partners and subsidiaries.
engSearchText:
Basel is the beating heart of Calvard's industrial
sector, home to my Verne Group and nearly one
hundred partners and subsidiaries.
jpnChrName: このバーゼルは総合技術メーカーである ヴェルヌグループの本拠地だ。
jpnSearchText:
このバーゼルは総合技術メーカーである
ヴェルヌグループの本拠地だ。

engChrName: That's thousands upon thousands of employees, contractors, managers, all acting of their own accord. New hires from all over come in every day.
engSearchText:
That's thousands upon thousands of employees,
contractors, managers, all acting of their own accord.
New hires from all over come in every day.
jpnChrName: 関連企業は百近くに及び、 それぞれが独自受注も行っている。
jpnSearchText:
関連企業は百近くに及び、
それぞれが独自受注も行っている。

engChrName: So naturally the city appears busy. An influx of visitors, particularly at this time of year, is nothing to fret over.
engSearchText:
So naturally the city appears busy. An influx of
visitors, particularly at this time of year, is nothing to
fret over.
jpnChrName: この時期に来訪者が増えるのは ごく自然なこと──
jpnSearchText:
この時期に来訪者が増えるのは
ごく自然なこと──

engChrName: Even bad faith visitors? Spies are all the rage these days, y'know.
engSearchText:
Even bad faith visitors? Spies are all the rage these
days, y'know.
jpnChrName: ──それがスパイやら 後ろ暗い連中なんかでもかよ？
jpnSearchText:
──それがスパイやら
後ろ暗い連中なんかでもかよ？

engChrName: Hmph...
engSearchText: Hmph...

engChrName: ...I'm not sure what you've heard out there, but I'd advise against parroting such unsubstantiated claims. Your evidence, please?
engSearchText:
...I'm not sure what you've heard out there, but I'd
advise against parroting such unsubstantiated claims.
Your evidence, please?
jpnChrName: どこで何を聞いたかは知らないが 想像で話をしないで欲しいものだな。
jpnSearchText:
どこで何を聞いたかは知らないが
想像で話をしないで欲しいものだな。

engChrName: Though we've yet to investigate this issue, your dodging of the question implies you also lack the evidence to prove or deny the allegations.
engSearchText:
Though we've yet to investigate this issue, your
dodging of the question implies you also lack the
evidence to prove or deny the allegations.
jpnChrName: 明確に否定なさらないということは まだ実態調査に至っていないのですね？
jpnSearchText:
明確に否定なさらないということは
まだ実態調査に至っていないのですね？

engChrName: That's what we're here for, Mr. Tausend: to conduct this investigation on your behalf.
engSearchText:
That's what we're here for, Mr. Tausend: to conduct
this investigation on your behalf.
jpnChrName: それも含めて当事務所にお任せを。
jpnSearchText: それも含めて当事務所にお任せを。

engChrName: So, yeah. If we find anything—and I do mean anything—we'll let'cha know.
engSearchText:
So, yeah. If we find anything—and I do mean
anything—we'll let'cha know.
jpnChrName: 勿論、万が一何か起きた場合の ご相談に乗ることも含めてね。
jpnSearchText:
勿論、万が一何か起きた場合の
ご相談に乗ることも含めてね。

engChrName: Frrgh...
engSearchText: Frrgh...
jpnChrName: ぬうう……
jpnSearchText: ぬうう……

engChrName: ...Fine, do what you will. Squabbling further over this would be a waste of time.
engSearchText:
...Fine, do what you will. Squabbling further over this
would be a waste of time.
jpnChrName: ……まあいい。 これ以上は時間の無駄だ。
jpnSearchText:
……まあいい。
これ以上は時間の無駄だ。

engChrName: Salision, if you would.
engSearchText: Salision, if you would.
jpnChrName: サリシオン君、あれを。
jpnSearchText: サリシオン君、あれを。

engChrName: Received D-rank ID certification.
engSearchText: Received D-rank ID certification.
jpnChrName: 認証カード《ランクＤ》を受け取った。
jpnSearchText: <C1>認証カード《ランクＤ》を受け取った。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. I heard about these...
engSearchText: Oh, yeah. I heard about these...
jpnChrName: ああ、噂に聞いた……
jpnSearchText: ああ、噂に聞いた……

engChrName: These are temporary-issue security cards for visitors such as yourselves. The city implemented them last year.
engSearchText:
These are temporary-issue security cards for visitors
such as yourselves. The city implemented them
last year.
jpnChrName: 昨年からバーゼル市で発行している 短期滞在ゲスト用のセキュリティカードです。
jpnSearchText:
昨年からバーゼル市で発行している
短期滞在ゲスト用のセキュリティカードです。

engChrName: With these, you're free to use the aerotram to travel to New Town and the Artisanal District.
engSearchText:
With these, you're free to use the aerotram to travel
to New Town and the Artisanal District.
jpnChrName: 新市街・職人街であれば 特に制限はありませんが──
jpnSearchText:
新市街・職人街であれば
特に制限はありませんが──

engChrName: You can't take the upper-level aerotram to the Institute of Science, however.
engSearchText:
You can't take the upper-level aerotram to the
Institute of Science, however.
jpnChrName: 上層の理科大学とエアロトラムについては 利用できませんのでご了承ください。
jpnSearchText:
上層の理科大学とエアロトラムについては
利用できませんのでご了承ください。

engChrName: Huh? Why not...?
engSearchText: Huh? Why not...?

engChrName: Wait, hold up—
engSearchText: Wait, hold up—
jpnChrName: おい、ちょっと待てや──
jpnSearchText: おい、ちょっと待てや──

engChrName: 'Preciate it. We'll go and get to work, then.
engSearchText: 'Preciate it. We'll go and get to work, then.
jpnChrName: ありがたくお借りしますよ。 それじゃあ、自分たちはこれで。
jpnSearchText:
ありがたくお借りしますよ。
それじゃあ、自分たちはこれで。

engChrName: Wait. Given our public position, we have to make sure the principality saves face.
engSearchText:
Wait. Given our public position, we have to make
sure the principality saves face.
jpnChrName: 待ちたまえ──こちらも建前上、 公国の顔を立てる必要はあってな。
jpnSearchText:
待ちたまえ──こちらも建前上、
公国の顔を立てる必要はあってな。

engChrName: I personally don't think this warrants an investigation by the likes of you, but we nevertheless prepared a point of contact for you.
engSearchText:
I personally don't think this warrants an investigation
by the likes of you, but we nevertheless prepared a
point of contact for you.
jpnChrName: 調査屋ごときに必要ないとは思うが、 一応“窓口”を用意しておいた。
jpnSearchText:
調査屋ごときに必要ないとは思うが、
一応“窓口”を用意しておいた。

engChrName: My name is Quatre Salision. I'm an assistant at the Institute of Science.
engSearchText:
My name is Quatre Salision. I'm an assistant at the
Institute of Science.
jpnChrName: カトル・サリシオンです。 理科大学で助手をしています。
jpnSearchText:
カトル・サリシオンです。
理科大学で助手をしています。

engChrName: I have other business to attend to, so I can't always provide you with support...
engSearchText:
I have other business to attend to, so I can't always
provide you with support...
jpnChrName: 別の案件も抱えているので常時対応は 難しいかもしれませんが……
jpnSearchText:
別の案件も抱えているので常時対応は
難しいかもしれませんが……

engChrName: ...but should you have any questions, you're welcome to contact me.
engSearchText:
...but should you have any questions, you're welcome
to contact me.
jpnChrName: 問い合わせなどがあれば 遠慮なく連絡していただければ。
jpnSearchText:
問い合わせなどがあれば
遠慮なく連絡していただければ。

engChrName: Well, we'd appreciate that.
engSearchText: Well, we'd appreciate that.
jpnChrName: こりゃご丁寧にどうも。
jpnSearchText: こりゃご丁寧にどうも。

engChrName: Contact information exchanged!
engSearchText: Contact information exchanged!
jpnChrName: 連絡先を交換したわよ。
jpnSearchText: 連絡先を交換したわよ。

engChrName: Huh... That's an unusual holo.
engSearchText: Huh... That's an unusual holo.
jpnChrName: そのホロウは…… 珍しいタイプみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
そのホロウは……
珍しいタイプみたいですね。

engChrName: Ah, don't worry about that. Actually, if you don't mind me askin'...
engSearchText:
Ah, don't worry about that. Actually, if you don't
mind me askin'...
jpnChrName: ああ、気にしないでくれ。 それよりも──
jpnSearchText:
ああ、気にしないでくれ。
それよりも──
……？　何か？

engChrName: No, it's just—don't take this the wrong way, okay?
engSearchText: No, it's just—don't take this the wrong way, okay?
jpnChrName: いや…… 気を悪くしないでもらいたいんだが。
jpnSearchText:
いや……
気を悪くしないでもらいたいんだが。

engChrName: I was just wondering what pronouns to use for you.
engSearchText: I was just wondering what pronouns to use for you.
jpnChrName: “君”付けか“ちゃん”付けか、 君をどう呼んだものかと思ってね。
jpnSearchText:
“君”付けか“ちゃん”付けか、
君をどう呼んだものかと思ってね。
………………………………

engChrName: ...Huh?
engSearchText: ...Huh?
jpnSearchText: ………え゛。

engChrName: Are you out of your mind?
engSearchText: Are you out of your mind?
jpnChrName: は？　何抜かしてんだ？
jpnSearchText: は？　何抜かしてんだ？

engChrName: Umm... Quatre is very pretty, but he doesn't really have a female physique.
engSearchText:
Umm... Quatre is very pretty, but he doesn't really
have a female physique.
jpnChrName: えと、すごく綺麗ですけど、 女のヒトの体型には……
jpnSearchText:
えと、すごく綺麗ですけど、
女のヒトの体型には……

engChrName: ...Of course I don't! I'm a guy!
engSearchText: ...Of course I don't! I'm a guy!
jpnChrName: っ……当たり前です！ 男に決まっているでしょう！？
jpnSearchText:
っ……当たり前です！
男に決まっているでしょう！？

engChrName: Look, seriously, I'm sorry.
engSearchText: Look, seriously, I'm sorry.
jpnChrName: 悪かった、ついな。
jpnSearchText: 悪かった、ついな。

engChrName: You're about fourteen or so, give or take? At that age, I figured it was possible you could be either.
engSearchText:
You're about fourteen or so, give or take? At that age,
I figured it was possible you could be either.
jpnChrName: １４くらいか？　その年頃だと どっちでもあり得ると思っちまった。
jpnSearchText:
１４くらいか？　その年頃だと
どっちでもあり得ると思っちまった。

engChrName: You must've skipped more than a few grades if you're an assistant at the institute.
engSearchText:
You must've skipped more than a few grades if you're
an assistant at the institute.
jpnChrName: 飛び級っぽいが、理科大学の 助手とは随分優秀そうじゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
飛び級っぽいが、理科大学の
助手とは随分優秀そうじゃないか？

engChrName: ...I suppose you could say that. I'm actually fifteen, by the way.
engSearchText:
...I suppose you could say that. I'm actually fifteen, by
the way.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、それなりには。 それと僕は１５歳です。
jpnSearchText:
……まあ、それなりには。
それと僕は１５歳です。

engChrName: Hmph. But I guess it's fine—sometimes people do get the wrong idea from afar.
engSearchText:
Hmph. But I guess it's fine—sometimes people do
get the wrong idea from afar.
jpnChrName: フン……いいですけどね。 たまに遠目だと勘違いされますし。
jpnSearchText:
フン……いいですけどね。
たまに遠目だと勘違いされますし。

engChrName: (I wasn't sure at first with the way his coat covers him, either...)
engSearchText:
(I wasn't sure at first with the way his coat covers
him, either...)
jpnChrName: （うーん……わたしも最初は   外套着てて間違われましたけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん……わたしも最初は
外套着てて間違われましたけど……）

engChrName: (Yeah, but who makes the mistake as close as he is? Man, I sure as shit do NOT want to get old.)
engSearchText:
(Yeah, but who makes the mistake as close as he is?
Man, I sure as shit do NOT want to get old.)
jpnChrName: （にしたってこの距離で間違うかよ？   ヤダヤダ、歳だけは食いたくねぇなぁ。）
jpnSearchText:
（にしたってこの距離で間違うかよ？
ヤダヤダ、歳だけは食いたくねぇなぁ。）

engChrName: Enough! If you're all done, then please, get out of here!
engSearchText:
Enough! If you're all done, then please, get out
of here!
jpnChrName: ──ええい、 無駄話が済んだなら行きたまえ！
jpnSearchText:
──ええい、
無駄話が済んだなら行きたまえ！

engChrName: I'm a busy man. After this, I—
engSearchText: I'm a busy man. After this, I—
jpnChrName: こちらも忙しいのだよ、この後も──
jpnSearchText: こちらも忙しいのだよ、この後も──

engChrName: Mr. Tausend, sir, the students from Aramis Academy have arrived.
engSearchText:
Mr. Tausend, sir, the students from Aramis Academy
have arrived.
jpnChrName: ＣＥＯ、アラミス高等学校の 生徒さんが見えました。
jpnSearchText:
ＣＥＯ、アラミス高等学校の
生徒さんが見えました。

engChrName: Already? Well, let them through.
engSearchText: Already? Well, let them through.
jpnChrName: もう着いたか──通したまえ。
jpnSearchText: もう着いたか──通したまえ。

engChrName: Salision, I'll be counting on you yet again.
engSearchText: Salision, I'll be counting on you yet again.
jpnChrName: サリシオン君、次も同様に頼むぞ。
jpnSearchText: サリシオン君、次も同様に頼むぞ。

engChrName: You're staying for three days, yes? Hmph. Good luck 'clearing out the gutter,' so to speak.
engSearchText:
