You're staying for three days, yes? Hmph. Good luck
'clearing out the gutter,' so to speak.
jpnChrName: 滞在は三日だったか……そちらは 精々“ドブさらい”に励むことだな。
jpnSearchText:
滞在は三日だったか……そちらは
精々“ドブさらい”に励むことだな。

engChrName: Tch. Not even trying to be subtle.
engSearchText: Tch. Not even trying to be subtle.
jpnChrName: チッ、露骨に厄介者扱いとはな。
jpnSearchText: チッ、露骨に厄介者扱いとはな。

engChrName: He's a real pain in the ass, but that makes it easier for us to move around, at least. Works for me.
engSearchText:
He's a real pain in the ass, but that makes it easier for
us to move around, at least. Works for me.
jpnChrName: ムカつくが動きやすくなりそうだし、 好都合っちゃ好都合か。
jpnSearchText:
ムカつくが動きやすくなりそうだし、
好都合っちゃ好都合か。

engChrName: Heh. Now you're starting to get it.
engSearchText: Heh. Now you're starting to get it.
jpnChrName: ハン…… 分かってきたじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ハン……
分かってきたじゃねえか？

engChrName: Oh, shut up.
engSearchText: Oh, shut up.
jpnChrName: ウゼーっつの。
jpnSearchText: ウゼーっつの。

engChrName: He said there were no problems, but he certainly didn't act like that was the case.
engSearchText:
He said there were no problems, but he certainly
didn't act like that was the case.
jpnChrName: ……問題ないと言うわりには なんか余裕がない感じでしたね。
jpnSearchText:
……問題ないと言うわりには
なんか余裕がない感じでしたね。

engChrName: Agreed. He might not have the answers, but he most certainly has cause for concern. Or, at least, that is how it appeared to me.
engSearchText:
Agreed. He might not have the answers, but he most
certainly has cause for concern. Or, at least, that is
how it appeared to me.
jpnChrName: ええ、確たる心当たりはないにせよ 不安材料を抱えている……そんな印象です。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、確たる心当たりはないにせよ
不安材料を抱えている……そんな印象です。

engChrName: I don't believe it will be easy to get anything out of him.
engSearchText:
I don't believe it will be easy to get anything out
of him.
jpnChrName: 情報を引き出すにしても 簡単にとはいかないでしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
情報を引き出すにしても
簡単にとはいかないでしょうね。

engChrName: I don't believe ANY part of this is gonna be easy. We'll have to tackle it from a few different angles.
engSearchText:
I don't believe ANY part of this is gonna be easy.
We'll have to tackle it from a few different angles.
jpnChrName: 楽にいかねぇのは今回も同じだろう。 色んな角度から嗅ぎ回ってみねえとな。
jpnSearchText:
楽にいかねぇのは今回も同じだろう。
色んな角度から嗅ぎ回ってみねえとな。

engChrName: Which means...
engSearchText: Which means...
jpnChrName: そうなるとアイツも──
jpnSearchText: そうなるとアイツも──

engChrName: Ah...
engSearchText: Ah...

engChrName: Oh?
engSearchText: Oh?
jpnChrName: あら。
jpnSearchText: あら。

engChrName: Aren't they...?
engSearchText: Aren't they...?
jpnChrName: あれ、あの人たちって……！
jpnSearchText: あれ、あの人たちって……！

engChrName: They were in front of Central Station this morning.
engSearchText: They were in front of Central Station this morning.
jpnChrName: 今朝、中央駅の前にいた……
jpnSearchText: 今朝、中央駅の前にいた……

engChrName: S-So he really is Agnès' boyfriend from her part-time gig?!
engSearchText:
S-So he really is Agnès' boyfriend from her
part-time gig?!
jpnChrName: マ、マジでアニエスちゃんの バイト先の恋人だってのかぁ～！？
jpnSearchText:
マ、マジでアニエスちゃんの
バイト先の恋人だってのかぁ～！？

engChrName: ...Lyle, I told you that's not true.
engSearchText: ...Lyle, I told you that's not true.
jpnChrName: ……ライエル君、 違うって言いましたよね？
jpnSearchText:
……ライエル君、
違うって言いましたよね？

engChrName: Right. My bad.
engSearchText: Right. My bad.
jpnChrName: あ……はい。
jpnSearchText: あ……はい。

engChrName: How's it goin', good students? We're just here for work.
engSearchText:
How's it goin', good students? We're just here
for work.
jpnChrName: お疲れさんだ、学生諸君。 ちょっとした出張でね。
jpnSearchText:
お疲れさんだ、学生諸君。
ちょっとした出張でね。

engChrName: Good luck with the whole school trip thing.
engSearchText: Good luck with the whole school trip thing.
jpnChrName: 視察研修、頑張ってくれよ。
jpnSearchText: 視察研修、頑張ってくれよ。

engChrName: (Heehee. I know I'M in her corner.)
engSearchText: (Heehee. I know I'M in her corner.)
jpnChrName: （ふふ、出来る限りは   支えてあげないとね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふ、出来る限りは
支えてあげないとね。）

engChrName: (I still want no part in any of this.)
engSearchText: (I still want no part in any of this.)
jpnChrName: （……フン、別に   認めたわけじゃないけどな。）
jpnSearchText:
（……フン、別に
認めたわけじゃないけどな。）

engChrName: Er, welcome, students of Aramis. Right this way.
engSearchText: Er, welcome, students of Aramis. Right this way.
jpnChrName: ？　ようこそ、アラミスの皆さん、 どうぞこちらへ。
jpnSearchText:
？　ようこそ、アラミスの皆さん、
どうぞこちらへ。

engChrName: These are your C-rank certification cards.
engSearchText: These are your C-rank certification cards.
jpnChrName: ランクＣの認証カードになります。
jpnSearchText: ランクＣの認証カードになります。

engChrName: They're primarily for outside trainees, so you will have access to the institute and the aerotram.
engSearchText:
They're primarily for outside trainees, so you will have
access to the institute and the aerotram.
jpnChrName: 外部研修生向けで、理科大学への立入や エアロトラムなども利用可能です。
jpnSearchText:
外部研修生向けで、理科大学への立入や
エアロトラムなども利用可能です。

engChrName: Thank you very much.
engSearchText: Thank you very much.
jpnChrName: どうも、ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: どうも、ありがとうございます。

engChrName: Wowee! So we can ride the aerotram as much as we want?
engSearchText:
Wowee! So we can ride the aerotram as much as
we want?
jpnChrName: へ～、これがあれば乗り放題なんだ。
jpnSearchText: へ～、これがあれば乗り放題なんだ。

engChrName: And we can visit the Institute of Science... This will help our reports big time.
engSearchText:
And we can visit the Institute of Science... This will
help our reports big time.
jpnChrName: 理科大学もか…… レポートがかなり捗りそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
理科大学もか……
レポートがかなり捗りそうだな。

engChrName: Then each group is free to do what they want.
engSearchText: Then each group is free to do what they want.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それでは班ごとに 自由行動といきましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、それでは班ごとに
自由行動といきましょうか。

engChrName: We'll meet back up at the hotel lobby around 6:30. Remember: you'll be punished if you're late. ❤
engSearchText:
We'll meet back up at the hotel lobby around 6:30.
Remember: you'll be punished if you're late. ❤
jpnChrName: １８：３０にホテルのロビーに集合、 遅れたらお仕置きだから❤
jpnSearchText:
１８：３０にホテルのロビーに集合、
遅れたらお仕置きだから❤

engChrName: Y-Yes, ma'am!
engSearchText: Y-Yes, ma'am!
jpnChrName: は、はひっ……！
jpnSearchText: は、はひっ……！

engChrName: You won't catch ME being late!
engSearchText: You won't catch ME being late!
jpnChrName: ゼッタイ遅刻しないッス！
jpnSearchText: ゼッタイ遅刻しないッス！

engChrName: Hey, now. Don't threaten the first years.
engSearchText: Hey, now. Don't threaten the first years.
jpnChrName: こらこら、一年を脅さないの。
jpnSearchText: こらこら、一年を脅さないの。

engChrName: Anyway, let's make sure this visit is a fruitful one.
engSearchText: Anyway, let's make sure this visit is a fruitful one.
jpnChrName: はは、とにかく 実のある研修にしないとですね。
jpnSearchText:
はは、とにかく
実のある研修にしないとですね。

engChrName: Hmph. Let's get moving, underclassmen.
engSearchText: Hmph. Let's get moving, underclassmen.
jpnChrName: フン…… とっとと行くぞ、下級生ども。
jpnSearchText:
フン……
とっとと行くぞ、下級生ども。

engChrName: Then I'll leave you all to it.
engSearchText: Then I'll leave you all to it.
jpnChrName: ──それでは、僕もこれで。
jpnSearchText: ──それでは、僕もこれで。

engChrName: If you need anything at all, just contact me via the number I gave you. See you—
engSearchText:
If you need anything at all, just contact me via the
number I gave you. See you—
jpnChrName: 何かあれば先ほどの番号にお願いします。 それでは──
jpnSearchText:
何かあれば先ほどの番号にお願いします。
それでは──

engChrName: Hold on a second, Quatre Salision.
engSearchText: Hold on a second, Quatre Salision.
jpnChrName: 待って、カトル・サリシオン君。
jpnSearchText: 待って、カトル・サリシオン君。

engChrName: I've heard quite a few things about you—like how you're the professor's favorite student.
engSearchText:
I've heard quite a few things about you—like how
you're the professor's favorite student.
jpnChrName: 噂はかねがね── 博士の秘蔵っ子だそうね？
jpnSearchText:
噂はかねがね──
博士の秘蔵っ子だそうね？

engChrName: Hmm...?
engSearchText: Hmm...?

engChrName: Renne?
engSearchText: Renne?
jpnChrName: ブライト先輩？
jpnSearchText: ブライト先輩？

engChrName: (Wait. Then...)
engSearchText: (Wait. Then...)
jpnChrName: （……それって……）
jpnSearchText: （……それって……）

engChrName: You see, I'm a foreign exchange student from Liberl, so we just so happened to have met through a contact at ZCF.
engSearchText:
You see, I'm a foreign exchange student from Liberl,
so we just so happened to have met through a contact
at ZCF.
jpnChrName: 私、リベールからの留学生なのだけど、 ＺＣＦのツテで彼（・）女（・）とは面識があってね。
jpnSearchText:
私、リベールからの留学生なのだけど、
ＺＣＦのツテで彼（・）女（・）とは面識があってね。

engChrName: We had quite the wonderful chat after she read all of my past papers.
engSearchText:
We had quite the wonderful chat after she read all
of my past papers.
jpnChrName: “過去の論文”も全部読んでいてくれて 色々と盛り上がったこともあるわ。
jpnSearchText:
“過去の論文”も全部読んでいてくれて
色々と盛り上がったこともあるわ。

engChrName: ZCF? I've met both Professor Russell and his daughter, so—
engSearchText:
ZCF? I've met both Professor Russell and his
daughter, so—
jpnChrName: ＺＣＦの……あのラッセル博士や エリカ博士なら僕も一応面識が──
jpnSearchText:
ＺＣＦの……あのラッセル博士や
エリカ博士なら僕も一応面識が──

engChrName: Wait... Papers? Don't tell me you're...?!
engSearchText: Wait... Papers? Don't tell me you're...?!
jpnChrName: 論文って……まさか！？
jpnSearchText: 論文って……まさか！？

engChrName: Heehee. Oh, never you mind that. To circle back to my original point, I have a request to ask of you.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Oh, never you mind that. To circle back to
my original point, I have a request to ask of you.
jpnChrName: うふふ、それはいいのよ。 それよりさっそく相談なのだけど。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、それはいいのよ。
それよりさっそく相談なのだけど。

engChrName: My friend here will be operating on her own. Could I ask you to take her to the Artisanal District for me?
engSearchText:
My friend here will be operating on her own. Could I
ask you to take her to the Artisanal District for me?
jpnChrName: この子、実は一人だけ別行動でね。 職人街まで送ってあげてくれないかしら？
jpnSearchText:
この子、実は一人だけ別行動でね。
職人街まで送ってあげてくれないかしら？

engChrName: Renne...
engSearchText: Renne...
jpnChrName: 先輩……
jpnSearchText: 先輩……

engChrName: ...I see. So you're already getting a move on, then?
engSearchText: ...I see. So you're already getting a move on, then?
jpnChrName: ……そうか、さっそく行くんだな。
jpnSearchText: ……そうか、さっそく行くんだな。

engChrName: Aww... And I was hoping we could hang out for a little bit, too.
engSearchText:
Aww... And I was hoping we could hang out for a
little bit, too.
jpnChrName: うーん、ちょっとくらいは 一緒に回りたかったんだけどな～。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、ちょっとくらいは
一緒に回りたかったんだけどな～。

engChrName: Sorry for deciding this on my own, you two.
engSearchText: Sorry for deciding this on my own, you two.
jpnChrName: 二人とも……ごめんなさい。 勝手に決めてしまって。
jpnSearchText:
二人とも……ごめんなさい。
勝手に決めてしまって。

engChrName: Nah, it's fine. We've got three whole days, right? And you'll be back come nighttime anyway.
engSearchText:
Nah, it's fine. We've got three whole days, right?
And you'll be back come nighttime anyway.
jpnChrName: まあまあ、３日もあるんだし、 夜はちゃんと戻ってくるんでしょ？
jpnSearchText:
まあまあ、３日もあるんだし、
夜はちゃんと戻ってくるんでしょ？

engChrName: We'll be counting on one heck of a report!
engSearchText: We'll be counting on one heck of a report!
jpnChrName: その分いいレポート、期待してるから！
jpnSearchText: その分いいレポート、期待してるから！

engChrName: Just be careful, okay?
engSearchText: Just be careful, okay?
jpnChrName: ……くれぐれも気を付けてな。
jpnSearchText: ……くれぐれも気を付けてな。

engChrName: Of course!
engSearchText: Of course!
jpnChrName: はい……！
jpnSearchText: はい……！

engChrName: Is this...perhaps related to...?
engSearchText: Is this...perhaps related to...?
jpnChrName: えっと、もしかして先ほどの……？
jpnSearchText: えっと、もしかして先ほどの……？

engChrName: In any event, I don't mind. I just so happen to have business in the Artisanal District, so it works out.
engSearchText:
In any event, I don't mind. I just so happen to have
business in the Artisanal District, so it works out.
jpnChrName: ──まあ、別に構いませんよ、 ちょうど僕も職人街に用があったので。
jpnSearchText:
──まあ、別に構いませんよ、
ちょうど僕も職人街に用があったので。

engChrName: I'll show you the way...umm...
engSearchText: I'll show you the way...umm...
jpnChrName: 案内します、えっと──
jpnSearchText: 案内します、えっと──

engChrName: Agnès Claudel. I'm a first year at Aramis Academy.
engSearchText: Agnès Claudel. I'm a first year at Aramis Academy.
jpnChrName: アラミス高等学校一年の アニエス・クローデルです。
jpnSearchText:
アラミス高等学校一年の
アニエス・クローデルです。

engChrName: It's a pleasure to meet you.
engSearchText: It's a pleasure to meet you.
jpnChrName: よろしくお願いします、カトルさん。
jpnSearchText: よろしくお願いします、カトルさん。

engChrName: ...Likewise.
engSearchText: ...Likewise.
jpnChrName: ……ど、どうも。
jpnSearchText: ……ど、どうも。

engChrName: (Hmm?)
engSearchText: (Hmm?)
jpnSearchText: （むむ……？）

engChrName: (Ooh... / Well, well...)
engSearchText: (Ooh... / Well, well...)
jpnSearchText: （ほほう……？／あら……？）

engChrName: Then I'm counting on you to lead the way, Mr. Salision.
engSearchText:
Then I'm counting on you to lead the way,
Mr. Salision.
jpnChrName: それではサリシオンさん、 案内をお願いしますね。
jpnSearchText:
それではサリシオンさん、
案内をお願いしますね。

engChrName: Of course. Happily.
engSearchText: Of course. Happily.
jpnChrName: ええ……任せてください。
jpnSearchText: ええ……任せてください。

engChrName: Once we catch the aerotram, we'll be at the Artisanal District in no time at all.
engSearchText:
Once we catch the aerotram, we'll be at the Artisanal
District in no time at all.
jpnChrName: といってもエアロトラムを使えば 職人街まではすぐです。
jpnSearchText:
といってもエアロトラムを使えば
職人街まではすぐです。

engChrName: By the way, you're older than me, aren't you?
engSearchText: By the way, you're older than me, aren't you?
jpnChrName: あと、貴女の方が年上ですよね？
jpnSearchText: あと、貴女の方が年上ですよね？

engChrName: 'Mr.' might be a little stiff. You can just call me Quatre if that's all right.
engSearchText:
'Mr.' might be a little stiff. You can just call me
Quatre if that's all right.
jpnChrName: よかったら名前で──それに “さん”も必要ありませんから。
jpnSearchText:
よかったら名前で──それに
“さん”も必要ありませんから。

engChrName: You don't mind? Heehee! Then Quatre it is!
engSearchText: You don't mind? Heehee! Then Quatre it is!
jpnChrName: そうですか……？ ふふ、それじゃあカトル君で。
jpnSearchText:
そうですか……？
ふふ、それじゃあカトル君で。

engChrName: Oh, but I'm only older than you by a year, so I don't want you to be too stiff with me, either. Why don't we talk like we're old friends?
engSearchText:
Oh, but I'm only older than you by a year, so I don't
want you to be too stiff with me, either. Why don't
we talk like we're old friends?
jpnChrName: あ、１歳しか違いませんし そちらも敬語じゃなくて結構ですよ？
jpnSearchText:
あ、１歳しか違いませんし
そちらも敬語じゃなくて結構ですよ？

engChrName: Umm... Okay. I'll keep it casual, then.
engSearchText: Umm... Okay. I'll keep it casual, then.
jpnChrName: えっと……それじゃあ そうさせてもらおうかな。
jpnSearchText:
えっと……それじゃあ
そうさせてもらおうかな。

engChrName: I get the feeling you're always told to loosen up a little more?
engSearchText:
I get the feeling you're always told to loosen up a
little more?
jpnChrName: アニエスさんの方も── って、それが貴女の口調なのかな？
jpnSearchText:
アニエスさんの方も──
って、それが貴女の口調なのかな？

engChrName: That's right. My friends never let me hear the end of it, but I can't help the way I talk.
engSearchText:
That's right. My friends never let me hear the end of
it, but I can't help the way I talk.
jpnChrName: ええ、そうなんです。 友達には直せって言われるんですけど。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、そうなんです。
友達には直せって言われるんですけど。

engChrName: I know I'm repeating myself, but it really is a pleasure, Quatre.
engSearchText:
I know I'm repeating myself, but it really is a
pleasure, Quatre.
jpnChrName: 改めてよろしくお願いしますね。
jpnSearchText: 改めてよろしくお願いしますね。

engChrName: Same to you. Now, uh, should we get going?
engSearchText: Same to you. Now, uh, should we get going?
jpnChrName: うん──それじゃあ行こうか。
jpnSearchText: うん──それじゃあ行こうか。

engChrName: You don't see aerotrams much across the continent, do you?
engSearchText:
You don't see aerotrams much across the continent,
do you?
jpnChrName: 《エアロトラム》…… 大陸でも珍しい乗り物ですよね。
jpnSearchText:
《エアロトラム》……
大陸でも珍しい乗り物ですよね。

engChrName: I'd call them a must with where Basel is located.
engSearchText: I'd call them a must with where Basel is located.
jpnChrName: 峡谷地帯のバーゼルならではだろうね。
jpnSearchText: 峡谷地帯のバーゼルならではだろうね。

engChrName: New Town, the Artisanal District, the Institute of Science... It travels along a loop and helps consistently deliver parts wherever needed.
engSearchText:
New Town, the Artisanal District, the Institute
of Science... It travels along a loop and helps
consistently deliver parts wherever needed.
jpnChrName: 新市街と職人街、理科大学を環状に結んでいて 精密部品の運搬も効率よく進められる。
jpnSearchText:
新市街と職人街、理科大学を環状に結んでいて
精密部品の運搬も効率よく進められる。

engChrName: The Artisanal District's platform is on the right. Just tap your card against the ticket gate.
engSearchText:
The Artisanal District's platform is on the right.
Just tap your card against the ticket gate.
jpnChrName: 職人街は右方面だね。 改札機に認証カードをかざしてみて。
jpnSearchText:
職人街は右方面だね。
改札機に認証カードをかざしてみて。

engChrName: All right. Let me give it a try.
engSearchText: All right. Let me give it a try.
jpnChrName: はい、やってみます。
jpnSearchText: はい、やってみます。

engChrName: What a spectacular view! ...Though I get a little dizzy when I look down.
engSearchText:
What a spectacular view! ...Though I get a little dizzy
when I look down.
jpnChrName: 素晴らしい眺めですね……！ 下を見ちゃうとクラクラしますけど。
jpnSearchText:
素晴らしい眺めですね……！
下を見ちゃうとクラクラしますけど。

engChrName: And wow! New Town is already so far away!
engSearchText: And wow! New Town is already so far away!
jpnChrName: わあっ、新市街がもうあんなに遠くに！
jpnSearchText: わあっ、新市街がもうあんなに遠くに！

engChrName: Enjoying yourself?
engSearchText: Enjoying yourself?
jpnChrName: 気に入ってもらえた？
jpnSearchText: 気に入ってもらえた？

engChrName: Yes! Tremendously!
engSearchText: Yes! Tremendously!
jpnChrName: はい、とっても……！
jpnSearchText: はい、とっても……！

engChrName: I bet Feri would enjoy this, too. I wonder if she's gotten the chance to ride yet...
engSearchText:
I bet Feri would enjoy this, too. I wonder if she's
gotten the chance to ride yet...
jpnChrName: フェリちゃんとか喜びそうですけど まだ乗ってないのかな……？
jpnSearchText:
フェリちゃんとか喜びそうですけど
まだ乗ってないのかな……？

engChrName: (She really is so cute...but how is someone like her connected to those others?)
engSearchText:
(She really is so cute...but how is someone like her
connected to those others?)
jpnChrName: （可愛らしい人だな……   ──でも彼らとどういう……？）
jpnSearchText:
（可愛らしい人だな……
──でも彼らとどういう……？）

engChrName: Tch. Even the locals barely use it.
engSearchText: Tch. Even the locals barely use it.
jpnChrName: チッ、地元のヤツですら ほとんど使ってねーじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
チッ、地元のヤツですら
ほとんど使ってねーじゃねえか。

engChrName: That's because most either go by car or use the aerotram.
engSearchText:
That's because most either go by car or use
the aerotram.
jpnChrName: ま、大抵は車道か エアロトラムなんだろうからな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、大抵は車道か
エアロトラムなんだろうからな。

engChrName: You rode the aerotram, right? How was it?
engSearchText: You rode the aerotram, right? How was it?
jpnChrName: アニエスさんはあれに乗ったんですよね？ どんな感じでしたか？
jpnSearchText:
アニエスさんはあれに乗ったんですよね？
どんな感じでしたか？

engChrName: It had the best view! ...But it was a little scary, too.
engSearchText: It had the best view! ...But it was a little scary, too.
jpnChrName: ふふ、良い眺めでしたよ。 ちょっと怖かったですけど……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、良い眺めでしたよ。
ちょっと怖かったですけど……

engChrName: I didn't think there'd be a difference in ranks... Have you never used the aerotram in the past, Van?
engSearchText:
I didn't think there'd be a difference in ranks...
Have you never used the aerotram in the past, Van?
jpnChrName: でもランクに差を付けるなんて…… ヴァンさんは以前、乗らなかったんですか？
jpnSearchText:
でもランクに差を付けるなんて……
ヴァンさんは以前、乗らなかったんですか？

engChrName: Nah, I got to ride it when I came here a couple years ago. Just had a regular old ticket.
engSearchText:
Nah, I got to ride it when I came here a couple
years ago. Just had a regular old ticket.
jpnChrName: いや、２年前に来た時には 普通に乗車券で乗れたな。
jpnSearchText:
いや、２年前に来た時には
普通に乗車券で乗れたな。

engChrName: From what I hear, security within the city's undergone a massive overhaul.
engSearchText:
From what I hear, security within the city's
undergone a massive overhaul.
jpnChrName: 噂では聞いたが、都市内のセキュリティが 大幅に強化されたんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
噂では聞いたが、都市内のセキュリティが
大幅に強化されたんだろう。

engChrName: After the war, the government ordered a total reform.
engSearchText: After the war, the government ordered a total reform.
jpnChrName: あの大戦後、共和国政府の指示で 大幅な刷新が行われたと聞いています。
jpnSearchText:
あの大戦後、共和国政府の指示で
大幅な刷新が行われたと聞いています。

engChrName: I don't find it surprising that they would want to be very careful with an experimental city that is very nearly a national secret.
engSearchText:
I don't find it surprising that they would want to be
very careful with an experimental city that is very
nearly a national secret.
jpnChrName: 国家機密に近い計画都市であれば 慎重にならざるを得ないのは当然かと。
jpnSearchText:
国家機密に近い計画都市であれば
慎重にならざるを得ないのは当然かと。

engChrName: Okay, but tell me how that puts us at a lower rank than a bunch of kids here on a school trip?
engSearchText:
Okay, but tell me how that puts us at a lower rank
than a bunch of kids here on a school trip?
jpnChrName: ハッ、だからと言って研修に来た 学生より下とかあり得ねぇけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、だからと言って研修に来た
学生より下とかあり得ねぇけどな。

engChrName: I don't think it's that they're high—I think it's more that we're low.
engSearchText:
I don't think it's that they're high—I think it's more
that we're low.
jpnChrName: うーん、よっぽどわたしたちを 歓迎してないってことですよね……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、よっぽどわたしたちを
歓迎してないってことですよね……

engChrName: Eh, still, it's not a big deal. As long as we can drive.
engSearchText: Eh, still, it's not a big deal. As long as we can drive.
jpnChrName: ま、いざとなりゃ、 車も使えるし問題はねぇだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ま、いざとなりゃ、
車も使えるし問題はねぇだろう。

engChrName: By the way, pretty sure we'll eventually bump into your classmates. You okay on that end?
engSearchText:
By the way, pretty sure we'll eventually bump into
your classmates. You okay on that end?
jpnChrName: ──そういや、そろそろ同級生に 出くわしそうだが大丈夫なのか？
jpnSearchText:
──そういや、そろそろ同級生に
出くわしそうだが大丈夫なのか？

engChrName: I'm fine. I've explained things to them for the most part.
engSearchText:
I'm fine. I've explained things to them for the
most part.
jpnChrName: はい、ある程度説明していますから。
jpnSearchText: はい、ある程度説明していますから。

engChrName: They might happen upon some info before us, so if we see them, let's make it a point to ask.
engSearchText:
They might happen upon some info before us, so if
we see them, let's make it a point to ask.
jpnChrName: 先に何か掴んでいるかもしれませんし、 見かけたら声を掛けてみましょう。
jpnSearchText:
先に何か掴んでいるかもしれませんし、
見かけたら声を掛けてみましょう。

engChrName: This building is...
engSearchText: This building is...
jpnChrName: ここは……
jpnSearchText: ここは……

engChrName: Liberl's ZCF and the Epstein Foundation, eh?
engSearchText: Liberl's ZCF and the Epstein Foundation, eh?
jpnChrName: リベールのＺＣＦ（ツァイス中央工房）── それに《エプスタイン財団》か。
jpnSearchText:
リベールのＺＣＦ（ツァイス中央工房）──
それに《エプスタイン財団》か。

engChrName: The foreign tech foundation established using your great-grandfather's cash, right?
engSearchText:
The foreign tech foundation established using your
great-grandfather's cash, right?
jpnChrName: オメーの曾祖父さんの基金から 設立されたっつう、外国の技術財団か。
jpnSearchText:
オメーの曾祖父さんの基金から
設立されたっつう、外国の技術財団か。

engChrName: With how famous it is even in the Republic, it's kinda funny that it's been dumped over in the corner like this.
engSearchText:
With how famous it is even in the Republic, it's kinda
funny that it's been dumped over in the corner
like this.
jpnChrName: 共和国でも昔から名前は知れてるが 随分隅っこに押しやられてんじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
共和国でも昔から名前は知れてるが
随分隅っこに押しやられてんじゃねえか。

engChrName: You're so rude, Aaron.
engSearchText: You're so rude, Aaron.
jpnChrName: ……アーロンさんは “でりかしー”が無いです。
jpnSearchText:
……アーロンさんは
“でりかしー”が無いです。

engChrName: Ahaha... It's fine.
engSearchText: Ahaha... It's fine.
jpnChrName: あはは……大丈夫ですよ。
jpnSearchText: あはは……大丈夫ですよ。

engChrName: But before, all the big buildings were part of the foundation's branch here.
engSearchText:
But before, all the big buildings were part of the
foundation's branch here.
jpnChrName: でも、以前は大きなビル全てが 財団の支部だったそうですね？
jpnSearchText:
でも、以前は大きなビル全てが
財団の支部だったそうですね？

engChrName: Indeed. As a part of their downsizing in the Republic, they moved to this location.
engSearchText:
Indeed. As a part of their downsizing in the Republic,
they moved to this location.
jpnChrName: ええ、共和国での事業縮小と合わせ こちらに移転したのだとか。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、共和国での事業縮小と合わせ
こちらに移転したのだとか。

engChrName: Its performance in other countries remains stable, but...
engSearchText:
Its performance in other countries remains
stable, but...
jpnChrName: 財団の業績自体、共和国以外では さほど落ちてはいないようですが……
jpnSearchText:
財団の業績自体、共和国以外では
さほど落ちてはいないようですが……

engChrName: With tech goin' the way it is, it's only natural there'd be a dip in business.
engSearchText:
With tech goin' the way it is, it's only natural there'd
be a dip in business.
jpnChrName: ま、こんな“規格”が広まってる以上、 若干下がるのは仕方ねえだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、こんな“規格”が広まってる以上、
若干下がるのは仕方ねえだろうな。

engChrName: Right. With the Xipha...
engSearchText: Right. With the Xipha...
jpnChrName: ザイファ規格……
jpnSearchText: ザイファ規格……

engChrName: What was it before, again? I think they're doing the rounds underground...
engSearchText:
What was it before, again? I think they're doing the
rounds underground...
jpnChrName: 以前は別の規格でしたよね。 今では裏に流れてるっていう……
jpnSearchText:
以前は別の規格でしたよね。
今では裏に流れてるっていう……

engChrName: RAMDA. Fifth gen, co-developed by Verne and Epstein.
engSearchText:
RAMDA. Fifth gen, co-developed by Verne
and Epstein.
jpnChrName: 第五世代の一つ、《ＲＡＭＤＡ》だな。 財団とヴェルヌの共同開発だ。
jpnSearchText:
第五世代の一つ、《ＲＡＭＤＡ》だな。
財団とヴェルヌの共同開発だ。

engChrName: What the sixth gen would look like sparked a hell of a lot of conversation both before and after the war.
engSearchText:
What the sixth gen would look like sparked a hell of a
lot of conversation both before and after the war.
jpnChrName: 次の第六世代はどうなるかって 大戦前後から話題に上ってたそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
次の第六世代はどうなるかって
大戦前後から話題に上ってたそうだが……

engChrName: Then they went and pulled what even the Empire's Reinford Company didn't dare do: cut the foundation out of the equation.
engSearchText:
Then they went and pulled what even the Empire's
Reinford Company didn't dare do: cut the foundation
out of the equation.
jpnChrName: 蓋を開けてみりゃ、まさか帝国のＲＦでも やらなかった“財団外し”をやらかすとはな。
jpnSearchText:
蓋を開けてみりゃ、まさか帝国のＲＦでも
やらなかった“財団外し”をやらかすとはな。

engChrName: It caused some pushback across the continent at first, but now their technology is well on the road to being available to the public.
engSearchText:
It caused some pushback across the continent at first,
but now their technology is well on the road to being
available to the public.
jpnChrName: 各国の反発もあったようですが 今や民生化にすら漕ぎ着けつつあります。
jpnSearchText:
各国の反発もあったようですが
今や民生化にすら漕ぎ着けつつあります。

engChrName: And they'll do anything to keep themselves in their current favorable position, I would imagine—even use Marduk for practical testing.
engSearchText:
And they'll do anything to keep themselves in their
current favorable position, I would imagine—even use
Marduk for practical testing.
jpnChrName: 弊社を起用しての運用テストも含めて、 底知れぬものを感じますね。
jpnSearchText:
弊社を起用しての運用テストも含めて、
底知れぬものを感じますね。

engChrName: Though perhaps it isn't my place to weigh in on the matter.
engSearchText:
Though perhaps it isn't my place to weigh in on
the matter.
jpnChrName: わたくしが言うのもどうかと思いますが。
jpnSearchText: わたくしが言うのもどうかと思いますが。

engChrName: You got that right.
engSearchText: You got that right.
jpnChrName: マジでそれな。
jpnSearchText: マジでそれな。

engChrName: (And the one pushing that as national policy is...)
engSearchText: (And the one pushing that as national policy is...)
jpnChrName: （そしてそれを“国策”として   押し進めているのが……）
jpnSearchText:
（そしてそれを“国策”として
押し進めているのが……）

engChrName: So ZCF was the one that developed airships, right?
engSearchText: So ZCF was the one that developed airships, right?
jpnChrName: それで、ＺＣＦの方は 飛行船を発明した所でしたっけ？
jpnSearchText:
それで、ＺＣＦの方は
飛行船を発明した所でしたっけ？

engChrName: Yes. They're a facility located in Zeiss in Liberl.
engSearchText: Yes. They're a facility located in Zeiss in Liberl.
jpnChrName: ええ、リベール王国の ツァイス市にあるメーカーですね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、リベール王国の
ツァイス市にあるメーカーですね。

engChrName: You can find their products all across the Republic— things like communications equipment or household goods.
engSearchText:
You can find their products all across the Republic—
things like communications equipment or
household goods.
jpnChrName: ふふ、通信機器や民生品などで 共和国でも結構見かける名前ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、通信機器や民生品などで
共和国でも結構見かける名前ですね。

engChrName: Being a friendly nation, they do have a cooperative enough partnership with Verne, I suppose.
engSearchText:
Being a friendly nation, they do have a cooperative
enough partnership with Verne, I suppose.
jpnChrName: ま、友好国としてヴェルヌとも “一応”提携関係にあるからね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、友好国としてヴェルヌとも
“一応”提携関係にあるからね。

engChrName: Oh! Hello there.
engSearchText: Oh! Hello there.
jpnChrName: 先輩、オデットたちも。
jpnSearchText: 先輩、オデットたちも。

engChrName: Hiya, Van and friends!
engSearchText: Hiya, Van and friends!
jpnChrName: こんにちはー、ヴァンさんたち！
jpnSearchText: こんにちはー、ヴァンさんたち！

engChrName: And look at you go, Agnès. Hard at work, I see.
engSearchText: And look at you go, Agnès. Hard at work, I see.
jpnChrName: アニエスもやってるみたいだねー。 感心、感心。
jpnSearchText:
アニエスもやってるみたいだねー。
感心、感心。

engChrName: ...Hmph.
engSearchText: ...Hmph.
jpnSearchText: ………フン。

engChrName: We heard what you were doing earlier.
engSearchText: We heard what you were doing earlier.
jpnChrName: ああ、話は聞きましたが。
jpnSearchText: ああ、話は聞きましたが。

engChrName: You're researching with your coworkers as part of your visitation, yeah?
engSearchText:
You're researching with your coworkers as part of
your visitation, yeah?
jpnChrName: 研修の一環で、バイト先の 人たちと調べ物をしてるんだっけ？
jpnSearchText:
研修の一環で、バイト先の
人たちと調べ物をしてるんだっけ？

engChrName: I am. I hope you don't mind me going off on my own.
engSearchText:
I am. I hope you don't mind me going off on
my own.
jpnChrName: はい、一人だけすみません。
jpnSearchText: はい、一人だけすみません。

engChrName: Well, she's puttin' the work in. You guys have business here?
engSearchText:
Well, she's puttin' the work in. You guys have
business here?
jpnChrName: ま、ボチボチやらせてもらってるぜ。 ──そっちはこのビルに用か？
jpnSearchText:
ま、ボチボチやらせてもらってるぜ。
──そっちはこのビルに用か？

engChrName: We do. I have personal connections with ZCF and the foundation, you see.
engSearchText:
We do. I have personal connections with ZCF and
the foundation, you see.
jpnChrName: ええ、ＺＣＦにも財団にも 個人的なツテがあるから。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ＺＣＦにも財団にも
個人的なツテがあるから。

engChrName: So I thought this would be the perfect place to get a firsthand look at international technological exchange.
engSearchText:
So I thought this would be the perfect place to get a
firsthand look at international
technological exchange.
jpnChrName: “国際技術交流”の現場を見るのに 打ってつけの場所でしょう？
jpnSearchText:
“国際技術交流”の現場を見るのに
打ってつけの場所でしょう？

engChrName: What she said. As someone from the Empire, it's a topic I personally can't get enough of.
engSearchText:
What she said. As someone from the Empire, it's a
topic I personally can't get enough of.
jpnChrName: ええ──帝国人としても とても興味深い分野です。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──帝国人としても
とても興味深い分野です。

engChrName: And I heard they make memory quartz for films and stuff! How could I not wanna come?!
engSearchText:
And I heard they make memory quartz for films
and stuff! How could I not wanna come?!
jpnChrName: 映画に使われる記憶結晶（メモリークオーツ）とかも 作ってるって聞いちゃ、来ないわけには！
jpnSearchText:
映画に使われる記憶結晶（メモリークオーツ）とかも
作ってるって聞いちゃ、来ないわけには！

engChrName: How nice. I'm sure there will be an endless amount of information to absorb there.
engSearchText:
How nice. I'm sure there will be an endless amount of
information to absorb there.
jpnChrName: なるほど…… 本格的な話が聞けそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……
本格的な話が聞けそうですね。

engChrName: Just leave this part to us. We'll be sure to write up a report for you.
engSearchText:
Just leave this part to us. We'll be sure to write up a
report for you.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、こちらは任せてくれ。 君の分までレポートはまとめておくさ。
jpnSearchText:
……まあ、こちらは任せてくれ。
君の分までレポートはまとめておくさ。

engChrName: But you better nab us some sweet scoops in exchange!
engSearchText: But you better nab us some sweet scoops in exchange!
jpnChrName: その代わりそっちで面白いネタが あったらよろしくね！
jpnSearchText:
その代わりそっちで面白いネタが
あったらよろしくね！

engChrName: Hmm?
engSearchText: Hmm?
jpnChrName: ふむ……？
jpnSearchText: ふむ……？

engChrName: What are students doing here? ...Of course—the educational visitation.
engSearchText:
What are students doing here? ...Of course—the
educational visitation.
jpnChrName: 制服──ああ、 例の研修とやらだったか。
jpnSearchText:
制服──ああ、
例の研修とやらだったか。

engChrName: W-We didn't mean to crowd up the path.
engSearchText: W-We didn't mean to crowd up the path.
jpnChrName: す、すみません、 こんな所で話し込んでて。
jpnSearchText:
す、すみません、
こんな所で話し込んでて。

engChrName: Waaait. I've seen him before...
engSearchText: Waaait. I've seen him before...
jpnChrName: あれっ、どこかで見たような……
jpnSearchText: あれっ、どこかで見たような……

engChrName: (I think I recognize him, too.)
engSearchText: (I think I recognize him, too.)
jpnChrName: （この御仁は確か……）
jpnSearchText: （この御仁は確か……）

engChrName: (I'm sure you do. He is rather famous.)
engSearchText: (I'm sure you do. He is rather famous.)
jpnChrName: （……ええ、かの有名な。）
jpnSearchText: （……ええ、かの有名な。）

engChrName: Greetings, Professor.
engSearchText: Greetings, Professor.
jpnChrName: ──ごきげんよう、教授。
jpnSearchText: ──ごきげんよう、教授。

engChrName: My name is Renne Bright. I've heard all about you from a certain other professor.
engSearchText:
My name is Renne Bright. I've heard all about you
from a certain other professor.
jpnChrName: レン・ブライトといいます。 “博士”からお噂はかねがね。
jpnSearchText:
レン・ブライトといいます。
“博士”からお噂はかねがね。

engChrName: Ahh. I didn't realize you were studying abroad here.
engSearchText: Ahh. I didn't realize you were studying abroad here.
jpnChrName: ああ、君が…… 共和国に留学していたのだったか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、君が……
共和国に留学していたのだったか。

engChrName: Cronkite. I believe this is our first time meeting in person.
engSearchText:
Cronkite. I believe this is our first time meeting
in person.
jpnChrName: クロンカイトだ、対面は初めてだな。
jpnSearchText: クロンカイトだ、対面は初めてだな。

engChrName: I found your papers fascinating, I must say. Welcome to Basel.
engSearchText:
I found your papers fascinating, I must say.
Welcome to Basel.
jpnChrName: ──ようこそ、バーゼルへ。 君の論文は興味深く読ませてもらった。
jpnSearchText:
──ようこそ、バーゼルへ。
君の論文は興味深く読ませてもらった。

engChrName: Huh...
engSearchText: Huh...
jpnChrName: へっ……
jpnSearchText: へっ……

engChrName: (Papers?)
engSearchText: (Papers?)

engChrName: Heehee. It's an honor to have my work read by such a brilliant mind.
engSearchText:
Heehee. It's an honor to have my work read by such a
brilliant mind.
jpnChrName: クスクス…… 名高き天才に読んで貰えて光栄です。
jpnSearchText:
クスクス……
名高き天才に読んで貰えて光栄です。

engChrName: Might I trouble you for some time to chat in the near future?
engSearchText:
Might I trouble you for some time to chat in the
near future?
jpnChrName: そのうちお話をさせていただけますか？
jpnSearchText: そのうちお話をさせていただけますか？

engChrName: I would welcome the chance—though I'll have to pass on speaking at length with your classmates.
engSearchText:
I would welcome the chance—though I'll have to pass
on speaking at length with your classmates.
jpnChrName: 君相手ならいつでも歓迎だ。 それ以外は面倒だから遠慮したいがね。
jpnSearchText:
君相手ならいつでも歓迎だ。
それ以外は面倒だから遠慮したいがね。

engChrName: Now, I am a busy man, I'm afraid, so if you don't mind, I will bid you farewell.
engSearchText:
Now, I am a busy man, I'm afraid, so if you don't
mind, I will bid you farewell.
jpnChrName: それでは、忙しいので失礼する。
jpnSearchText: それでは、忙しいので失礼する。

engChrName: Well, that stick couldn't be farther up his ass, but he's got the chops to back it up.
engSearchText:
Well, that stick couldn't be farther up his ass, but he's
got the chops to back it up.
jpnChrName: ……偉そうっつーか、タダ者じゃねぇ 雰囲気のオッサンだったな。
jpnSearchText:
……偉そうっつーか、タダ者じゃねぇ
雰囲気のオッサンだったな。

engChrName: Yeah... His background is Eastern, right?
engSearchText: Yeah... His background is Eastern, right?
jpnChrName: はい…… どうやら東方系の方みたいですが。
jpnSearchText:
はい……
どうやら東方系の方みたいですが。

engChrName: That was Professor Yang Cronkite—the young genius carrying the Republic's engineering community on his shoulders.
engSearchText:
That was Professor Yang Cronkite—the young
genius carrying the Republic's engineering
community on his shoulders.
jpnChrName: ヤン・クロンカイト教授── 共和国の技術界を担う若き天才ね。
jpnSearchText:
ヤン・クロンカイト教授──
共和国の技術界を担う若き天才ね。

engChrName: He's been presenting groundbreaking tech across all kinds of fields since before the war two years ago.
engSearchText:
He's been presenting groundbreaking tech across all
kinds of fields since before the war two years ago.
jpnChrName: ２年前の大戦以前から数々の分野で 画期的な技術を発表しているわ。
jpnSearchText:
２年前の大戦以前から数々の分野で
画期的な技術を発表しているわ。

engChrName: Oh! Now that you mention it, I think I saw him in the Tyrell Times.
engSearchText:
Oh! Now that you mention it, I think I saw him in
the Tyrell Times.
jpnChrName: あ、そういえば前に タイレル通信で見たような……！
jpnSearchText:
あ、そういえば前に
タイレル通信で見たような……！

engChrName: He's said to be a genius the likes of which we haven't seen since Professor Hamilton.
engSearchText:
He's said to be a genius the likes of which we
haven't seen since Professor Hamilton.
jpnChrName: それこそハミルトン博士以来の 才能って言われているそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
それこそハミルトン博士以来の
才能って言われているそうですね。

engChrName: But how are you connected to someone like him, Re—
engSearchText:
But how are you connected to someone like him,
Re—
jpnChrName: でも先輩、どうしてそんな人と──
jpnSearchText: でも先輩、どうしてそんな人と──

engChrName: I believe the others are waiting, so how about we go?
engSearchText: I believe the others are waiting, so how about we go?
jpnChrName: さて、先方も待たせているし、 そろそろ入りましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
さて、先方も待たせているし、
そろそろ入りましょうか。

engChrName: Don't be late for the meetup, Agnès—otherwise I'll have to give you a good spanking. ♪
engSearchText:
Don't be late for the meetup, Agnès—otherwise I'll
have to give you a good spanking. ♪
jpnChrName: アニエス、集合時間は忘れずにね。 守らなかったらお尻ペンペンだから♪
jpnSearchText:
アニエス、集合時間は忘れずにね。
守らなかったらお尻ペンペンだから♪

engChrName: Heehee. I know, I know. Have fun leading everyone!
engSearchText: Heehee. I know, I know. Have fun leading everyone!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、はい。 みんなの引率、お願いしますね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、はい。
みんなの引率、お願いしますね。

engChrName: H-Hold on, Renne! Don't think you can get away with not answering!
engSearchText:
H-Hold on, Renne! Don't think you can get away
with not answering!
jpnChrName: ちょ、ちょっと先輩っ？ 露骨に誤魔化さないでくださいよ……！
jpnSearchText:
ちょ、ちょっと先輩っ？
露骨に誤魔化さないでくださいよ……！

engChrName: Ahaha! Well, then, good luck with work!
engSearchText: Ahaha! Well, then, good luck with work!
jpnChrName: あはは、それじゃあ。 そっちもお仕事頑張ってね！
jpnSearchText:
あはは、それじゃあ。
そっちもお仕事頑張ってね！

engChrName: Shall we?
engSearchText: Shall we?
jpnChrName: さて、そろそろ行くか？
jpnSearchText: さて、そろそろ行くか？

engChrName: Yes! Let's give this our all!
engSearchText: Yes! Let's give this our all!
jpnChrName: ……はい、頑張らないと……！
jpnSearchText: ……はい、頑張らないと……！

engChrName: I'd say we've seen everything there is to see in New Town. That said...
engSearchText:
I'd say we've seen everything there is to see in
New Town. That said...
jpnChrName: 新市街もある程度は回れたな。 だが……
jpnSearchText:
新市街もある程度は回れたな。
だが……

engChrName: Looks like we'll have to go to the institute for that request from the assistant.
engSearchText:
Looks like we'll have to go to the institute for that
request from the assistant.
jpnChrName: はい……“助手さん”からの依頼は やっぱり大学に行く必要がありそうです。
jpnSearchText:
はい……“助手さん”からの依頼は
やっぱり大学に行く必要がありそうです。

engChrName: The one about that professor abusing his power, eh? Doesn't seem like something outsiders like us should get in the middle of.
engSearchText:
The one about that professor abusing his power, eh?
Doesn't seem like something outsiders like us should
get in the middle of.
jpnChrName: 例のパワハラ教授ってヤツか。 外野が割り込む問題じゃねぇ気もするが。
jpnSearchText:
例のパワハラ教授ってヤツか。
外野が割り込む問題じゃねぇ気もするが。

engChrName: But I'm concerned since it was posted as a 4SPG.
engSearchText: But I'm concerned since it was posted as a 4SPG.
jpnChrName: でも、４ｓｐｇに頼っている以上、 心配ですし気になる状況ですよね……
jpnSearchText:
でも、４ｓｐｇに頼っている以上、
心配ですし気になる状況ですよね……

engChrName: I wonder if we can find a way for all of us to get into the institute...
engSearchText:
I wonder if we can find a way for all of us to get into
the institute...
jpnChrName: ……なんとか全員で理科大学に 入る方法があればいいんですけど。
jpnSearchText:
……なんとか全員で理科大学に
入る方法があればいいんですけど。

engChrName: Like with the aerotram, access requires Rank C certification or higher.
engSearchText:
Like with the aerotram, access requires Rank C
certification or higher.
jpnChrName: エアロトラムと同じく、 ランクＣ以上のセキュリティでしたか。
jpnSearchText:
エアロトラムと同じく、
ランクＣ以上のセキュリティでしたか。

engChrName: Hmm... It'd be nice if we could have Elsaim put on the pressure and get our ranks raised, but that won't work here. Not enough time.
engSearchText:
Hmm... It'd be nice if we could have Elsaim put on
the pressure and get our ranks raised, but that won't
work here. Not enough time.
jpnChrName: ふむ、エルザイムから圧力をかけて ランクを上げさせるのも手だが……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、エルザイムから圧力をかけて
ランクを上げさせるのも手だが……

engChrName: So how about we go have a little talk?
engSearchText: So how about we go have a little talk?
jpnChrName: 時間が掛かるし、こうなったら “相談”に乗ってもらうとするか。
jpnSearchText:
時間が掛かるし、こうなったら
“相談”に乗ってもらうとするか。

engChrName: With who?
engSearchText: With who?
jpnChrName: 相談……？
jpnSearchText: 相談……？

engChrName: Ah. The kiddo from earlier?
engSearchText: Ah. The kiddo from earlier?
jpnChrName: ああ、さっきの小僧のことかよ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、さっきの小僧のことかよ。

engChrName: He wasn't as bad about it as the CEO, but he still had his doubts about us.
engSearchText:
He wasn't as bad about it as the CEO, but he still had
his doubts about us.
jpnChrName: ＣＥＯほどじゃねえが俺たちに そこそこ懐疑的じゃなかったか？
jpnSearchText:
ＣＥＯほどじゃねえが俺たちに
そこそこ懐疑的じゃなかったか？

engChrName: Well, if pushing doesn't work, we just gotta pull.
engSearchText: Well, if pushing doesn't work, we just gotta pull.
jpnChrName: そこはそれ、 押して駄目なら引いてってな。
jpnSearchText:
そこはそれ、
押して駄目なら引いてってな。

engChrName: So thanks for bein' our go-between, Agnès.
engSearchText: So thanks for bein' our go-between, Agnès.
jpnChrName: ──つーわけでアニエス、 頃合いを見てよろしく頼んだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
──つーわけでアニエス、
頃合いを見てよろしく頼んだぜ。

engChrName: Er... For what? Between you and Quatre?
engSearchText: Er... For what? Between you and Quatre?
jpnChrName: え……私ですか？ えっと、カトル君に連絡を？
jpnSearchText:
え……私ですか？
えっと、カトル君に連絡を？

engChrName: You got it. You guys seemed to hit it off—guessin' it's 'cause you're so close in age.
engSearchText:
You got it. You guys seemed to hit it off—guessin' it's
'cause you're so close in age.
jpnChrName: ああ、同年代だからか 割と馴染んだみたいじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、同年代だからか
割と馴染んだみたいじゃねえか？

engChrName: He'll be up for talkin' to you. Just make it seem like you've got problems and he can solve 'em.
engSearchText:
He'll be up for talkin' to you. Just make it seem like
you've got problems and he can solve 'em.
jpnChrName: 相談窓口ってのは確かだし 困った素振りで話してみるだけでいい。
jpnSearchText:
相談窓口ってのは確かだし
困った素振りで話してみるだけでいい。

engChrName: Oh, I don't think I'll need to go that far. I'm sure if I'm just honest and upfront with him, he'll listen.
engSearchText:
Oh, I don't think I'll need to go that far. I'm sure if
I'm just honest and upfront with him, he'll listen.
jpnChrName: うーん、普通に相談すれば ちゃんと聞いてくれそうですけど。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、普通に相談すれば
ちゃんと聞いてくれそうですけど。

engChrName: But I am happy to help. Once things settle down, I'll give him a call on my Xipha.
engSearchText:
But I am happy to help. Once things settle down, I'll
give him a call on my Xipha.
jpnChrName: 分かりました、一段落したら ザイファで連絡してみますね。
jpnSearchText:
分かりました、一段落したら
ザイファで連絡してみますね。

engChrName: (Ha. Girl doesn't have a clue, huh?)
engSearchText: (Ha. Girl doesn't have a clue, huh?)
jpnChrName: （ハッ、小娘も小娘で   そっち方面は無頓着らしいな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ハッ、小娘も小娘で
そっち方面は無頓着らしいな。）

engChrName: (Heehee. It is quite charming how unaware she is of her appeal.)
engSearchText:
(Heehee. It is quite charming how unaware she is of
her appeal.)
jpnChrName: （ふふ、ご自分の魅力に余り気付いて   いらっしゃらないみたいですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふ、ご自分の魅力に余り気付いて
いらっしゃらないみたいですね。）

engChrName: (I don't really get what you're saying, but I know we can count on Agnès to handle this!)
engSearchText:
(I don't really get what you're saying, but I know we
can count on Agnès to handle this!)
jpnChrName: （よくわかりませんが……   アニエスさんが頼めば問題ないかと！）
jpnSearchText:
（よくわかりませんが……
アニエスさんが頼めば問題ないかと！）

engChrName: To advance the main story, select 'Contact Quatre' from the Travel menu.
engSearchText:
To advance the main story, select 'Contact Quatre'
from the Travel menu.
jpnChrName: メインストーリーを進める場合、移動メニューから 『カトルに連絡する』を選択してください。
jpnSearchText:
メインストーリーを進める場合、移動メニューから
『カトルに連絡する』を選択してください。

engChrName: Mmgh... I can't eat another bite of engadin...
engSearchText: Mmgh... I can't eat another bite of engadin...
jpnChrName: むにゃむにゃ……エンガディーナ…… ……もう食べられな～い……
jpnSearchText:
むにゃむにゃ……エンガディーナ……
……もう食べられな～い……

engChrName: Heehee. Looks like you guys did the rounds.
engSearchText: Heehee. Looks like you guys did the rounds.
jpnChrName: ふふっ…… そちらも色々回ったみたいですね？
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ……
そちらも色々回ったみたいですね？

engChrName: We sure did—though we may have overdid it a tad for it being our first day.
engSearchText:
We sure did—though we may have overdid it a tad
for it being our first day.
jpnChrName: ええ、初日から張り切って 回りすぎた気はするけど。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、初日から張り切って
回りすぎた気はするけど。

engChrName: But now I have a better idea of just what is happening in this city.
engSearchText:
But now I have a better idea of just what is happening
in this city.
jpnChrName: おかげで少しは見えてきたわ。 ──この街の“異常”についても。
jpnSearchText:
おかげで少しは見えてきたわ。
──この街の“異常”についても。

engChrName: You do...?
engSearchText: You do...?

engChrName: Does parallel-distributed computing really consume that much orbal energy?
engSearchText:
Does parallel-distributed computing really consume
that much orbal energy?
jpnChrName: ……“並列分散処理”というのは そこまでの導力を消費するものなんですか？
jpnSearchText:
……“並列分散処理”というのは
そこまでの導力を消費するものなんですか？

engChrName: It's when you borrow the processing power of multiple computers through the net to do greater calculations, right?
engSearchText:
It's when you borrow the processing power of
multiple computers through the net to do greater
calculations, right?
jpnChrName: ネットを通じて他の端末の性能を借りることで、 通常以上の計算を可能にする──でしたか。
jpnSearchText:
ネットを通じて他の端末の性能を借りることで、
通常以上の計算を可能にする──でしたか。

engChrName: I'm impressed you know about such cutting-edge tech.
engSearchText:
I'm impressed you know about such
cutting-edge tech.
jpnChrName: うふふ、最先端技術なのに よく勉強しているわね。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、最先端技術なのに
よく勉強しているわね。

engChrName: Now, connecting a few terminals isn't going to consume much energy at all.
engSearchText:
Now, connecting a few terminals isn't going to
consume much energy at all.
jpnChrName: もちろん、数台程度接続したくらいじゃ 大した負荷にはならないわ。
jpnSearchText:
もちろん、数台程度接続したくらいじゃ
大した負荷にはならないわ。

engChrName: But what do you think would happen if one were to connect all the terminals in the city?
engSearchText:
But what do you think would happen if one were to
connect all the terminals in the city?
jpnChrName: でも──都市中にある導力端末、 全てを利用したとしたらどうかしら？
jpnSearchText:
でも──都市中にある導力端末、
全てを利用したとしたらどうかしら？

engChrName: Then do you think hacking is behind this?
engSearchText: Then do you think hacking is behind this?
jpnChrName: ……ハッキング、ですか……！？
jpnSearchText: ……ハッキング、ですか……！？

engChrName: The flow of the orbal distribution network looks to me like it's being manipulated.
engSearchText:
The flow of the orbal distribution network looks to
me like it's being manipulated.
jpnChrName: たぶん、導力供給網の フローも含めて制御しているわね。
jpnSearchText:
たぶん、導力供給網の
フローも含めて制御しているわね。

engChrName: If you intentionally adjust its flow on an erratic schedule, you can make it seem like issues are occurring at random.
engSearchText:
If you intentionally adjust its flow on an erratic
schedule, you can make it seem like issues are
occurring at random.
jpnChrName: 意図的に、ランダムに制御することで 偶然起きたトラブルに見せかけている。
jpnSearchText:
意図的に、ランダムに制御することで
偶然起きたトラブルに見せかけている。

engChrName: You might even call doing just that my specialty— though I find this here to be a distastefully crafty way of going about it.
engSearchText:
You might even call doing just that my specialty—
though I find this here to be a distastefully crafty way
of going about it.
jpnChrName: 私の得意分野ではあるけど── なかなか狡猾でイヤらしいやり口だわ。
jpnSearchText:
私の得意分野ではあるけど──
なかなか狡猾でイヤらしいやり口だわ。

engChrName: It was around the most recent occupation of Crossbell.
engSearchText:
It was around the most recent occupation
of Crossbell.
jpnChrName: あの“クロスベル再事変”の前後──
jpnSearchText: あの“クロスベル再事変”の前後──

engChrName: There were miracles and calamities born from large-scale distributed processing that should have been impossible with our current tech.
engSearchText:
There were miracles and calamities born from
large-scale distributed processing that should have
been impossible with our current tech.
jpnChrName: 現代技術ではあり得ない、超大規模の 分散処理から始まった“奇蹟”と“災厄”。
jpnSearchText:
現代技術ではあり得ない、超大規模の
分散処理から始まった“奇蹟”と“災厄”。

engChrName: So impossible that I never thought the same could happen here in the Republic, even if this is on a smaller scale.
engSearchText:
So impossible that I never thought the same could
happen here in the Republic, even if this is on a
smaller scale.
jpnChrName: まさか共和国でも小規模とはいえ、 似たようなことが起きているなんてね。
jpnSearchText:
まさか共和国でも小規模とはいえ、
似たようなことが起きているなんてね。

engChrName: ...What?
engSearchText: ...What?
jpnChrName: っ……こ、これって……！！
jpnSearchText: っ……こ、これって……！！

engChrName: Just what is going on here?!
engSearchText: Just what is going on here?!
jpnChrName: ええい、一体どうなっている！？
jpnSearchText: ええい、一体どうなっている！？

engChrName: Professor Callaghan has gone missing, and you're here with some evidence that he's been abusing his power?!
engSearchText:
Professor Callaghan has gone missing, and you're
here with some evidence that he's been abusing
his power?!
jpnChrName: キャラハン教授が行方不明── パワハラの証拠も挙がっているだと！？
jpnSearchText:
キャラハン教授が行方不明──
パワハラの証拠も挙がっているだと！？

engChrName: Even the police and guild have barged into the institute wanting to question me!
engSearchText:
Even the police and guild have barged into the
institute wanting to question me!
jpnChrName: 警察とギルドにも理科大学に踏み込まれ、 私まで事情聴取を受けるハメになったのだぞ！
jpnSearchText:
警察とギルドにも理科大学に踏み込まれ、
私まで事情聴取を受けるハメになったのだぞ！

engChrName: You people have been here for a day. A DAY! Are you some sort of plague being brought down upon us?!
engSearchText:
You people have been here for a day. A DAY!
Are you some sort of plague being brought down
upon us?!
jpnChrName: 君たちが来て一日でこれだ……！ 一体どんな疫病神だね、ええ！？
jpnSearchText:
君たちが来て一日でこれだ……！
一体どんな疫病神だね、ええ！？

engChrName: ...It's not their fault.
engSearchText: ...It's not their fault.
jpnChrName: ……彼らのせいじゃありません。
jpnSearchText: ……彼らのせいじゃありません。

engChrName: This is Professor Callaghan's problem—no, it's all of our problem.
engSearchText:
This is Professor Callaghan's problem—no, it's all
of our problem.
jpnChrName: 全てはキャラハン教授の── いや、僕たち全員の問題なんでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
全てはキャラハン教授の──
いや、僕たち全員の問題なんでしょう。

engChrName: Quatre...
engSearchText: Quatre...
jpnChrName: カトル君……
jpnSearchText: カトル君……

engChrName: Don't act like you didn't know about assistants being harassed left and right.
engSearchText:
Don't act like you didn't know about assistants being
harassed left and right.
jpnChrName: ま、パワハラなんかは 把握してなかったワケねぇよな？
jpnSearchText:
ま、パワハラなんかは
把握してなかったワケねぇよな？

engChrName: Ugh... Just what did you want me to do about it in my position?
engSearchText:
Ugh... Just what did you want me to do about it in
my position?
jpnChrName: ぐっ……し、仕方ないだろう！？
jpnSearchText: ぐっ……し、仕方ないだろう！？

engChrName: It's not my place to say anything about his research!
engSearchText: It's not my place to say anything about his research!
jpnChrName: 私とて彼の研究そのものに とやかく言える立場では……！
jpnSearchText:
私とて彼の研究そのものに
とやかく言える立場では……！

engChrName: I'm sure that is one of the difficult things about being a joint venture group funded by multiple investors.
engSearchText:
I'm sure that is one of the difficult things about being
a joint venture group funded by multiple investors.
jpnChrName: ヴェルヌのような複数資本で成り立つ “合弁グループ”の難しい所ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ヴェルヌのような複数資本で成り立つ
“合弁グループ”の難しい所ですね。

engChrName: But I also imagine the benefits outweigh the difficulties.
engSearchText:
But I also imagine the benefits outweigh
the difficulties.
jpnChrName: それがメリットであるとも思いますが。
jpnSearchText: それがメリットであるとも思いますが。

engChrName: Anyone could see that the professor was on a rampage.
engSearchText:
Anyone could see that the professor was on
a rampage.
jpnChrName: ──あの先生が“暴走”しちまってたのは 誰から見ても明らかだろう。
jpnSearchText:
──あの先生が“暴走”しちまってたのは
誰から見ても明らかだろう。

engChrName: And the problems with the orbal network and its distribution are just as clear.
engSearchText:
And the problems with the orbal network and its
distribution are just as clear.
jpnChrName: まだ原因の確定してねぇ導力ネットや 導力供給網のトラブルについてもな。
jpnSearchText:
まだ原因の確定してねぇ導力ネットや
導力供給網のトラブルについてもな。

engChrName: Let me just shoot straight with you: was that professor linked to any strange groups?
engSearchText:
Let me just shoot straight with you: was that
professor linked to any strange groups?
jpnChrName: 単刀直入に聞くが、あの先生、 妙な連中と繋がってたりしなかったか？
jpnSearchText:
単刀直入に聞くが、あの先生、
妙な連中と繋がってたりしなかったか？

engChrName: You know, like the mafia or anything?
engSearchText: You know, like the mafia or anything?
jpnChrName: 例えば裏社会──マフィア絡みとか。
jpnSearchText: 例えば裏社会──マフィア絡みとか。

engChrName: Hmm... I'd like to believe that he wasn't, but I can't say for sure.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I'd like to believe that he wasn't, but I can't
say for sure.
jpnChrName: う～ん、流石にそこまではないと 信じたいですけど……
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、流石にそこまではないと
信じたいですけど……

engChrName: It's pretty normal for the Institute of Science and Verne Company to accept outside funding.
engSearchText:
It's pretty normal for the Institute of Science and
Verne Company to accept outside funding.
jpnChrName: ……理科大学とヴェルヌ社の研究は、 外部投資を受け入れるのが伝統なんです。
jpnSearchText:
……理科大学とヴェルヌ社の研究は、
外部投資を受け入れるのが伝統なんです。

engChrName: In other words, the ground is fertile for corruption.
engSearchText: In other words, the ground is fertile for corruption.
jpnChrName: その意味で土壌は整っちまってる、か。
jpnSearchText: その意味で土壌は整っちまってる、か。

engChrName: And I can't write off the possibility with all those new terminals he suddenly had on him.
engSearchText:
And I can't write off the possibility with all those new
terminals he suddenly had on him.
jpnChrName: あんだけの最新端末を揃えた事といい、 ……可能性は否定できねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
あんだけの最新端末を揃えた事といい、
……可能性は否定できねぇな。

engChrName: S-Stop this pointless conjecture! You have no evidence!
engSearchText:
S-Stop this pointless conjecture! You have
no evidence!
jpnChrName: こ、根拠のない憶測はやめたまえ！
jpnSearchText: こ、根拠のない憶測はやめたまえ！

engChrName: If rumors like this were to leak to the public during such a crucial time—
engSearchText:
If rumors like this were to leak to the public during
such a crucial time—
jpnChrName: この大事な時期に外に漏れて 妙な噂でも立ちでもしたら──
jpnSearchText:
この大事な時期に外に漏れて
妙な噂でも立ちでもしたら──

engChrName: How about acting like a leader for once in your damn life?!
engSearchText:
How about acting like a leader for once in
your damn life?!
jpnChrName: ──だったら少しは トップらしい対応をしやがれってんだ！
jpnSearchText:
──だったら少しは
トップらしい対応をしやがれってんだ！

engChrName: These youngsters were hired so the police and the guild wouldn't have to get involved!
engSearchText:
These youngsters were hired so the police and the
guild wouldn't have to get involved!
jpnChrName: 警察やギルドに回さなくても済むように この若造どもが雇われたんだろうが！？
jpnSearchText:
警察やギルドに回さなくても済むように
この若造どもが雇われたんだろうが！？

engChrName: And while we sit here scrambling for answers, who knows what Professor Callaghan is up to?!
engSearchText:
And while we sit here scrambling for answers, who
knows what Professor Callaghan is up to?!
jpnChrName: こうしている間にも キャラハンがどうなってやがるか──
jpnSearchText:
こうしている間にも
キャラハンがどうなってやがるか──

engChrName: Tell me: is there ever going to be a better time than now to step up as CEO, Bill?!
engSearchText:
Tell me: is there ever going to be a better time than
now to step up as CEO, Bill?!
jpnChrName: ここが肚の括りどころじゃねぇのか、 ビル・タウゼント最高経営責任者（ＣＥＯ）！！
jpnSearchText:
ここが肚の括りどころじゃねぇのか、
ビル・タウゼント最高経営責任者（ＣＥＯ）！！

engChrName: Ngh...
engSearchText: Ngh...

engChrName: Supervisor...
engSearchText: Supervisor...

engChrName: ...Fine. I'll tell you everything I know.
engSearchText: ...Fine. I'll tell you everything I know.
jpnChrName: ……分かった。 私が知っていることを話そう。
jpnSearchText:
……分かった。
私が知っていることを話そう。

engChrName: But please, keep this just between us.
engSearchText: But please, keep this just between us.
jpnChrName: くれぐれも他言無用でお願いしたい。
jpnSearchText: くれぐれも他言無用でお願いしたい。

engChrName: Of course. Our team always keeps matters like this confidential.
engSearchText:
Of course. Our team always keeps matters like
this confidential.
jpnChrName: その…… 裏解決屋（私たち）にも守秘義務はあります。
jpnSearchText:
その……
裏解決屋（私たち）にも守秘義務はあります。

engChrName: We're contracted with one of your biggest shareholders, the Principality of Elsaim—we have nothing to gain from hurting your image.
engSearchText:
We're contracted with one of your biggest
shareholders, the Principality of Elsaim—we have
nothing to gain from hurting your image.
jpnChrName: こちらの株主である公国との契約である以上、 その辺りは信用していただけると。
jpnSearchText:
こちらの株主である公国との契約である以上、
その辺りは信用していただけると。

engChrName: And everything to gain from earnin' some brownie points with Verne.
engSearchText:
And everything to gain from earnin' some brownie
points with Verne.
jpnChrName: ま、ヴェルヌに“貸し”を作れるのも こちらとしちゃ損じゃありませんしね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ヴェルヌに“貸し”を作れるのも
こちらとしちゃ損じゃありませんしね。

engChrName: Mgh...
engSearchText: Mgh...
jpnChrName: くっ……
jpnSearchText: くっ……

engChrName: Professor Callaghan first began to change around a year or two ago.
engSearchText:
Professor Callaghan first began to change around a
year or two ago.
jpnChrName: キャラハン教授の様子が変わったのは ここ１、２年ほどだ。
jpnSearchText:
キャラハン教授の様子が変わったのは
ここ１、２年ほどだ。

engChrName: We'd received a request from the Republican Army to develop the next generation of weapons— something he excelled in.
engSearchText:
We'd received a request from the Republican Army
to develop the next generation of weapons—
something he excelled in.
jpnChrName: 共和国軍からの“次世代兵器”刷新の依頼──
jpnSearchText: 共和国軍からの“次世代兵器”刷新の依頼──

engChrName: But when the time came to propose ideas, he lost in his own field. Professor Cronkite's was accepted.
engSearchText:
But when the time came to propose ideas, he lost in
his own field. Professor Cronkite's was accepted.
jpnChrName: 長年、彼が引き受けてきた分野のコンペで クロンカイト教授に敗れた辺りからだろう。
jpnSearchText:
長年、彼が引き受けてきた分野のコンペで
クロンカイト教授に敗れた辺りからだろう。

engChrName: I knew that was it.
engSearchText: I knew that was it.
jpnChrName: ……やっぱり、 そういう事なんですね～。
jpnSearchText:
……やっぱり、
そういう事なんですね～。

engChrName: Ever since, he's been doing research on his own like a man possessed.
engSearchText:
Ever since, he's been doing research on his own like a
man possessed.
jpnChrName: 以来、彼は取り憑かれたように 独自の研究を進め始めた。
jpnSearchText:
以来、彼は取り憑かれたように
独自の研究を進め始めた。

engChrName: I don't know what it is he started researching, but whatever it was, it required an immense amount of capital and manpower.
engSearchText:
I don't know what it is he started researching, but
whatever it was, it required an immense amount of
capital and manpower.
jpnChrName: 内容は知らないが、相当な設備投資と 人的資源（マンパワー）を必要とする何らかの研究……
jpnSearchText:
内容は知らないが、相当な設備投資と
人的資源（マンパワー）を必要とする何らかの研究……

engChrName: There came a point where he started seeking out every sponsor he could.
engSearchText:
There came a point where he started seeking out
every sponsor he could.
jpnChrName: やがて彼は外部スポンサーを 手当たり次第に当たるようになってな。
jpnSearchText:
やがて彼は外部スポンサーを
手当たり次第に当たるようになってな。

engChrName: Then half a year ago, I heard a place called the Anchorville Company offered an unprecedented amount of money.
engSearchText:
Then half a year ago, I heard a place called the
Anchorville Company offered an unprecedented
amount of money.
jpnChrName: そして、半年前に《アンカーヴィル商会》なる所が 破格の投資を申し出たと耳にしている。
jpnSearchText:
そして、半年前に《アンカーヴィル商会》なる所が
破格の投資を申し出たと耳にしている。

engChrName: That name...
engSearchText: That name...
jpnChrName: その名前は……
jpnSearchText: その名前は……

engChrName: So it got caught in your information network, too, eh?
engSearchText:
So it got caught in your information network,
too, eh?
jpnChrName: ……そちらの情報網に 引っかかっていた名前か。
jpnSearchText:
……そちらの情報網に
引っかかっていた名前か。

engChrName: Don't tell me this is the same thing as in Langport.
engSearchText: Don't tell me this is the same thing as in Langport.
jpnChrName: まさか煌都と同じパターンかよ？
jpnSearchText: まさか煌都と同じパターンかよ？

engChrName: Indeed. The Anchorville Company, much like the Messeldam Trading Company...
engSearchText:
Indeed. The Anchorville Company, much like the
Messeldam Trading Company...
jpnChrName: ええ、アンカーヴィル商会──
jpnSearchText: ええ、アンカーヴィル商会──

engChrName: ...is also one of their shell corporations.
engSearchText: ...is also one of their shell corporations.
jpnChrName: あの《メッセルダム商事》と同じく 彼らのダミー会社の一つと目されています。
jpnSearchText:
あの《メッセルダム商事》と同じく
彼らのダミー会社の一つと目されています。

engChrName: Who are we talking about?
engSearchText: Who are we talking about?
jpnChrName: 彼ら……？
jpnSearchText: 彼ら……？

engChrName: ...A certain mafia.
engSearchText: ...A certain mafia.
jpnChrName: ……とあるマフィアのことです。
jpnSearchText: ……とあるマフィアのことです。

engChrName: They're called Almata, and they're on both the guild and the police's radars.
engSearchText:
They're called Almata, and they're on both the guild
and the police's radars.
jpnChrName: 《アルマータ》── ギルドや警察が最もマークしている。
jpnSearchText:
《アルマータ》──
ギルドや警察が最もマークしている。

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!

engChrName: P-Professor Callaghan was involved with people like that...?
engSearchText:
P-Professor Callaghan was involved with people like
that...?
jpnChrName: そ、そんなのとキャラハン教授が～……？
jpnSearchText: そ、そんなのとキャラハン教授が～……？

engChrName: I've heard the rumors. Been expanding their territory an awful lot of late.
engSearchText:
I've heard the rumors. Been expanding their territory
an awful lot of late.
jpnChrName: ……噂くらいは聞いたことあるな。 近頃縄張りを広げてるみてぇだが……
jpnSearchText:
……噂くらいは聞いたことあるな。
近頃縄張りを広げてるみてぇだが……

engChrName: Just how the hell could you have overlooked something like this?!
engSearchText:
Just how the hell could you have overlooked
something like this?!
jpnChrName: チッ、よりにもよって そんなのを見過ごしてたってのか！？
jpnSearchText:
チッ、よりにもよって
そんなのを見過ごしてたってのか！？

engChrName: I-It's not my fault! I only got the info the other day!
engSearchText: I-It's not my fault! I only got the info the other day!
jpnChrName: わ、私のせいじゃないぞ！？ 情報が回ってきたのもつい先日だ！
jpnSearchText:
わ、私のせいじゃないぞ！？
情報が回ってきたのもつい先日だ！

engChrName: A-And what else could I do? Do you know what could happen to me if I put a pause on research for the mafia?
engSearchText:
A-And what else could I do? Do you know what
could happen to me if I put a pause on research for
the mafia?
jpnChrName: そ、それにマフィア絡みの研究など 止めたりしたら何をされていたか……！
jpnSearchText:
そ、それにマフィア絡みの研究など
止めたりしたら何をされていたか……！

engChrName: Think about the poor assistants who ended up helping them without even realizing it!
engSearchText:
Think about the poor assistants who ended up
helping them without even realizing it!
jpnChrName: 知らずに手伝わされてる 助手どもを第一に考えろっつうんだ！
jpnSearchText:
知らずに手伝わされてる
助手どもを第一に考えろっつうんだ！

engChrName: So after losing against the genius professor, he started focusing entirely on his own research...
engSearchText:
So after losing against the genius professor, he started
focusing entirely on his own research...
jpnChrName: あの天才教授に負けちまって、 血眼になりながら進めている研究……
jpnSearchText:
あの天才教授に負けちまって、
血眼になりながら進めている研究……

engChrName: My bet's that he's stickin' to his same field of expertise.
engSearchText:
My bet's that he's stickin' to his same field
of expertise.
jpnChrName: “同じ分野”の可能性は高いかもな。
jpnSearchText: “同じ分野”の可能性は高いかもな。

engChrName: And if the mafia has invested massive funds into his work...
engSearchText:
And if the mafia has invested massive funds into
his work...
jpnChrName: ……そして、そこにマフィアが 莫大な投資をしている状況ですか……
jpnSearchText:
……そして、そこにマフィアが
莫大な投資をしている状況ですか……

engChrName: I have a bad feeling about this. A really bad feeling.
engSearchText: I have a bad feeling about this. A really bad feeling.
jpnChrName: イヤな予感がします…… ……それも途方もなく………
jpnSearchText:
イヤな予感がします……
……それも途方もなく………

engChrName: The network delay that dropped down to .35% has gotten worse again as of this morning, too.
engSearchText:
The network delay that dropped down to .35% has
gotten worse again as of this morning, too.
jpnChrName: ……0.35%まで抑えた導力供給網の異常も 今朝になってまた悪化してきています。
jpnSearchText:
……0.35%まで抑えた導力供給網の異常も
今朝になってまた悪化してきています。

engChrName: That makes it highly possible that he's continuing his research in another location.
engSearchText:
That makes it highly possible that he's continuing his
research in another location.
jpnChrName: あの研究室とは別に、今も別の場所で 研究が続いている可能性は高いかしれません。
jpnSearchText:
あの研究室とは別に、今も別の場所で
研究が続いている可能性は高いかしれません。

engChrName: But just where on earth could that be?
engSearchText: But just where on earth could that be?
jpnChrName: ！　だとしたらキャラハン教授は そちらの方に～？
jpnSearchText:
！　だとしたらキャラハン教授は
そちらの方に～？

engChrName: Sounds like we got a good old-fashioned manhunt on our hands.
engSearchText:
Sounds like we got a good old-fashioned manhunt on
our hands.
jpnChrName: ならとっとと見つけ出さねぇとな。
jpnSearchText: ならとっとと見つけ出さねぇとな。

engChrName: We're gonna be combin' through this place way more than what we did yesterday. I take it there are no objections?
engSearchText:
We're gonna be combin' through this place way more
than what we did yesterday. I take it there are
no objections?
jpnChrName: 昨日よりも本格的に嗅ぎ回らせてもらいますが ──当然、異存はないですね？
jpnSearchText:
昨日よりも本格的に嗅ぎ回らせてもらいますが
──当然、異存はないですね？

engChrName: ...I don't like it, but I know it must be done.
engSearchText: ...I don't like it, but I know it must be done.
jpnChrName: ……気に食わんが仕方あるまい。
jpnSearchText: ……気に食わんが仕方あるまい。

engChrName: Better give our cards the proper ranks, then.
engSearchText: Better give our cards the proper ranks, then.
jpnChrName: クク、だったら認証カードの ランクも相応に上げてもらわねぇとなぁ？
jpnSearchText:
クク、だったら認証カードの
ランクも相応に上げてもらわねぇとなぁ？

engChrName: Tch... Fine! Give me your cards!
engSearchText: Tch... Fine! Give me your cards!
jpnChrName: くっ── ええい、カードを出すがいい！
jpnSearchText:
くっ──
ええい、カードを出すがいい！

engChrName: Rank B—the certification level you mentioned.
engSearchText: Rank B—the certification level you mentioned.
jpnChrName: ランク“Ｂ”── 昨日仰っていたグレードですね。
jpnSearchText:
ランク“Ｂ”──
昨日仰っていたグレードですね。

engChrName: Heh. That one almost never gets issued.
engSearchText: Heh. That one almost never gets issued.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、そのランクは 滅多に発行されることはねぇぞ？
jpnSearchText:
ヘッ、そのランクは
滅多に発行されることはねぇぞ？

engChrName: I'm not trying to bitch, but may as well just give us Rank A at this point.
engSearchText:
I'm not trying to bitch, but may as well just give us
Rank A at this point.
jpnChrName: ハッ、文句はねぇが若干セコイな。 ここは一気にＡに行くとこだろーが？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、文句はねぇが若干セコイな。
ここは一気にＡに行くとこだろーが？

engChrName: Don't ask for the impossible. 'Sides, we'll be able to get around much better than we could yesterday with these.
engSearchText:
Don't ask for the impossible. 'Sides, we'll be able to
get around much better than we could yesterday
with these.
jpnChrName: 無茶言うな──こいつがあれば 昨日より更に動きやすくなんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
無茶言うな──こいつがあれば
昨日より更に動きやすくなんだろ。

engChrName: Let's get to work. Time to get one over that mafia!
engSearchText: Let's get to work. Time to get one over that mafia!
jpnChrName: さっそく行動開始ですね…… マフィアの尻尾も掴んでみせます！
jpnSearchText:
さっそく行動開始ですね……
マフィアの尻尾も掴んでみせます！

engChrName: ...I have a favor to ask.
engSearchText: ...I have a favor to ask.
jpnChrName: ……お願いがあります。
jpnSearchText: ……お願いがあります。

engChrName: If at all possible, do you think I could accompany you?
engSearchText:
If at all possible, do you think I could
accompany you?
jpnChrName: できれば──僕もしばらく 貴方たちに同行させてくれませんか？
jpnSearchText:
できれば──僕もしばらく
貴方たちに同行させてくれませんか？

engChrName: Oh?
engSearchText: Oh?

engChrName: As Professor Hamilton's student, this situation with Professor Callaghan isn't entirely unrelated to me.
engSearchText:
As Professor Hamilton's student, this situation with
Professor Callaghan isn't entirely unrelated to me.
jpnChrName: ……キャラハン教授のことは ハミルトン門下にも無関係じゃありません。
jpnSearchText:
……キャラハン教授のことは
ハミルトン門下にも無関係じゃありません。

engChrName: And I very much consider it my job to do something about it in her stead. Please, let me come with you.
engSearchText:
And I very much consider it my job to do something
about it in her stead. Please, let me come with you.
jpnChrName: 博士が留守中、なんとかするのは僕の役目です。 ……どうか、お願いします。
jpnSearchText:
博士が留守中、なんとかするのは僕の役目です。
……どうか、お願いします。

engChrName: Quatre...
engSearchText: Quatre...
jpnChrName: カトル君……
jpnSearchText: カトル君……

engChrName: Eh, that's fine with me.
engSearchText: Eh, that's fine with me.
jpnChrName: ……ま、いいだろ。
jpnSearchText: ……ま、いいだろ。

engChrName: But just to give you a heads up, our work takes priority.
engSearchText:
But just to give you a heads up, our work
takes priority.
jpnChrName: ただし一緒に行動するからには 裏解決屋としての活動が主体になる。
jpnSearchText:
ただし一緒に行動するからには
裏解決屋としての活動が主体になる。

engChrName: That means you're gonna be taggin' along while we take care of business. That gonna be a problem?
engSearchText:
That means you're gonna be taggin' along while we
take care of business. That gonna be a problem?
jpnChrName: お前さんにも俺たちの業務に 付き合ってもらうがかまわねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
お前さんにも俺たちの業務に
付き合ってもらうがかまわねぇか？

engChrName: You mean like yesterday? That's fine. I wouldn't even mind helping out if there's anything I can do.
engSearchText:
You mean like yesterday? That's fine. I wouldn't even
mind helping out if there's anything I can do.
jpnChrName: 昨日やっていた……ええ、勿論です。 きっとお役に立ってみせます。
jpnSearchText:
昨日やっていた……ええ、勿論です。
きっとお役に立ってみせます。

engChrName: Well, we're counting on you guys! I'll reach out to my contacts and see what I can dig up while you're at it.
engSearchText:
Well, we're counting on you guys! I'll reach out to my
contacts and see what I can dig up while you're at it.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そっちの事はよろしくね～。 わたしも色々とツテを当たってみるから。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そっちの事はよろしくね～。
わたしも色々とツテを当たってみるから。

engChrName: And just don't do anything tooooo crazy, okay, Quatre?
engSearchText:
And just don't do anything tooooo crazy,
okay, Quatre?
jpnChrName: カトル君はあまり無理はしないんだよ～？
jpnSearchText: カトル君はあまり無理はしないんだよ～？

engChrName: Don't worry so much, Essy. I'm in good company.
engSearchText: Don't worry so much, Essy. I'm in good company.
jpnChrName: うん、皆さんも一緒だから エレ姉もどうか心配しないで。
jpnSearchText:
うん、皆さんも一緒だから
エレ姉もどうか心配しないで。

engChrName: But whatever it takes, I'm determined to set things right while she's not here to do it herself.
engSearchText:
But whatever it takes, I'm determined to set things
right while she's not here to do it herself.
jpnChrName: きっと何とかしてみせる…… ──博士の代わりにね。
jpnSearchText:
きっと何とかしてみせる……
──博士の代わりにね。

engChrName: ...I know.
engSearchText: ...I know.

engChrName: I'll start talking to any dealers who supplied Professor Callaghan with parts.
engSearchText:
I'll start talking to any dealers who supplied Professor
Callaghan with parts.
jpnChrName: こっちもキャラハンが機材を調達した 業者なんかを当たってみるつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
こっちもキャラハンが機材を調達した
業者なんかを当たってみるつもりだ。

engChrName: If I hear anything back, I'll let you know. Take good care of the boy.
engSearchText:
If I hear anything back, I'll let you know. Take good
care of the boy.
jpnChrName: 何か分かったら連絡する。 カトルをよろしく頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText:
何か分かったら連絡する。
カトルをよろしく頼むぜ。

engChrName: Yeah. You got it.
engSearchText: Yeah. You got it.
jpnChrName: ああ、任されたぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、任されたぜ。

engChrName: By the way, Agnès...it glowed last night, didn't it?
engSearchText: By the way, Agnès...it glowed last night, didn't it?
jpnChrName: ところでアニエス…… ──昨夜、光ったんだってな？
jpnSearchText:
ところでアニエス……
──昨夜、光ったんだってな？

engChrName: ...It did, yes.
engSearchText: ...It did, yes.
jpnChrName: ……はい。
jpnSearchText: ……はい。

engChrName: Most likely at the same time as when Professor Callaghan's final transmission went out.
engSearchText:
Most likely at the same time as when Professor
Callaghan's final transmission went out.
jpnChrName: 多分、キャラハン教授からの最後の 通信があったタイミングではないかと。
jpnSearchText:
多分、キャラハン教授からの最後の
通信があったタイミングではないかと。

engChrName: We're getting close, then.
engSearchText: We're getting close, then.
jpnChrName: いよいよ濃厚、ですか。
jpnSearchText: いよいよ濃厚、ですか。

engChrName: Yes. The last time the Genesis glowed like that was...
engSearchText: Yes. The last time the Genesis glowed like that was...
jpnChrName: ええ、今までもゲネシスが あそこまではっきり光った時は……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、今までもゲネシスが
あそこまではっきり光った時は……

engChrName: Erm... What are you talking about? What's a Genesis?
engSearchText:
Erm... What are you talking about? What's
a Genesis?
jpnChrName: ？　何の話ですか？ ……“ゲネシス”？
jpnSearchText:
？　何の話ですか？
……“ゲネシス”？

engChrName: Ah, don't worry about it. Work stuff. I'm sure we'll fill you in eventually.
engSearchText:
Ah, don't worry about it. Work stuff. I'm sure we'll
fill you in eventually.
jpnChrName: あー、こっちの話だ。 ま、その内にな。
jpnSearchText:
あー、こっちの話だ。
ま、その内にな。

engChrName: I hope you don't mind, Quatre.
engSearchText: I hope you don't mind, Quatre.
jpnChrName: ごめんなさい、カトル君。
jpnSearchText: ごめんなさい、カトル君。

engChrName: If you say so... It must be something that could take a while to explain.
engSearchText:
If you say so... It must be something that could take a
while to explain.
jpnChrName: ……まあいいけど。 何か事情があるみたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
……まあいいけど。
何か事情があるみたいだし。

engChrName: So, where should we start?
engSearchText: So, where should we start?
jpnChrName: それで、どこから調べましょうか？
jpnSearchText: それで、どこから調べましょうか？

engChrName: If possible, I'd like to first speak to Yang. You would better know him as Professor Cronkite.
engSearchText:
If possible, I'd like to first speak to Yang. You would
better know him as Professor Cronkite.
jpnChrName: できれば一度、ヤン兄── クロンカイト教授の話は聞きたいですが。
jpnSearchText:
できれば一度、ヤン兄──
クロンカイト教授の話は聞きたいですが。

engChrName: The guy our missing professor had beef with, right? Yeah, I bet he'd know a thing or two about his research.
engSearchText:
The guy our missing professor had beef with, right?
Yeah, I bet he'd know a thing or two about
his research.
jpnChrName: 消えた教授が目の仇にしてた相手か…… 研究についても知ってそうだったしな。
jpnSearchText:
消えた教授が目の仇にしてた相手か……
研究についても知ってそうだったしな。

engChrName: Sounds good to me. Plus I think it's about time we have a little talk with yesterday's client.
engSearchText:
Sounds good to me. Plus I think it's about time we
have a little talk with yesterday's client.
jpnChrName: いいだろう──それといい加減、 昨日の“依頼人”にも話を聞かねえとな。
jpnSearchText:
いいだろう──それといい加減、
昨日の“依頼人”にも話を聞かねえとな。

engChrName: The anonymous one?
engSearchText: The anonymous one?
jpnChrName: あ、匿名で依頼を出した……
jpnSearchText: あ、匿名で依頼を出した……

engChrName: Not so anonymous to us at this point. Come on—let's settle the score.
engSearchText:
Not so anonymous to us at this point. Come on—let's
settle the score.
jpnChrName: ハッ、大分メドも付いてきたし そろそろ白黒付けておくか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、大分メドも付いてきたし
そろそろ白黒付けておくか。

engChrName: So we'll be making the rounds through New Town and the Artisanal District before heading to the Institute of Science.
engSearchText:
So we'll be making the rounds through New Town
and the Artisanal District before heading to the
Institute of Science.
jpnChrName: では、新市街や職人街を回りつつ、 理科大学に向かう感じですね。
jpnSearchText:
では、新市街や職人街を回りつつ、
理科大学に向かう感じですね。

engChrName: That sounds perfect. Then may day two of our work begin.
engSearchText:
That sounds perfect. Then may day two of our
work begin.
jpnChrName: ええ、２日目の解決業務、 さっそく開始いたしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、２日目の解決業務、
さっそく開始いたしましょう。

engChrName: Quatre joined the party.
engSearchText: Quatre joined the party.
jpnChrName: カトルがパーティに加わった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>カトルがパーティに加わった。

engChrName: Yang!
engSearchText: Yang!
jpnChrName: ヤン兄……！
jpnSearchText: ヤン兄……！

engChrName: Finally found you.
engSearchText: Finally found you.
jpnChrName: ようやく見つけたか。
jpnSearchText: ようやく見つけたか。

engChrName: Quatre...and that group with the spriggan, correct?
engSearchText: Quatre...and that group with the spriggan, correct?
jpnChrName: カトル…… それに“裏解決屋”だったか。
jpnSearchText:
カトル……
それに“裏解決屋”だったか。

engChrName: I expected you might be coming to find me soon.
engSearchText: I expected you might be coming to find me soon.
jpnChrName: そろそろ来る頃だろうとは思っていた。
jpnSearchText: そろそろ来る頃だろうとは思っていた。

engChrName: (Strange how the man we just so happened to casually run into twice already is doing such incredible work for the Republican Army.)
engSearchText:
(Strange how the man we just so happened to casually
run into twice already is doing such incredible work
for the Republican Army.)
jpnChrName: （昨日二度ほど会いましたが   この方が、共和国軍で進んでいる……）
jpnSearchText:
（昨日二度ほど会いましたが
この方が、共和国軍で進んでいる……）

engChrName: (Yeah. He's developing weapons like those big humanoid things, right?)
engSearchText:
(Yeah. He's developing weapons like those big
humanoid things, right?)
jpnChrName: （あの人型を含めた新兵器の開発を   一手に手がけている人みたいですね……）
jpnSearchText:
（あの人型を含めた新兵器の開発を
一手に手がけている人みたいですね……）

engChrName: (Correct. He is quite a known figure within Marduk.)
engSearchText: (Correct. He is quite a known figure within Marduk.)
jpnChrName: （ええ、テスト運用するＭＫ社でも   度々名前は伺っておりましたが……）
jpnSearchText:
（ええ、テスト運用するＭＫ社でも
度々名前は伺っておりましたが……）

engChrName: Pleasure seeing you again. It's a real honor that such an esteemed professor remembers folks like us.
engSearchText:
Pleasure seeing you again. It's a real honor that such
an esteemed professor remembers folks like us.
jpnChrName: ──高名な先生に 覚えて頂いていて光栄ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
──高名な先生に
覚えて頂いていて光栄ですよ。

engChrName: And since you do, I imagine you've got a pretty good idea of why we're here?
engSearchText:
And since you do, I imagine you've got a pretty good
idea of why we're here?
jpnChrName: 俺たちが訪ねてきた理由、 察しがついているみたいですね？
jpnSearchText:
俺たちが訪ねてきた理由、
察しがついているみたいですね？

engChrName: I do, considering your position and recent events.
engSearchText: I do, considering your position and recent events.
jpnChrName: ああ、君たちの立場と昨日あった出来事、 そして事件を考えればな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、君たちの立場と昨日あった出来事、
そして事件を考えればな。

engChrName: ...Professor Callaghan truly has left me in quite a predicament.
engSearchText:
...Professor Callaghan truly has left me in quite
a predicament.
jpnChrName: ……キャラハン教授も困った人だ。
jpnSearchText: ……キャラハン教授も困った人だ。

engChrName: His ties to the instability of the orbal network and its distribution, as well as the mafia, were unfortunate enough on their own...
engSearchText:
His ties to the instability of the orbal network and its
distribution, as well as the mafia, were unfortunate
enough on their own...
jpnChrName: 導力ネットや供給網の異常、 マフィアとの繋がりだけならまだしも……
jpnSearchText:
導力ネットや供給網の異常、
マフィアとの繋がりだけならまだしも……

engChrName: ...but now here you are, dragging me into it.
engSearchText: ...but now here you are, dragging me into it.
jpnChrName: 巡り巡って、こうして 私にまで面倒事を運んでくるのだから。
jpnSearchText:
巡り巡って、こうして
私にまで面倒事を運んでくるのだから。

engChrName: H-How did you know all of that?
engSearchText: H-How did you know all of that?
jpnChrName: ど、どうして……
jpnSearchText: ど、どうして……

engChrName: You get all that from the CEO?
engSearchText: You get all that from the CEO?
jpnChrName: あのＣＥＯから聞き出したのか？
jpnSearchText: あのＣＥＯから聞き出したのか？

engChrName: No? The logic is simple enough.
engSearchText: No? The logic is simple enough.
jpnChrName: いや？　あくまで論理的な帰結だ。
jpnSearchText: いや？　あくまで論理的な帰結だ。

engChrName: One need only link the subject of his research to the timing of the city's recent dilemmas for the pieces to fall into place.
engSearchText:
One need only link the subject of his research to the
timing of the city's recent dilemmas for the pieces to
fall into place.
jpnChrName: 彼の研究内容とタイミングを考えれば 市内の異常との因果関係は導き出せる。
jpnSearchText:
彼の研究内容とタイミングを考えれば
市内の異常との因果関係は導き出せる。

engChrName: There is also that vast sum of money he received from an unknown source and various inexplicable phenomena to consider.
engSearchText:
There is also that vast sum of money he received from
an unknown source and various inexplicable
phenomena to consider.
jpnChrName: 加えて出所不明な巨額の資金── 説明のつかない異変という要素。
jpnSearchText:
加えて出所不明な巨額の資金──
説明のつかない異変という要素。

engChrName: It all shares a lot in common with those perplexing incidents that have taken place across the Republic the past few months.
engSearchText:
It all shares a lot in common with those perplexing
incidents that have taken place across the Republic
the past few months.
jpnChrName: ここ数ヶ月、共和国各地で起きた 不可解な事件とも符合する点も多い。
jpnSearchText:
ここ数ヶ月、共和国各地で起きた
不可解な事件とも符合する点も多い。

engChrName: The ones related to Almata and their ever-expanding influence. Now, am I wrong?
engSearchText:
The ones related to Almata and their
ever-expanding influence. Now, am I wrong?
jpnChrName: ──近頃勢力を広げているという 《アルマータ》関連といったところか？
jpnSearchText:
──近頃勢力を広げているという
《アルマータ》関連といったところか？

engChrName: Whoa!
engSearchText: Whoa!
jpnChrName: えええっ……！？
jpnSearchText: えええっ……！？

engChrName: I'm amazed that you could connect the dots so precisely...
engSearchText:
I'm amazed that you could connect the dots
so precisely...
jpnChrName: そ、そんなことまで……
jpnSearchText: そ、そんなことまで……

engChrName: Then we have all we—
engSearchText: Then we have all we—
jpnChrName: ヤン兄、だったら……！
jpnSearchText: ヤン兄、だったら……！

engChrName: —need? Do you really?
engSearchText: —need? Do you really?
jpnChrName: ──だったら？
jpnSearchText: ──だったら？

engChrName: ...Right. It's a researcher's duty to substantiate a working theory by accumulating proof.
engSearchText:
...Right. It's a researcher's duty to substantiate a
working theory by accumulating proof.
jpnChrName: ……自ら仮説を立て、証明するために 実証を重ねるのが研究者──
jpnSearchText:
……自ら仮説を立て、証明するために
実証を重ねるのが研究者──

engChrName: Any conclusion that skips over this process holds no value.
engSearchText:
Any conclusion that skips over this process holds
no value.
jpnChrName: 過程を飛ばして得られただけの答えに 何の価値もありはしない……
jpnSearchText:
過程を飛ばして得られただけの答えに
何の価値もありはしない……

engChrName: As I've so often told you.
engSearchText: As I've so often told you.
jpnChrName: そう、いつも言っていることだ。
jpnSearchText: そう、いつも言っていることだ。

engChrName: Ultimately, you must arrive at your own conclusion as a fellow researcher.
engSearchText:
Ultimately, you must arrive at your own conclusion as
a fellow researcher.
jpnChrName: あくまで自分で辿りつくといい。 お前も研究者の一人ならばな。
jpnSearchText:
あくまで自分で辿りつくといい。
お前も研究者の一人ならばな。

engChrName: Though I would not be against offering you my guidance as I did when you completed FIO and XEROS.
engSearchText:
Though I would not be against offering you my
guidance as I did when you completed FIO
and XEROS.
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯとＸＥＲＯＳを完成させた時程度なら 手を貸してやらないでもないが。
jpnSearchText:
ＦＩＯとＸＥＲＯＳを完成させた時程度なら
手を貸してやらないでもないが。

engChrName: I shall be on my way, then. I've much research that requires my attention.
engSearchText:
I shall be on my way, then. I've much research that
requires my attention.
jpnChrName: それでは失礼する。 私も私の研究で忙しいのでね。
jpnSearchText:
それでは失礼する。
私も私の研究で忙しいのでね。

engChrName: (This guy is such a pain in the ass!)
engSearchText: (This guy is such a pain in the ass!)
jpnChrName: （おい、面倒臭すぎんぞ   あのメガネ……！）
jpnSearchText:
（おい、面倒臭すぎんぞ
あのメガネ……！）

engChrName: (A-And here I thought he was gonna be our next lead!)
